64a5('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang
64a6('bum): bzhin dang bral ba ste/de byang chub sems dra ba'i sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//brtson
64a7('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
64b1('bum): ma/yang dag pa de lta ba bzhin du ba tu shos so//bsam gtan gyi phra rab tu ston pa no bsam gtan gyi ba la tu phyin pa rlung bzhin dang bral ba ste/de byang chub sems dpa' mams
64b2('bum): dnga' chen ng+ge shes rabs pa ros tu phyin pa la spyod pa'in/yang ga bu ji lta zhin du rA n+ya shes so//shes ma pa rom tu byin pa ni shes rib kyi pha rol te phyin pa'i rang bzhin
64b3('bum): dang bral ba ste/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/yang dag pa ji lta bo bzhin du rab tu shes so//tshe dang ldan pa shA
64b4('bum): radwa ti'i bu/nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/yang dag
64b5('bum): paji lta bu bzhin du rab tu shes so//phyi stong pa nyid ni bye stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
64b6('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/yang dag pa ji lta bu bzhin du rab tu shes so//phyi nang stong pa nyid ni phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dngapa'achen po shes
64b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/yid dge pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/de byang chub
65a1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//chen po stong pa nyid ni chen
65a2('bum): po stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/yang drug pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes
65a3('bum): so//don dam pa stong pa nyid ni don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
65a4('bum): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//'dus byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
65a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/
65a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni
65a7('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/yang dag pa ji lta ba
65b1('bum): bzhin du rab tu shes so//thog ma dang thu ma med pa stong pa nyid ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral bya ste/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
65b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/yang drug pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/
65b3('bum): de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin stong
65b4('bum): pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//
65b5('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//
65b6('bum): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/de byang chub sems dpa'o sems dpa'
65b7('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral
66a1('bum): bste/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'itshe/yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//dngos
66a2('bum): po med pa stong pa nyid ni dngos po mod pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin drang bral ba ste/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/yang
66a3('bum): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rang tu shes so//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
66a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang
66a5('bum): byul ba ste/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/yang dag pa ji lta bzhin du rab tu shes so//tshwa dang ldan pa shA radwa
66a6('bum): tI'i bu dran pa nye bor bzhag pa bzhin dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i rang bzhin dang bralab ste/de byang rgyub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
66a7('bum): /yang dag pa de lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//yang dag par spong ba bzhini yang dag par spong ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/da byang chub sems dpa' sems dang sbyin pa
66b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/de byang chub
66b2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//dbang po lnga ni dbang po'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/de
66b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//stobs lnga ni stobs kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/
66b4('bum): de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lo spyod pa'i tshe/yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//byang chub kyi yan lag bdun ni byang chub
66b5('bum): kyi yan lag gi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes
66b6('bum): so//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni 'phags pa'i lam gyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
66b7('bum): pa'i tshe/yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi ni 'phags pa'i bden pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'o/
67a1('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//bsam gtan bzhi ni bsam gtan gyi rang bzhin drang bral
67a2('bum): ba ste/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//tshad med pa bzhi ni tshad
67a3('bum): med pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//
67a4('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
67a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//rnam par thar pa brgyad ni/rnam par thar pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/de byang chub sems dpa'
67a6('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni//
67a7('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/yang
67b1('bum): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa ni/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa
67b2('bum): dang /smon pa med pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu
67b3('bum): shes so//mngon par shes pa rnams ni mngon par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//
67b4('bum): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//ting nge 'dzin rnams ni ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
67b5('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni gzungs kyi sgo'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
67b6('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi
67b7('bum): rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//mi 'jigs
68a1('bum): pa bzhi ni mi 'jigs pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/yang dag
68a2('bum): pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni/so so yang dag par rig pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
68a3('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//byams pa chen po ni byams pa chen po'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/de byang
68a4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//snying rje chen po ni snying rje chen po'i rang
68a5('bum): bzhin dang bral ba ste/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//sangs
68a6('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i rang bzhin dang bral bya ste/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
68a7('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rang
68b1('bum): bzhin dang bral ba ste/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//lhan cig phyir
68b2('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/yad dag
68b3('bum): bya'i lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin dang bral ba skye/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
68b4('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyong pa'i tshe/yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//dgra bcom pa nyid ni dgra bcom pa nyid kyi rlung bzhini dang bral ba ste/de byang chub sems dpa' sems
68b5('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//rang byang chub ni rang byang chub kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/de byang chub sems
68b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shos so//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni/lam gyi rnam pa shes
68b7('bum): pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//
69a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
69a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/de byang
69a3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//ma nor ba de bzhin nyid ni ma nor ba de bzhin
69a4('bum): nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so///
69a5('bum): gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid ni gzhon ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin drang bral ba ste/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
69a6('bum): pa'i tshe/yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//chos nyid ni chos nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
69a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//chos kyi dbyings ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/de byang chub sems dpa' sems
69b1('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//chos kyi gnas nyid ni chos kyi gnas nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste///
69b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//chos skyon med pa nyid ni chos skyon med
69b3('bum): pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//yang
69b4('bum): dag pa'i mtha' ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/yang dag pa ji lta ba
69b5('bum): bzhin du rab tu shes so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma brel bar shes par bya'o//
69b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/bam po nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa/smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/
69b7('bum): 'du shes kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/'du byed kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/mig gi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/rna ba'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu//
70a1('bum): sna'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/lce'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/lus kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/yid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta
70a2('bum): bu/sgra'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/dri'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ro'i rlung bzhin ni ji lta bu/reg gi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/chos kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/mig gi rnam par
70a3('bum): shes pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/sna'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/lce'i rnam par shrIs pa'i rang bzhin ni
70a4('bum): ji lta bu/lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/rna ba'i
70a5('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin ni
70a6('bum): dzI lta bu/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhini nI dzi lta bu/mig gi 'dus te rig po'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang
70a7('bum): bzhin ni ji lta bu/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/lus kyi 'dus
70b1('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bu'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bu'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/chu'i khams kyi
70b2('bum): rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/me'i khams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/rlung gi khams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/rnam par shes pa'i
70b3('bum): khams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ma rig pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/'du byed kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ming dang gzugs kyi
70b4('bum): rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/skye mched drug gi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/reg pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/sred pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/len pa'i
70b5('bum): rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/srid pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/skye ba'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/rga shri'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/tshul
70b6('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin nI ji lta bu/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/bsam
70b7('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/phyi stong pa nyid kyi rang
71a1('bum): bzhin ni ji lta bu/phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/chen po stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/
71a2('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/mtha' las 'das pa
71a3('bum): stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi
71a4('bum): rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin
71a5('bum): ni ji lta bu/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni
71a6('bum): ji lta bu/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta
71a7('bum): bu/dbang po rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/stobs rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi rang bzhi ni ni ji lta bu/'phags pa'i lam yan lag
71b1('bum): brgyad pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/bsam gtan rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/tshad med pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu//
71b2('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/rnam par thar pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi
71b3('bum): rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/mngon par shes pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji
71b4('bum): lta bu/ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/mi 'jigs
71b5('bum): pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/byams pa chen po'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/
71b6('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu//
71b7('bum): phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/dgra bcom pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/rang byang chub kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin
72a1('bum): /rnam pa smras su na nyon da nga rdzun smya rgyu nga smyan //man du du /
72a2('bum): gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/chos nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/chos kyi gnas nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji
72a3('bum): bu/chos skyon myed pa'i rang bzhin ni dzI sgru /yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bru/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shU rAdwa ti'i bu/gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni
72a4('bum): dngos po med pa'o//tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//'du shes kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po meng pa'o//'du byed kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed bya'o//rnam pa
72a5('bum): shes pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//mig gi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//rna ba'i rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o//sna'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//
72a6('bum): lce'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//lus kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//yid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//
72a7('bum): sgra'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//dri'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//ri'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//reg gi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//
72b1('bum): rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//sna'i rnam par shes
72b2('bum): pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//lce'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//yid kyi rnam
72b3('bum): par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//sna'i
72b4('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//yid
72b5('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//rnga ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
72b6('bum): ba'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni dngos
72b7('bum): po med pa'o//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//
73a1('bum): sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin ni das bo med pa'o//rgyu'i khams kyi rang bzhin ni das po med //me'i khams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//rlung kham
73a2('bum): kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//nam mkha'i khrims kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//mra ribri pa'i rang
73a3('bum): bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//'du byed kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//ming dang gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po
73a4('bum): med pa'o//skye mched drug gi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//reg pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//sred pa'i rang bzhin
73a5('bum): ni dngos po med pa'o//len pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//srid pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//skye ba'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//rga shi'i rang bzhin ni
73a6('bum): dngos po med pa'o//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
73a7('bum): pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa
73b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//phyi stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//phyi nang stong
73b2('bum): pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//chen po stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//don dam pa stong
73b3('bum): pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//mtha'
73b4('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin
73b5('bum): ni dngos po med pa'o//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa
73b6('bum): nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//ngo bo
73b7('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos
74a1('bum): po med pa'o//yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//dbang
74a2('bum): blo rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//stobs rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//lam
74a3('bum): gyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//bsam gtan rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//tshad
74a4('bum): med pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//rnam par thar pa rnams kyi rang bzhin
74a5('bum): ni dngos po med pa'o//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med
74a6('bum): pa dang /smon pa med pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//mngon par shes pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos
74a7('bum): po med pa'o//gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//mi 'jigs pa
74b1('bum): rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//byams pa chen po'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//snying rje chen
74b2('bum): po'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//
74b3('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//dgra bcom pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med
74b4('bum): pa'o//rang byang chub kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos
74b5('bum): po med pa'o//de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin ni
74b6('bum): dngos po med pa'o//chos nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//chos kyi gnas nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med
74b7('bum): pa'o//chos skyon med pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na//
75a1('bum): 'di ltar gzugs la gzugs kyi rang bzhin med pa dang /tshor ba lnga tshor ba'i rang bzhin med pa dang /'du shes la 'du shes kyi rang bzhin med pa dang /
75a2('bum): 'du byed la 'du byed kyi rang bzhin med pa dang /rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang /mig la mig gi rang bzhin med pa dang /rna ba la rna ba'i
75a3('bum): rang bzhin med pa dang /sna la sna'i rang bzhin med pa dang /lce la lce'i rang bzhin med pa dang /lus la lus kyi rang bzhin med pa dang /yid la yid kyi rang bzhin med
75a4('bum): pa dang /gzugs la gzugs kyi rang bzhin med pa dang /sgra la sgra'i rang bzhin med pa dang /dri la dri'i rang bzhin med pa dang /ro la ro'i rang bzhin med pa dang /reg
75a5('bum): la reg gi rang bzhin med pa dang /chos la chos kyi rang bzhin med pa dang /mig gi rnam par shes pa la mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang /rna ba'i rnam
75a6('bum): par shes pa la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang /sna'i rnam par shes pa la sna'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang /lce'i rnam par shes pa la
75a7('bum): lce'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang /lus kyi rnam par shes pa la lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa la yid kyi rnam
75b1('bum): par shes pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang /mig gi 'dus te reg pa la mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin med
75b2('bum): pa dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa la sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang /lce'i 'dus te reg pa la lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la
75b3('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mig
75b4('bum): gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin med pa dang /rna pA'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin med pa dang /sna'i
75b5('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin med pa dang /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
75b6('bum): tshor ba'i rang bzhin med pa dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin med pa dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
75b7('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin med pa dang /sa'i khams la sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin med pa dang /chu'i khams la chu'i khams kyi
76a1('bum): rlung bzhin med pa dang /me'i khams la me'i khams kyi rang bzhin med pa dang /rlung gi khams la rlung gi khams kyi rang bzhin med pa dang /nam ma
76a2('bum): khams la nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin med pa dang /rnam par shes pa'i khams la rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin med pa dang /ma rig pa la ma rig pa'i rang bzhin
76a3('bum): med pa dang /'du byed la 'du byed kyi rang bzhin med pa dang /rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang /ming dang gzugs la ming dang gzugs kyi rang
76a4('bum): bzhin med pa dang /skye mched drug la skye mched drug gi rang bzhin med pa dang /reg pa la reg pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang /tshor ba la tshor ba'i rang bzhin med pa dang /
76a5('bum): sred pa la sred pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang /len pa la len pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang /srid pa la sbrid pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang /skye ba la skye ba'i rang bzhin med pa dang /
76a6('bum): rga shi lA rga shi'i rang bzhin med pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la tshul
76a7('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
76b1('bum): tu phyin pa la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa lda bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang /shes rab kyi/
76b2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang /nang stong pa nyid la nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang /phyi stong pa nyid la phyi stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin
76b3('bum): med pa dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid la phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang /chen po stong pa nyid la chen
76b4('bum): po stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid la don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid la 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin
76b5('bum): med pa dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi rang
76b6('bum): bzhin med pa dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la dor ba med pa
76b7('bum): stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid la rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid la chos thams cad stong pa nyid
77a1('bum): k+Shi rang bzhin med pa dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la mi
77a2('bum): dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la ngo bo nyid stong
77a3('bum): pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams
77a4('bum): la dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang /yang dag par spong ba rnams la yang dag par spong ba'i rang bzhin med pa dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la rdzu
77a5('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang /dbang po rnams la dbang po'i rang bzhin med pa dang /stobs rnams la stobs kyi rang bzhin med pa dang /byang chub kyi yan lag
77a6('bum): rnams la byang chub kyi yan lag gi rang bzhin med pa dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la 'phags pa'i lam gyi rang bzhin med pa dang /'phags pa'i bden
77a7('bum): pa rnams lo 'phags pa'i bden pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang /bsam gtan rnams la bsam gtan gyi rang bzhin med pa dang /tshad med pa rnams la tshad med pa'i rang
77b1('bum): bzhin med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad la rnam par thar
77b2('bum): pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong
77b3('bum): pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa la rnam par thar pa'i sgo'i rang bzhin med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams lnga mngon par shes pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang /
77b4('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams lnga ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin med pa dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gzungs kyi sgo'i rang bzhin med pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la de bzhin
77b5('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs kyi rang bzhin med pa dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi lnga mi 'jigs pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la so so yang dag par rig pa'i rang
77b6('bum): bzhin med pa dang /byams pa chen po la byams pa chen po'i rang bzhin med pa dang /snying rje chen po la snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin med pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
77b7('bum): bco brgyad la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin med pa dang /lan cig phyir 'ong
78a1('bum): ba'i 'bras bu la lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin med pa dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin med pa dang /dgra
78a2('bum): bcom pa nyid la dgra bcom pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang /rang byang chub la rang byang chub kyi rang bzhin med pa dang /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la lam gyi rnam pa shes
78a3('bum): pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang /de bzhin nyid la de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin
78a4('bum): med pa dang /ma nor ba de bzhin nyid la ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang /gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid la gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa
78a5('bum): dang /chos nyid la chos nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang /chos kyi dbyings la chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin med pa dang /chos kyi gnas nyid la chos kyi gnas nyid kyi rang bzhin
78a6('bum): med pa dang /chos skyon med pa nyid la chos skyon med pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' la yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin med par shes par bya'o//tshe
78a7('bum): dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/gzhan yang gzugs la gzugs kyi mtshan nyid med do//tsher ba la tshor ba'i mtshan nyid med do//'du shes la 'du shes kyi mtshan nyid med
78b1('bum): do//'du byed la 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid med do//rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid med do//mig la mig gi mtshan nyid med do//rna ba la rna ba'i mtshan
78b2('bum): nyid med do//sna la sna'i mtshan nyid med do//lce la lce'i mtshan nyid med do//lus la lus kyi mtshan nyid med do//yid la yid kyi mtshan nyid med do//gzugs la
78b3('bum): gzugs kyi mtshan nyid med do//sgra la sgra'i mtshan nyid med do//dri la dri'i mtshan nyid med do//ro la ro'i mtshan nyid med do//reg la reg gi mtshan nyid med do//chos
78b4('bum): la chos kyi mtshan nyid med do//mig gi rnam par shes pa la mig gi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid med do//rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan
78b5('bum): nyid med do//sna'i rnam par shes pa la sna'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid med do//lce'i rnam par shes pa la lce'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid med do//lus kyi
78b6('bum): rnam par shes pa la lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid med do//yid kyi rnam par shes pa la yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid med do//mig gi 'dus te reg pa la
78b7('bum): mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid med do//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid med do//sna'i 'dus te reg pa la sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i
79a1('bum): mtshan nyid med do//lce'i 'dus te reg pa l+la lho'i 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid med do//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid
79a2('bum): med do//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid med do//mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
79a3('bum): tshor ba'i mtshan nyid med do//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid med do//sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
79a4('bum): tshor ba la sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid med do//lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid med
79a5('bum): do//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid med do//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la yid kyi
79a6('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid med do//sa'i khrims la sna'i khams kyi mtshan nyid med do//chu'i khams la chu'i khams kyi mtshan nyid med do//me'i khams
79a7('bum): la mo'i khams kyi mtshan nyid med do//rlung gi khams la rlung gi khams kyi mtshan nyid med do//nam mkha'i khams la nam mkha'i khams kyi mtshan nyid med do//rnam
79b1('bum): bar shes pa'i khams la rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi mtshan nyid med do//ma rig pa la ma rig pa'i mtshan nyid med do//'du byed la 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid med do//
79b2('bum): rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid med do//ming dang gzugs lnga ming dang gzugs kyi mtshan nyid med do//skye mched drug la skye mched drug dri mtshan
79b3('bum): nyid med do//reg pa la reg pa'i mtshan nyid med do//tshor ba la tshor ba'i mtshan nyid med do//sred pa la sred pa'i mtshan nyid med do//len po la len pa'i mtshan
79b4('bum): nyid med de//spyod pa la srid pa'i mtshan nyid med do//skye ba la skye ba'i mtshan nyid med do//rga shi la rga shi'i mtshan nyid med do//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyin pa'i
79b5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid myed do//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid med do//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lnga bzod
79b6('bum): ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid med do//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid med do//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
79b7('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid med do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid med do//nang stong pa nyid la nang
80a1('bum): stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid med do//phyi stong pa nyid la phyi stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid med do//phyi nang stong pa nyid la phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid med do//
80a2('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid med do//chen po stong pa nyid la chen po stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid med do//don dam pa stong pa nyid la don
80a3('bum): dam pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid med do//'dus byas stong pa nyid la 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid med do//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la 'dus ma byas stong pa
80a4('bum): nyid kyi mtshan nyid med do//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mtha' lus 'dres pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid med do//thog ma dang tha ma med pa sbyong pa nyid la
80a5('bum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid med do//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la dor bya med pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid med do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid la
80a6('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid med do//chos thams cad stong pa nyid la chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid med do//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la rang
80a7('bum): gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid med do//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid med do//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la
80b1('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid med do//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid med do//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la dngos po med par
80b2('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid med do//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i mtshan nyid med do//yang dag par spong ba rnams la yang dag par spong
80b3('bum): bya'i tshan nyid med do//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i mtshan nyid med do//dbang po rnams la dbang po'i mtshan nyid med do//stobs rnams la stobs
80b4('bum): kyi mtshan nyid med do//byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la byang chub kyi yan lag gi mtshan nyid med do//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la 'phags pa'i lam gyi
80b5('bum): mtshan nyid med do//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la 'phags pa'i bden pa'i mtshan nyid med do//bsam gtan rnams la bsam gtan gyi mtshan nyid med do//tshad
80b6('bum): med pa rnams la tshad med pa'i mtshan nyid med do//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid med do//rnam
80b7('bum): par thar pa rnams la rnam par thar pa'i mtshan nyid med do//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid med do///
81a1('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smyon pa med pa la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smyon pa
81a2('bum): myed pa'i mtshan nyid med do//mngon par shes pa rnams la mngon par shes pa'i mtshan nyid myed do//ting nge 'dzin rnams la ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi mtshan nyid myed
81a3('bum): do//gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gzungs kyi sgo'i mtshan nyid med do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi mtshan nyid myed do//
81a4('bum): mi 'jigs pa bzhi la mi 'jigs pa'i mtshan nyid med do//so so yang dag par reg pa bzhi la so so yang dag par rig pa'i mtshan nyid med do//byams pa chen po la
81a5('bum): byams pa chen po'i mtshan nyid med do//snying rje chen po la snying rje chen po'i mtshan nyid med do//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
81a6('bum): po'i mtshan nyid med do//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid med do//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la lan cig phyir 'ong
81a7('bum): ba'i 'bras bu'i ratshan nyid med do//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la phyi re mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid med do//dgra bcom pa nyid la dgra bcom pa nyid kyi mtshan
81b1('bum): nyid mod do//rang byang chub la rang byang chub kyi mtshan nyid med do//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen/
81b2('bum): pa nyid la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid med de//de bzhin nyid la de bzhin nyid kyi mtshan nyid myed do//na nor ba de bzhin nyid la ma ra ba de bzhin nyid kyi
81b3('bum): mtshan nyid med do//gzhon ma yin pa de bzhin nyid la gzhan me srin po de bzhin nyid kyi mtshan nyid med do//chos nyid la chos nyid kyi ni chen nyid med do//rjes kyi
81b4('bum): dbyings la chos kyi dbyings kyi mtshan nyid med do//chos kyi gnas nyid la chos kyi gnas nyid kyi mtshan nyid med do//chos skyon med pa nyid la chos skyon med pa nyid kyi mtshan
81b5('bum): spyo med do//yang dag 'i mtha' la yang dag pa'i mthu'i mtshan nyid med do//mtshan nyid la 'ang mtshan nyid kyi rlung bzhin med do//mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin la'ang mtshan
81b6('bum): nyid kyi rang bzhin med do//smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bslab pa 'di la slob pa de/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
81b7('bum): 'byung bar 'gyur ram/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ljon pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bslab pa 'di la slob
82a1('bum): bden rnam pa thams cad mabyon pa ny-id du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//daci' byor nan/rgyu dang ldan pA sh+tsa r+yAd+ya tA drung du 'ad ltar chos tham sa da nga/
82a2('bum): mabyung ba'i phyir ro//smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ji ltar ni/chos thams cad ma skye so ma byung ba yin/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe drang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i du
82a3('bum): gzugs gzugs kyis spyong ste/de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs so//tshur ba tshor bus stong ste de la skye du'ang mi dmigs 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs
82a4('bum): so//'du shes 'du shes kyis stong ste/de la skye ba'ang mi dmyigs 'byung ba'ang mi dmigasaso//'du byed 'du byed kyis stong ste/de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs 'byung
82a5('bum): bA 'di mi dmigs so//rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pa sna stong ste/de la skye bu'ang mi dmigs 'byung ba'ang mi drimigs so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/mug
82a6('bum): tshig gis spyong ste/de la skye ba'ang mi dmig ste 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs so//ni brna bas sbyong ste/de la skye dwa'ang mi dmigs 'byung ba'ang mi dpyugs so//sna snas sto
82a7('bum): ste/de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs so//lce lces stong ste/de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs so//lung lus kyis stong
82b1('bum): /de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs 'drung ba'ang mo dmigs so//yod mod kyis stong s+ho/de la skyonga'ang mod migs 'byung ba'ang mo dmigs so//tshe dang ldan pa shwA rA
82b2('bum): gzugs gzugs kyis spyong ste/de la skye ba'ang myi dmigs 'byung ba'ang myi dmigs so//sgyu smras stong ste/de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs so//
82b3('bum): de'i skye ba'ang mi dmigs 'byung ba'ang myi dmigs so//ro ros spyong ste/des skye ba'i mi dmigs 'byung ba 'dumi dmyigs so//reg reg gis stong ste/del sgrub
82b4('bum): mi migs 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs so//chos rgyas kyis spyod ste/de la skye ba'i mi myigs 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs so//tshe drung ldan pa shA r+yA ti hrI/smig gi rnam par
82b5('bum): shes pa mig gi rnam par shes pas stod ste/de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs 'thung ba'ang mi dmigs so//rna ba'i rnam par shes parna ba'i rnam par shis pos snang ste/dril skye ba'ang
82b6('bum): mi dmigasu 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs so//sna'i rlom par shes pa sna'i rnam par shes pas stong ste/de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs 'byung de'ang mi dmigs so//lce'i rnam par
82b7('bum): shes pa spyi'i rnam par shes pas stong ste/de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs so//lus kyi rnam par shes pa lus kyi rnam par shes pas stong ste/de la skye ba'ang
83a1('bum): /ri dmigs 'byud 'byung mi du migs so//snyi kyi rnam par shes pa yid rnam par shes pas spyong sa/des rgyo b.rang yo sogs 'byung ba ma/
83a2('bum): dmigs so//tshe dang ldan pa shA d-i tI'aM /mig gi 'dus te reg pa mig gi 'dus te dag pas sbed ste/de la m+b+hi du 'ang me myigs 'byu ba'ang rnyi rjegs so//
83a3('bum): 'dus te reg pa rna ba'i 'dus kyi gces stong ste/de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs 'byung ba' mi dmigs so//sna'i 'dus te reg pa sna'i 'dus te rig pas stong ste/de la skye ba'
83a4('bum): dririgs 'byung de'ang mi dmigs so//lha'i 'dres te regle pa lce'i 'dus te rig pas spyod ste/dril skye 'du mi dmigs 'byung ba nga mi dmigs so//lus kyi 'du
83a5('bum): te reg tu lus kyi 'dus te reg pas spyong ste/de la spyi bu'ang mi dmigs 'dzu du'ang mi dmigs so//yid kyi 'dus te rnyog pa snyid kyi 'dus te reg pas sbyang ste/dul
83a6('bum): ba'ang mi mi gas 'byung ba blang mi dmigs so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mig gi 'dus te reg pu'i rgyur
83a7('bum): bas stong ste/de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs so//rno ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor brna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsho bas stong ste
83b1('bum): de la skyo ba'ang mi dmigs 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs so//sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste/de la skye ba'ang mI dmigs
83b2('bum): 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs so//lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste/de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs
83b3('bum): so//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste/de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs so//yid kyi
83b4('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsho ro bas stong ste/de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa
83b5('bum): ti'i bu/sa'i khams sa'i khams kyis stong ste/de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs so//chu'i khams chu'i khams kyis stong ste/de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs
83b6('bum): 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs so//me'i khams me'i khams kyis stong ste/de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs so//rlung gi khams rlung gi khams kyis stong ste/de
83b7('bum): la skye ba'ang mi dmigs 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs so//nam mkha'i khams nam mkha'i khams kyis stong ste/de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs so//rnam par
84a1('bum): shes pa'i khams rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis stong ste/de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ma rig pa ma rig
84a2('bum): pas stong ste/de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs so//'du byed 'du byed kyis stong ste/de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs so//rnam par shes
84a3('bum): pa rnam par shes pas stong ste/de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs so//ming dang gzugs ming dang gzugs kyis stong ste/de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs 'byung ba'ang
84a4('bum): mi dmigs so//skye mched drug skye mched drug gis stong ste/de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs so//reg pa reg pas stong ste/de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs
84a5('bum): 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs so//tshor ba tshor bas stong ste/de la skye ba'ong mi dmigs 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs so//sred pa sred pas stong ste/de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs 'byung
84a6('bum): bla'adra mi dmigs so//len pa len pas stong ste/de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs so//srid pa srid pas stong ste/de la skye ba'adra mi dmigs 'byung ba'ang
84a7('bum): mi dmigs so//skye ba skye bas stong ste/de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs so//rga shi rga shis stong ste/de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs 'byung ba'ang mi
84b1('bum): dmigs so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs so//tshul khrims
84b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs so//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas
84b3('bum): stong ste/de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs so//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs 'byung ba'ang
84b4('bum): mi dmigs so//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs so//shes rab kyi pha rol tu
84b5('bum): byin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/nang stong pa nyid nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/de la skye
84b6('bum): 'ang mi dmigs 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs so//phyi stong pa nyid phyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs so//phyi nang stong pa nyid phyi nang stong pa nyid
84b7('bum): kyis stong ste/de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs so//stong pa nyid stong po nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs 'byung ba'ang mi
85a1('bum): dmigs so//chen po stong pa nyid chen po stong pa nyid kyi sna stong ste/de la skyo ba'ang mi dmigs 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs s+ho//don dam pa stong pa nyid dran
85a2('bum): dam pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs so//'dus byas stong pa nyid 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/de la skye ba'ang mi
85a3('bum): dmigs 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs so//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/de la skye ba'ang mau dmigs 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs so//mtha'
85a4('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs so//theg ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid
85a5('bum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/de la skyo ba'ang mi dmigs 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs so//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong
85a6('bum): ste/de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs 'byung ba 'dra mi dmigs so//rang bzhin stong pa nyid rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs 'byung ba'ang mi
85a7('bum): dmigs so//chos thams cad stong pa nyid chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs so//rang gi mtshan
85b1('bum): nyid stong pa nyid rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs so//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis stong
85b2('bum): ste/de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs so//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dngos po med pa spong pa nyid kyis stong ste/de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs 'byung ba'ang
85b3('bum): mi dmigs so//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs so//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
85b4('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dran
85b5('bum): pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyis stong ste/de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs so//yang dag par spong ba rnams yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis stong ste/de la skye
85b6('bum): ba'ang mi dmigs 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs so//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams rdzu 'phrul gyis rkang pa rnams kyis stong ste/de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs so//
85b7('bum): dbang po rnams dbang po rnams kyis stong ste/de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs so//stobs rnams stobs rnams kyis stong ste/de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs
86a1('bum): 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs so//byang chub kyi yan lag rnams byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis stong ste/de la skyo ba'ang ma dmigs 'byung ba'ang mo dmigs/
86a2('bum): so//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyud pas stong ste/de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs so//tshe dang ldan pa
86a3('bum): radwa ti'i bu/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis stong ste/de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs so//bsam gtan rnams
86a4('bum): bsam gtan rnams kyis stong ste/de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs so//tshad med pa rnams tshad med pa rnams kyis stong ste/de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs
86a5('bum): 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs so//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong ste/de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs
86a6('bum): 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs so//rnam par thar pa brgyad rnam par thar pa rnams kyis stong ste/de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs so//mthar gyis gnas pa'i
86a7('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong ste/de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs so//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong
86b1('bum): ny+tsi dang /mtshon ma med pa dang /smyon pa med pa rnam par thar dwA'i sgra stong pa nyid dang /mtshon ma med pa dang /smon pa med pas stong ste/de la skyo ba'ang mi dmigs 'byung ba'ang
86b2('bum): mi dmigs so//mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par shes pa rnams kyis sbyong ste/de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs so//ting nge 'dzin rnams ting nge 'dzin
86b3('bum): rnams kyi sa snang ste/de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs s+ho//gzungs kyi sgo rnams gzungs kyi sgra rnams kyis stong ste/de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs 'byung
86b4('bum): ba'ang mi dmigs so/tshe dong ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyis stong ste/de lo skye ba'ang mi dmigs 'byung
86b5('bum): bya'ang mi dmigs so//mi 'jigs pa rnams mi 'jigs pa rnams kyis stong ste/de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs so//so so yang dag par rig pa rnams
86b6('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis stong ste/de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs so//byams pa chen po byams pa chen pos stong ste/de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs
86b7('bum): 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs so//snying rje chen po snying rje chen pos stong ste/de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs so//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
87a1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ste/de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras
87a2('bum): bu rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bus stong ste/de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs so//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong ste/de la skye
87a3('bum): ba'ang mi dmigs 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs so//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong ste/de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs so//dgra bcom
87a4('bum): pa nyid dgra bcom pa nyid kyis stong ste/de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs so//rang byang chub rang byang chub kyis stong ste/de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs 'byung ba'ang
87a5('bum): mi dmigs so//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis stong ste/de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs so//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
87a6('bum): ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ste/de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/de bzhin nyid de bzhin
87a7('bum): nyid kyis stong ste/de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs so//ma nor ba de bzhin nyid ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyis stong ste/de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs 'byung
87b1('bum): ba'ang mi dmigs so//gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyis steng ste/de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs so//chos nyid chos
87b2('bum): nyid kyis stong ste/de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs so//chos kyi dbyings chos kyi dbyings kyis spong ste/de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs so//
87b3('bum): chos kyi gnas nyid chos kyi gnas nyid kyis stong ste/de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs so//chos skyon med pa nyid chos skyon med pa nyid kyis stong ste/de la skye ba'ang
87b4('bum): mi dmigs 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs so//yang dag pa'i mtha' yang dag pa'i mthas stong ste/de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa
87b5('bum): ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye ba yin te/de ji lta ji ltar rnam
87b6('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nye bar gyur pa de lta de ltar lus yongs su dag pa dang /ngag yongs su dag pa dang /sems yongs su dag pa dang /mtshan yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur
87b7('bum): ro//de ji lta ji ltar lus yongs su dag pa dang /ngag yongs su dag pa dang /sems yongs su dag pa dang /mtshan yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar/byang chub sems
88a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems mi bskyed do//zhe sdang dang ldan pa'i sems mi bskyod do//gti mug dang ldan pa'i sems mi
88a2('bum): bskyed do//nga rgyal dang ldan pa dang /sgyu dang g.yo dang ldan pa dang /phrag dog dang ser sna dang ldan pa dang /sred pa dang ldan pa dang /lta ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi bskyed do//de
88a3('bum): 'dod chags kyi sems mi bskyed cing /zhe sdang dang /gti mug dang /nga rgyal dang /sgyu dang /g.yo dang /phrag dog dang /ser sna dang /sred pa dang /lta ba dang ldan pa'i
88a4('bum): sems mi bskyed pas/nam yang ma'i mngal du skye bar mi 'gyur te/khor yug rtag par rdzus te skye bar 'gyur/sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i don ma gtogs par nam
88a5('bum): yang ngan song rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur ro//de sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas
88a6('bum): kyi zhing du 'gro ste/num bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur gyi bar du nam yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang
88a7('bum): bral bar mi 'gyur ro//de bas na tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan dang /legs pa 'di dag thob par 'dod pas/shes
88b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brtson 'grus mi btang bar spyad par bya ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
88b2('bum): pa la de ltar spyod pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nye bar gyur pa yin no//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/le'u ste lnga pa'o///
88b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa//bam po nyi shu rtsa dgu pa//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'dadi skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan
88b4('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//gal
88b5('bum): te tshor ba la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//gal te 'du shes la spyod na mtshan ma la sprad do//gal te 'du byed la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//gal te rnam par shes pa la spyod na
88b6('bum): mtshan mA la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs rtag
88b7('bum): ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi
89a1('bum): mkhas pas gzugs mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
89a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
89a3('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs ma mkhas pas gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
89a4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs ma mi khris pas gzugs bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal
89a5('bum): te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs bdog med ces bgyi bor spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
89a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma
89a7('bum): la spyod de//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs ma zhi zhes bgyi
89b1('bum): bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs
89b2('bum): dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs ma mkhas
89b3('bum): pas gzugs mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
89b4('bum): tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas tshor ba rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod de//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
89b5('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas tshor ba mi rtog ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
89b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thubs mi mkhas pas tshor ba bdo zhes bgyi bar spyod ni mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
89b7('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
90a1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs myi mkhas pas tshor ba bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
90a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas tshor ba bdag med ces bigyi bar
90a3('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshon po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas tshor ba
90a4('bum): zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas
90a5('bum): pas tshor ba ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshwa/
90a6('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas tshor ba dpon zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan mA la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
90a7('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas tshor ba mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshon
90b1('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mo mkhas pas 'du shes rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
90b2('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas 'du shes mo rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang
90b3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas 'du shes bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das
90b4('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas 'du shes sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan me la spyod
90b5('bum): do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas 'du shes bdag ces bgyi bar spyod
90b6('bum): na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shos rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas 'du shes
90b7('bum): bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//
91a1('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas 'du shes ni zhes bgyi bar spyod na man+ton ma lA spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
91a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas 'du shes ma nI zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
91a3('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas 'du shes dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mchin ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das
91a4('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pa sku 'du shes mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mchin mA la spyod
91a5('bum): do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas 'du byed rtag ces bgyi ba
91a6('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs myi mkhas pas 'du byed mi
91a7('bum): rtartog ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mo
91b1('bum): mkhas pas 'du byed bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//
91b2('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas 'du byed sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
91b3('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas 'du byed bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
91b4('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas 'du byed bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
91b5('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/the bos mi mkhas pas 'du byed zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
91b6('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas 'du byed ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
91b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pos 'du byed dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te
92a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas 'du byed mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan/
92a2('bum): ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa rtag
92a3('bum): ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas
92a4('bum): pas rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
92a5('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
92a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
92a7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
92b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod
92b2('bum): na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par shes
92b3('bum): bzhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas
92b4('bum): pas rnam par shes pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
92b5('bum): pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshon po shes
92b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
92b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas mig rtog ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te/
93a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas mig mi rtag ces dgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma
93a2('bum): la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas mig bodro zhes bgyi bar
93a3('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas
93a4('bum): mig sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshon po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
93a5('bum): tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas mig bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
93a6('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas mig bdag med ces bgyi bor spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
93a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas mig zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
93b1('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lnga spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas mog ma zhi zhes bgyi dar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
93b2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas mig dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshon ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
93b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas mig mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das
93b4('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhasdu bas rna ba rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan
93b5('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
93b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan mo la
93b7('bum): spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba sdug bsngal zhes bgyi
94a1('bum): bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs
94a2('bum): mi mkhas pas rna ba bdag ces bgyi bar spyod no mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
94a3('bum): ba'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba bdag med ces bgyi bar spyong na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
94a4('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan mo la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
94a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
94a6('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lnga spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba dpon zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
94a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas rna nga mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te
94b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas sna rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshon ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das
94b2('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems da' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas sna mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom
94b3('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thubs mi mkhas pas sna bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshon ma la spyod do//
94b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas sna sdug bsngalo zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan
94b5('bum): ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas sna bdag ces bgyi bar
94b6('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas sna bdag med
