94b7('bum): ces bgyi bar spyod na ma chen ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas
95a1('bum): bas sna zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
95a2('bum): pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas snum zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshon ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
95a3('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas sna dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshon ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
95a4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas sna mi dpon zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
95a5('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas lce rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
95a6('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thubs mi mkhas pas lce mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
95a7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas lce bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das
95b1('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshwa/thabs myi mkhas pas lce sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
95b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas lce bdag ces bgyi bar spyod ni mtshan/
95b3('bum): ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas lce bdag med
95b4('bum): ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas
95b5('bum): pas lce zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//
95b6('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas lce ma zhi zhes bgyi ba ro spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
95b7('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas lce dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
96a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas lce mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
96a2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas lus rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyong ngo //bcom ldan
96a3('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas lus mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la
96a4('bum): spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas lus bdo zhes bgyi bar spyod
96a5('bum): ni mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas lus sdug bsngal
96a6('bum): zhes bgyi bar spyod na me chen ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs
96a7('bum): mi mkhas pas lus bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
96b1('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe//thabs mi mkhas pas lus bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
96b2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas lus zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshon ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
96b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas lus ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
96b4('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas lus dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
96b5('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas lus mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshon ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
96b6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas yid rtag ces bgyi bar spyod no mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te//
96b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas yid mi rtog ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom
97a1('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas yod bde zhes bgyi bar spyod/
97a2('bum): na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas yid sdug
97a3('bum): bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs
97a4('bum): mi mkhas pas yid bdag ces bgyi bur spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
97a5('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas yid bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
97a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas yid zhi zhes bgyi brla spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
97a7('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas yid ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang
97b1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas yid dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom
97b2('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas yid mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan
97b3('bum): ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs rtag ces
97b4('bum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas
97b5('bum): pas gzugs mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mchin ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
97b6('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
97b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma lo spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te
98a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs bdag ces dbye bar spyod
98a2('bum): na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas
98a3('bum): gzugs bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
98a4('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
98a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thubs mi mkhas pas gzugs ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
98a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan mo l-i spyod do//bcom
98a7('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems ngopa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs mi dben zhes bgyi
98b1('bum): bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/thabs mi mkhas
98b2('bum): pas sgra rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//
98b3('bum): thabs ma mkhas pas sgra mi rtog ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
98b4('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas sgra bdo zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
98b5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas sgra sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
98b6('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas sgra bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshon ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
98b7('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas sgra bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te

99a5('bum): zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas

103b7('bum): spyod na mtshan mo la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas rna
104a1('bum): ba'i rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshon ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
104a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan mo la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub

104a5('bum): mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//

104a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas sgo'i rnam par shes po mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang
104b1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas sna'i rnam par shes pa bde zhes dgro bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom
104b2('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas sna'i rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar
104b3('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas sku'i rnam
104b4('bum): par shes pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//
104b5('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas sna'i rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
104b6('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas sku'i rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
104b7('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas sna'i rnam par shes pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal
105a1('bum): te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mo mkhasta bas sna'i rnam par shes pa da na zhes bgyi bar
105a2('bum): spyod na mtshan ma lce spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas sna'i
105a3('bum): rnam par shes pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyad na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
105a4('bum): de'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas lce'i rnam par shes pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshon ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
105a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas lce'i rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang
105a6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas lce'i rnam par shes pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la
105a7('bum): spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpang chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pos lce'i rnam par
105b1('bum): shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshon ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//
105b2('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas lce'i rnam par shes pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
105b3('bum): kyipha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas lce'i rnam par shes pa bdog med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
105b4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas lho'i rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
105b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas lce'i rnam par shes pa mo zhi zhes bgyi
105b6('bum): bubyar spyod ni mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas
105b7('bum): 'i rnam par shes pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod ni mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
106a1('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas lce'i rnam par shes pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do///shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
106a2('bum): pa stong phrag brgya pa//bam po sum cu pa//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs
106a3('bum): mi mkhas pas lus kyi rnam par shes pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
106a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas lus kyi rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan mo la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
106a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas lus kyi rnam par shes pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom
106a6('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas lus kyi rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal
106a7('bum): zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub semos dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs
106b1('bum): ni mkhas pas lus kyi rnam par shes pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
106b2('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas lus kyi rnam par shes pa bdag mod ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
106b3('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas lus kyi rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das
106b4('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas lus kyi rnam par shes po ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na
106b5('bum): mtshan mo la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs myi mkhas pas lus
106b6('bum): kyi rnam par shes pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshon ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshon po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
106b7('bum): pa'i tshe/thabs mi mangs pas lus kyi rnam par shes pa mi dpon zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma lo spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
107a1('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi rnam par shes pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom
107a2('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi rnam par shes pa mo rtag ces bgyi
107a3('bum): bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas yid
107a4('bum): kyi rnam par shes pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
107a5('bum): tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi rnam por shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
107a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi rnam par shes pa bdog ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma lo spyod de//bcom ldan 'das gal te byung
107a7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan
107b1('bum): mu la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi rnam par shes pa
107b2('bum): zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas
107b3('bum): pas yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma zhi zhes dgye bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
107b4('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi rnam por shes pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
107b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
107b6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thangs mi mkhas pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom
107b7('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshon po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi rtog ces bgyi bar
108a1('bum): spyod na mtshon ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs ma/
108a2('bum): mkhas pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
108a3('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
108a4('bum): dpo' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thibs myi mkhas pas mig go 'dus te reg pa bdog ces dkyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom
108a5('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa bdog med ces bgyi
108a6('bum): bar spyod na mtshan mo la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod bye'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas
108a7('bum): mig gi 'dus te reg pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
108b1('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mo mkhas pas myog go 'dus rtog pa mno gas 'phyo bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
108b2('bum): bo shos rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyong pa'i tshe/thab sa mo mkhas pas tshig gi 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
108b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dngo'i chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la stong pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyong na mtshan ma la spyong //
108b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpo' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas d+hU ba'i 'dus te reg pa rtag ces 'gyub
108b5('bum): spyo na mchin ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba'i
108b6('bum): 'dus te reg pa mi rtog ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyad do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
108b7('bum): spyod pa'o tshe/thabs ma mkhas pas rno ba'i 'dus te reg pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan mo la sbyong ngo //bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
109a1('bum): chen po shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
109a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa bdag
109a3('bum): ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshon ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi
109a4('bum): mkhas pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg po dedag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshon ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
109a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa zhi zhes bgye bar spyod na mtshon ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byung
109a6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mI mkhas pa sgo rna ba'i 'dus te rnyog pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshon ma
109a7('bum): la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'o sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas rno ba'i 'dus te
109b1('bum): grub dben zhes dgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dnga' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de'i tshe/thangs/
109b2('bum): mi mkhas pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
109b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas sku'i 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
109b4('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan me la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal
109b5('bum): te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thobs mi mkhas pas sku'i 'dus te reg pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
109b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal zhes ba
109b7('bum): bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas
110a1('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
110a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan mo la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
110a3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom
110a4('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar
110a5('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas
110a6('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa dben zhes dgyi bar spyod na mtshan mo lo spyod de//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshon po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
110a7('bum): le spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshon ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
110b1('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas lce'i 'dus te rog pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshon ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byung //
110b2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom
110b3('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas lce'i 'dus te reg po bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan
110b4('bum): ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa sdug
110b5('bum): bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas
110b6('bum): pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
110b7('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/thangs mi mkhas pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa bdag mod ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma lo spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
111a1('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/thabs mi mkhas pas lho'i 'dus te reg bzhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma lnga spyod do//bcom ldan 'das
111a2('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thangs mi mkhas pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na
111a3('bum): mtshan mo la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas lce'i 'dus
111a4('bum): te reg pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
111a5('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma lo spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
111a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'itshe/thab snga mi mkhas pas lus kyi 'dus te reg po rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma lo spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
111a7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la
111b1('bum): spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa bde
111b2('bum): zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas lus kyi 'dus te/
111b3('bum): reg pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas
111b4('bum): pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
111b5('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa bdag mod ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
111b6('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas lus kyi 'dus te rig pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
111b7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
112a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pa sa lus kyi 'dus te reg pa//
112a2('bum): dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mchen ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi
112a3('bum): mkhas pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
112a4('bum): byiphyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
112a5('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod ni mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang
112a6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
112a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal
112b1('bum): zhes bsgo bar spyod na mtshan ma lnga stong ngo //bcom ldan 'das gal to byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes ra kyi rol tu byon pa la spyod pa'o tshwa/thabs mo mkhas pas yod
112b2('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan me la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
112b3('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi 'dus te daglo pa bdag med rjes dkyi bar spyod na mchen ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
112b4('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshun ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
112b5('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan me la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
112b6('bum): sems dpa' sems dngapa'achen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom
112b7('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar
113a1('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/thabs rma
113a2('bum): mkhas pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
113a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la sbyong ngo //bcom
113a4('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thangs mi mkhas pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
113a5('bum): bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mchen ma la spyong ngo //bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas
113a6('bum): pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshar ba sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
113a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das
113b1('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/zangs mo mkhas pas rnyog go 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bdag med ces
113b2('bum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas
113b3('bum): mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gral te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
113b4('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod ngo //bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
113b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na
113b6('bum): mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gral te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas mig gi 'dus
113b7('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
114a1('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thangs mo mkhas pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te
114a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas rna bo'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces
114a3('bum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas rna
114a4('bum): ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
114a5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas rno ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan
114a6('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas rno ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
114a7('bum): bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//
114b1('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bdag med ces dgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
114b2('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das
114b3('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba'i 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod
114b4('bum): na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg
114b5('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshon ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//
114b6('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
114b7('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal
115a1('bum): te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces
115a2('bum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas sna'i
115a3('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
115a4('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshonA ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
115a5('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
115a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
115a7('bum): tshor ba bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//
115b1('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
115b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshon ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang
115b3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la
115b4('bum): spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
115b5('bum): ba mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshon ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi
115b6('bum): mkhas pas lce'i 'dus te rlog pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
115b7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
116a1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde zhes brgya
116a2('bum): bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas
116a3('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshur ba sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
116a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te
116a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs myi mkhas pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bdag med ces bgyi bar
116a6('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas lce'i
116a7('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
116b1('bum): spyod /thabs smomangs pas lce'i 'dus teg pa sbyin gyis tshor bar ga zhes bgyi bar spyod namatshan ma la spyod ngo do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems da'
116b2('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben zhes dbye bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom
116b3('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/zangs mi mkhas pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi dben
116b4('bum): zhes bgyi bar spyod ni mchin ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas
116b5('bum): pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
116b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thangs mi mkhas pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bgyi b.ro spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal
116b7('bum): tebyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na//
117a1('bum): mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs ni mkhas/
117a2('bum): pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gral te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
117a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das
117a4('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bdag med ces
117a5('bum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas lus
117a6('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhi zhes bgyi bar spyong na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
117a7('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
117b1('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben zhes bgyi bar spong na mtshon ma la spyod do//bcom
117b2('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi dben zhes
117b3('bum): bgyi bar spyod na na chen ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi
117b4('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
117b5('bum): pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor po mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyong na mtshonA ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
117b6('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshoro ba bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das
117b7('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes
118a1('bum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thangs
118a2('bum): mi mkhas pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
118a3('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom
118a4('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhi
118a5('bum): zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas
118a6('bum): pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bya ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
118a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das
118b1('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi dben zhes
118b2('bum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan mA la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas
118b3('bum): sa'i khams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma le spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs
118b4('bum): mi mkhas pas sa'i khams mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
118b5('bum): tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas sa'i khams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
118b6('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas sku'i khams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
118b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas sa'i khams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
119a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas sa'i khams bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang
119a2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas sa'i khams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das
119a3('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas sna'i khams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
119a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas sa'i khams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan
119a5('bum): ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas sa'i khams mi dben zhes
119a6('bum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas chu'i
119a7('bum): khams rtog ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi
119b1('bum): mkhas pas chu'i khams mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dngapa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs
119b2('bum): mi mkhas pas chu'i khams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi
119b3('bum): mkhas pas chu'i khams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs
119b4('bum): mi mkhas pas chu'i khams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs
119b5('bum): mi mkhas pas chu'i khams bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//
119b6('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas chu'i khams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
119b7('bum): tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas chu'i khams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan mo la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
120a1('bum): tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas chu'i khams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
120a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas chu'i khams mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
120a3('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs ma mkhas pas me'i khams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
120a4('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas me'i khams mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
120a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas me'i khams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang
120a6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas me'i khams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom
120a7('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas me'i khams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do///
120b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas me'i khams bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod
120b2('bum): ngodo//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas ngas me'i khams ni zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod
120b3('bum): do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas me'i khams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la
120b4('bum): spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas me'i khams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan
120b5('bum): mo la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas me'i khams mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod
120b6('bum): na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas rlung gi khams
120b7('bum): rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas rlung
121a1('bum): gi khams mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
121a2('bum): pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas rlung gi khams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
121a3('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas rlung gi khams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
121a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas rlung gi khams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
121a5('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas rlung gi khams bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'

126b7('bum): rab tu phyin pa la spyod pa'itshe/thabs mi mkhas pas skye mchid drug mi dben zhes bgyi bar spong na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
127a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas reg pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes/
127a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/brabs mi mkhas pas reg pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
127a3('bum): rob tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas reg pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mchin ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
127a4('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas reg pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
127a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas reg pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
127a6('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas reg pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
127a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas rag bzhi zhes bgyi bar spyod no mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
127b1('bum): tuphyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas reg pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
127b2('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas reg pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//
127b3('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas reg pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi
127b4('bum): mkhas pas tshor ba rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas
127b5('bum): tshor ba mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas
127b6('bum): tshor ba bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas tshor
127b7('bum): ba sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas tshor
128a1('bum): ba bdag ces dgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs ma
128a2('bum): mkhas pas tshor ba bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi
128a3('bum): mkhas pas tshor ba zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas
128a4('bum): pas tshor ba ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas
128a5('bum): pas tshor ba dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi
128a6('bum): mkhas pas tshor ba mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
128a7('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas sred pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs
128b1('bum): mi mkhas pas sre dang mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs ma
128b2('bum): mkhas pas sred pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas
128b3('bum): pas sred pa sdug bsngal zhes dgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi

128b7('bum): mkhas pas sre nga ma zhi zhes dgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs
129a1('bum): mi mkhas pas sred pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
129a2('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas sred pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
129a3('bum): byin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas len pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
129a4('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas len pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
129a5('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas len pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu

129a7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas len pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
129b1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas len pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
129b2('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mangs pas len pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la

129b4('bum): pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas len pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod

130a1('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas srid pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
130a2('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas srid pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
130a3('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas srid pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
130a4('bum): kyipha rol tu phyin po la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas srid pa bdag med cesngo dbyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
130a5('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas sbrid pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
130a6('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyong ba'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas srid pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma lo spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
130a7('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas srid pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
130b1('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas srid pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
130b2('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas skye ba rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
130b3('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas skye ba mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
130b4('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas skye ba bde zhes bgyi bar spyod no mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
130b5('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas skye ba sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
130b6('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas skye ba bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod de//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
130b7('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas skye ba bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
131a1('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thangs mi mkhas pas skye bzhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal to byang chu
131a2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas skye ba ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang
131a3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas skye ba dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te
131a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas skye ba mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das
131a5('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas rga shi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan
131a6('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas rga shi mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom
131a7('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas rga shi bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom
131b1('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas rga shi sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom
131b2('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas rga shing dag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das
131b3('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas rga shi bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te
131b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thangs mi mkhas pas rga shi zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
131b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thangs mi mkhas pas rga shi ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
131b6('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pa sa rga shi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
131b7('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/zangs mi mkhas pas rga shi mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
132a1('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces dgyi bar spyod na mtshan ra spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
132a2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod de//bcom ldan 'das
132a3('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
132a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar
132a5('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
132a6('bum): bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas byas
132a7('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//
132b1('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
132b2('bum): tshe/babs mi mkhas ngas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
132b3('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
132b4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
132b5('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thangs mi mkhas pas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bgyi ngar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
132b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das
132b7('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
133a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug
133a2('bum): bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas tshul
133a3('bum): drims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag ces bkye bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
133a4('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
133a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
133a6('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal
133a7('bum): te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod
133b1('bum): do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar
133b2('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
133b3('bum): brtag ces dgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas bzod
133b4('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs
133b5('bum): mi mkhas pas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
133b6('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
133b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
134a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bdag med ces dgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom
134a2('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pazhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la
134a3('bum): spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skyed pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma zhi zhes bgyi
134a4('bum): pabar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas bzod pa'i pha rol
134a5('bum): tu phyin pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi
134a6('bum): mkhas pas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
134a7('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
134b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
134b2('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal
134b3('bum): te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod
134b4('bum): do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag ces bgyi bar
134b5('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
134b6('bum): bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas
134b7('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe
135a1('bum): thabs mi mangs ngas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma zhi zhes dbri bar spyod na mtshan mA la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dang sems dpa' chen po shes/
135a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
135a3('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan
135a4('bum): 'dis gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na
135a5('bum): mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
135a6('bum): pami rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas
135a7('bum): pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dado zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
135b1('bum): byin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas bsum gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma lnga spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
135b2('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mthusu pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dag ces dgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
135b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom
