135b5('bum): me la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/blangs mi mangs pasabasam gtan rol tu phyin pa ma zhi
135b6('bum): zhes gyi bar spyod na mtshan me la skyed do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'iH/bangs mi mkhas ngos du man
135b7('bum): rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pal spyod pa'i tshe/thabs
136a1('bum): mi mkhas pas bsdam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

140a6('bum): med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas
140a7('bum): pas chen po stong pa nyid zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs
140b1('bum): mi mangs par chen po stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thangs
140b2('bum): mi mkhas pas chen po stong pa nyid dben zhes dgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
140b3('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas chen po stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
140b4('bum): tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas don dam pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
140b5('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas don dam pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
140b6('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas don dam pa stong pa nyid bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
140b7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas don dam pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
141a1('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas don dam pa stong pa nyid bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal
141a2('bum): te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas don dam pa stong pa nyid bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom
141a3('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas don dam pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
141a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas don dam pa stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la
141a5('bum): spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas don dam pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bgyi bar spyod
141a6('bum): na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas don dam pa stong pa nyid mi dben
141a7('bum): zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do////shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa//bam po sum cu gnyis pa//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
141b1('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas 'dus byas stong pa nyid rtag ces dkyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das ga te byang chu sems
141b2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te bya
141b3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mdzes pas 'dus byas stong pa nyid bde zhes ngobye bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das
141b4('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas 'dus byas stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
141b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas 'dus byas stong pa nyid bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod
141b6('bum): do//bcom ldan 'das bral te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas 'dus byas stong pa nyid bdag tshod ces bgyi bar spyo na
141b7('bum): mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mdzes pas 'dus byas stong pa nyid zhi zhes
142a1('bum): par spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thangs mi mkhas pas 'dus byas
142a2('bum): stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas
142a3('bum): pas 'dus byas stong pa nyid dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//
142a4('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
142a5('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
142a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
142a7('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
142b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das
142b2('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas 'dus mi byas stong pa nyid bdag ces dgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan
142b3('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom
142b4('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom
142b5('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes dgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
142b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thangs mi mkhas pas 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la
142b7('bum): spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na
143a1('bum): mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas mtha' las 'das
143a2('bum): pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas mtha'
143a3('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi
143a4('bum): mkhas pas mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
143a5('bum): pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
143a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
143a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das
143b1('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thubs mi mkhas pas mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom
143b2('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thangs mi mkhas pas mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod
143b3('bum): do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thangs mi mkhas pas mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na
143b4('bum): mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi dben
143b5('bum): zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas thog ma dang tha ma
143b6('bum): med pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas
143b7('bum): pas thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
144a1('bum): pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas thog ma dang ngam med pa stong pa nyid bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
144a2('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan
144a3('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan
144a4('bum): mal skyed do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid
144a5('bum): bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas
144a6('bum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
144a7('bum): tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
144b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
144b2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom
144b3('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas dor ba med pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan
144b4('bum): ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bgyi bar
144b5('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bde
144b6('bum): zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas dor ba med pa stong
144b7('bum): pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi
145a1('bum): mkhas ngas dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
145a2('bum): byin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
145a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thubs mi mkhas pas dor ba med pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
145a4('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
145a5('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
145a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das
145a7('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas rang bzhin stong pa nyid rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom
145b1('bum): na 'das gar te byang chub sems dnga'asems drapa' chen po shes rab sde pha rol tu phyin pal spyod pa'i tshe/thangs mi mkhas pas rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi rtag ces dbri bar spyad na mtshan ma la spyod do//
145b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas rang bzhin stong pa nyid bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la
145b3('bum): spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas rang bzhin stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod
145b4('bum): na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas rang bzhin stong pa nyid bdag ces bgyi
145b5('bum): bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas rang bzhin stong pa nyid
145b6('bum): bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas rang
145b7('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas
146a1('bum): pas rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
146a2('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas rang bzhin stong pa nyid dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
146a3('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi dpon zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
146a4('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas chos thams cad stong pa nyid rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
146a5('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal
146a6('bum): te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas chos thams cad stong pa nyid bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
146a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas chos thams cad stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod
146b1('bum): namatshan ma pa spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas chos thams cad stong pa nyid bdag ces bgyi
146b2('bum): bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pasna chos thams cad stong pa nyid bdag
146b3('bum): med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas chos thams cad
146b4('bum): stong pa nyid zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas
146b5('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//
146b6('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas chos thams cad stong pa nyid dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
146b7('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
147a1('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mthus pas rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rtag ces bzhi bar spyod na mtshan ma lnga spyod do//bcom ldan 'das
147a2('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
147a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan
147a4('bum): ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal
147a5('bum): zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs ma mkhas pas rang gi
147a6('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rtsa
147a7('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
147b1('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
147b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
147b3('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
147b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
147b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te/
147b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan
147b7('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
148a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bgyi/
148a2('bum): pabar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid
148a3('bum): bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas mi dmigs
148a4('bum): pa stong pa nyid bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas
148a5('bum): pas mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//
148a6('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
148a7('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
148b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems/
148b2('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas dngos po med pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshon ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
148b3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te
148b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas dngos po med pa stong pa nyid bde zhes brdzi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan
148b5('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas dngos po med pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la
148b6('bum): spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas dngos po med pa stong pa nyid bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na
148b7('bum): mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas dngos po med pa stong pa nyid bdag med
149a1('bum): ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thangs mi mkhas pas dngos
149a2('bum): pomed pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas
149a3('bum): pas dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes dgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
149a4('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
149a5('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
149a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
149a7('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
149b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/babs mi mkhas pas ngo ba nyid stong pa nyid bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang
149b2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan
149b3('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
149b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan
149b5('bum): ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zhi zhes dgyi bar
149b6('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma
149b7('bum): zho zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas ngo bo
150a1('bum): nyid stong pa nyid dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o//
150a2('bum): tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
150a3('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
150a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
150a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan
150a6('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar
150a7('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
150b1('bum): nyid stong pa nyid bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas
150b2('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bdag med ces dgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//
150b3('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
150b4('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

150b6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la
150b7('bum): spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams rtag ces
151a1('bum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas
151a2('bum): dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams mi rtag ces dbyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//
151a3('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
151a4('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
151a5('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
151a6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
151a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams zhi zhes bgyi bar
151b1('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams
151b2('bum): ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas dran pa
151b3('bum): nye bar bzhag pa rnams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs
151b4('bum): mi mkhas pas dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
151b5('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas yang dag par spong ba rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
151b6('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas yang dag par spong ba rnams mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
151b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas yang dag par spong ba rnams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
152a1('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas yang dag par spong ba rnams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
152a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas yang dag par spong ba rnams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na
152a3('bum): mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas yang dag par spong ba rnams
152a4('bum): bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas
152a5('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
152a6('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas yang dag par spong ba rnams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan me lnga spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
152a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas yang dag par spong ba rnams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
152b1('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas yang dag par spong ba rnams mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang
152b2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mchin ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das
152b3('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
152b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma
152b5('bum): la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi
152b6('bum): bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
152b7('bum): bdag ces bgyi bar spyod ni mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas rdzu
153a1('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
153a2('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mangs pas rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
153a3('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs ma mkhas pas rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
153a4('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
153a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das
153a6('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas dbang po rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom
153a7('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas dbang po rnams mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod
153b1('bum): do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas dbang po rnams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
153b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas dbang po rnams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod
153b3('bum): do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas dbang po rnams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la
153b4('bum): spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas dbang po rnams bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod
153b5('bum): na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas dbang po rnams zhi zhes bgyi
153b6('bum): bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas dbang po rnams
153b7('bum): ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas
154a1('bum): dbang po rnams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
154a2('bum): thabs mi mkhas ngas dbang po rnams mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
154a3('bum): pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas stobs rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
154a4('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas stobs rnams mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
154a5('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas stobs rnams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
154a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas stobs rnams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
154a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas stobs rnams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshon ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
154b1('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu smin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thungs mi mkhas pas stobs rnams bdag med ces brtsi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
154b2('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mdzekhas pas stobs rnams zhi zhes brtsi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
154b3('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas stobs rnams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
154b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pa rlo tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas stobs rnams dben zhes dgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
154b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mthus ngas stongs rnams mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
154b6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rangab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thungs mi mkhas dris byang chub kyi yan lag rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mi chen ma la spyod de//bcom ldan 'das gal
154b7('bum): dbyang chub sems dpa' sems da 'a chen po shes rab gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mangs pas byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom
155a1('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod
155a2('bum): na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sdug bsngal
155a3('bum): zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas byang chub kyi yan
155a4('bum): lag rnams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas
155a5('bum): pas byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
155a6('bum): pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas byang chub kyi yan lag rnams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
155a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
155b1('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
155b2('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang
155b3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs ma mkhas pas 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom
155b4('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na
155b5('bum): mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
155b6('bum): pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas 'phags
155b7('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
156a1('bum): che/thabs mi mkhas pas 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
156a2('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das
156a3('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma
156a4('bum): la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
156a5('bum): mi zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas
156a6('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
156a7('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do////shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa//
156b1('bum): bam po so gsum pa//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams rtag
156b2('bum): ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas 'phags pa'i bden pa
156b3('bum): rnams mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas
156b4('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//
156b5('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
156b6('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
156b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
157a1('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom
157a2('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan
157a3('bum): ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dben
157a4('bum): zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas 'phags
157a5('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
157a6('bum): tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas bsam gtan rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
157a7('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas bsam gtan rnams mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
157b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas bsam gtan rnams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
157b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas bsam gtan rnams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
157b3('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas bsam gtan rnams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
157b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thangs mi mkhas pas bsam gtan rnams bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
157b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas bsam gtan rnams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang
157b6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas bsam gtan rnams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal
157b7('bum): te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas bsam gtan rnams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan
158a1('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas bsam gtan rnams mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan
158a2('bum): ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas tshad med pa rnams rtag ces bgyi bar
158a3('bum): spyod na mtshan ma spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas tshad med pa rnams mi rtag ces
158a4('bum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas tshad med pa rnams
158a5('bum): bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas tshad med pa
158a6('bum): rnams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod nA mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas
158a7('bum): pas tshad med pa rnams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
158b1('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas tshad med pa rnams bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyad do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o/
158b2('bum): tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas tshad med pa rnams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po la
158b3('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/rlabs mi mkhas pas tshad med pa rnams ma ni zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
158b4('bum): byophyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thubs mi mkhas pas tshad med pa rnams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
158b5('bum): pa rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas tshad med pa rnams mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
158b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
158b7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
159a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
159a2('bum): rnams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas
159a3('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
159a4('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
159a5('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
159a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams zhi zhes
159a7('bum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'atshon po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs med
159b1('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/babs
159b2('bum): mi mkhas pas gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dben zhes dgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
