159b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par thar pa rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
159b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par thar pa rnams mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das
159b6('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par thar pa rnams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
159b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par thar pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na
160a1('bum): mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par thar pa
160a2('bum): rnams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas
160a3('bum): pas rnam par thar pa rnams bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
160a4('bum): tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par thar pa rnams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
160a5('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par thar pa rnams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
160a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par thar pa rnams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
160a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par thar pa rnams mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das
160b1('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thangs mi mkhas pas mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan
160b2('bum): ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
160b3('bum): pa dgu mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas
160b4('bum): mthur gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
160b5('bum): pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
160b6('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das
160b7('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs ma mkhas pas mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bdag med ces bgyi bar
161a1('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das dal te drang chung sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas mthar gyis
161a2('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
161a3('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dbu mi zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
161a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
161a5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma
161a6('bum): la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
161a7('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
161b1('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par bar pa'i sgra stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
161b2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa bde zhes bgyi bar
161b3('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa
161b4('bum): nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
161b5('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das
161b6('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa
161b7('bum): bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas rnam
162a1('bum): par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med bzhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
162a2('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan
162a3('bum): ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan
162a4('bum): ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//
162a5('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
162a6('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas mngon par shes pa rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
162a7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas mngon par shes pa rnams mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan
162b1('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas mngon par shes pa rnams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom
162b2('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas mngon par shes pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
162b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas mngon par shes pa rnams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod
162b4('bum): do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas mngon par shes pa rnams bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan
162b5('bum): ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas mngon par shes pa rnams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na
162b6('bum): mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas mngon par shes pa rnams ma zhi zhes
162b7('bum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas mngon par shes pa
163a1('bum): rnams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
163a2('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas mngon par shes pa rnams ma dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
163a3('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas ting nge 'dzin rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod no mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
163a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas ting nge 'dzin rnams mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshon ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
163a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas ting nge 'dzin rnams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
163a6('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas ting nge 'dzin rnams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
163a7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas ting nge 'dzin rnams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das
163b1('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thangs mi mkhas ngas ting nge 'dzin rnams bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
163b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs ma mkhas pas ting nge 'dzin rnams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshon ma la
163b3('bum): spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thangs mi mkhas pas ting nge 'dzin rnams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na
163b4('bum): mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas ting nge 'dzin rnams dben zhes
163b5('bum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas ting nge 'dzin rnams
163b6('bum): mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas gzungs
163b7('bum): kyi sgo rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas
164a1('bum): pas gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
164a2('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas gzungs kyi sgo rnams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
164a3('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas gzungs kyi sgo rnams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
164a4('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas gzungs kyi sgo rnams bdog ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
164a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas gzungs kyi sgo rnams bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das
164a6('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas gzungs kyi sgo rnams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom
164a7('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma zho zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la
165a1('bum): babs mi mkhas pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bdag rjes pa kyi b+har spyod namatshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gapa te byang chub sems dpa' sems dang
165a2('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang
165a3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom
165a4('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan
165a5('bum): ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pos de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
165a6('bum): dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas
165a7('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
165b1('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/zangs ni mkhasra pas mi 'jigs pa rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi rol tu
165b2('bum): byin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thubs mi mkhas pas mi 'jigs pa rnams mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshon ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
165b3('bum): papha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas mi 'jigs pa rnams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan mo la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
165b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thubs mi mkhas pas mi 'jigs pa rnams sdug bsngal nas bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
165b5('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas mi 'jigs pa rnams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
165b6('bum): da' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lnga spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas mi 'jigs pa rnams bdag nod ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
165b7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas mi 'jigs pa rnams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal
166a1('bum): te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas mi 'jigs pa rnams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la skye
166a2('bum): do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas mi 'jigs pa rnams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod
166a3('bum): namatshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas mi 'jigs pa rnams mo
166a4('bum): dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas
166a5('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
166a6('bum): pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
166a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
166b1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom
166b2('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan
166b3('bum): ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bdag
166b4('bum): med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas so so/
166b5('bum): yang dag par rig pa rnams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi
166b6('bum): mkhas pas so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
166b7('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
167a1('bum): chen pa shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa 'a spyod pa'itshe/thabs mi mkhas pas so so yang dag pang rig pa rnams 'i dngos nas kyi spyod na mtshad ma la spyod do//bcom ldan
167a2('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thangs mi mkhas pas snying rje chen po rtag ces dkyi bor spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan
167a3('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas snying rje chen po mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan
167a4('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas snying rje chen po bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma lo spyod do//bcom
167a5('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas snying rje chen po sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod
167a6('bum): do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas snying rje chen po bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma
167a7('bum): la stod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas snying rje chen po bdag med ces bgyi bar
167b1('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas snying rje chen po zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod
167b2('bum): na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas snying rje chen po ma zhi zhes bgyi bar
167b3('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas snying rje chen po dben zhes bgyi
167b4('bum): bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas snying rje chen po mi dben zhes
167b5('bum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
167b6('bum): 'dres pa bco brgyad rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas
167b7('bum): pas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
168a1('bum): nga'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyad do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
168a2('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan mo la spyod do//bcom ldan
168a3('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na
168a4('bum): mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
168a5('bum): bco brgyad bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs
168a6('bum): mi mkhas pas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
168a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ma zhe zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
168b1('bum): da'angs gas nam du na pa du la/ ni mangs bsas su rgyas kyichos su 'dres pa bca da ben nas kying rgyud na mtshan ma la spyad //maldan
168b2('bum): 'ad ga te byang chub sems dpa' thams na dzin pa na tu phyin pa la snad pa'i \u0f7f/bdas sbyi ma khas ngas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcibargyad mi dben nas bkyi bar spyodan
168b3('bum): mtshan ma la spyod de/sar gyi rol tu phyin pa stong zag po rgya ba//rim po sum num bzhi pa//bcom ldan 'das phral te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa
168b4('bum): kyi pha ral tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/'di snyam du bdag ni shes rang gyi rab tu phyin pa la spyad do zhes gyi bar spyod na/dmigs pa'i spyod pa ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni mtsha
168b5('bum): ma la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di snyam du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
168b6('bum): bsgom mo zhes bgyi bar cu na'ang mtshan ma nyid la spyod pa ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs mi mkhas par rig par bgyi'o//de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i dus
168b7('bum): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so//tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs mi mkhas pa ji ltar rig par bya ba yin/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/
169a1('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa tI'i bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/gzugs la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlol
169a2('bum): na/de gzugs la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/de ni skye ba dang /rga ba dang /na ba dang /'chi ba dang /mya ngan dang /smre sngags 'don
169a3('bum): pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde ba dang /'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do//gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
169a4('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/tshor ba la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/de tshor ba la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba
169a5('bum): la spyod de/de ni skye ba dang /rga ba dang /na ba dang /'chi ba dang /mya ngan dang /smre sngags 'don pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde ba dang /'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/sdug
169a6('bum): bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do//gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/'du shes la mos shing 'du shes te byin
169a7('bum): gyis rlob na/de 'du shes la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/'du shes mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/de ni skye ba dang /rga ba dang /na ba dang /'chi ba dang /mya ngan dang /smre sngags

195a1('bum): mi dananA zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang /rna ba'i khams la mi spyodade/na da'i khams kyi mtshan ma la ma spyad cing /rna ba'i khams rtag ces bya bar mAM stod/rna ba'i khams mi rtag
195a2('bum): ces bya bar mi spyod/rna ba'i khams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/rna ba'i khams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/rna ba'i khams bdag ces bya bar ma spyod/rna ba'i khams bdag med ces bya bar
195a3('bum): mi spyod/rna ba'i khams zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/rna ba'i khams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/rna ba'i khams stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/rna ba'i khams mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/rna ba'i

195b3('bum): mi spyod cing /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod//

195b7('bum): sgyid/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dben ne bya
196a1('bum): bar mi spyod/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang /sna'i khams la mi spyod de/sna'i khams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing /sna'i khams

208a4('bum): smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/phyi nang stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/phyi nang stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/phyi nang stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang /stong
208a5('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid la mi spyod do//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/stong pa nyid

208a7('bum): spyod/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid zho zhes bya bar mi spyod/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi stong zhes bya bar

208b7('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid la mi spyod do/don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma li mi spyod cing /don dam pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/don dam pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/don dam

214b3('bum): bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mi zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/rdzu 'phrul gyi
214b4('bum): rkang pa rnams stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mtshan ma med
214b5('bum): ces bya bar mi spyod/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/
214b6('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang /dbang po rnams la mi spyod de/dbang po rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing /dbang po rnams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/dbang po rnams mi/
214b7('bum): rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/dbang po rnams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/dbang po rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/dbang po rnams bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/dbang po rnams bdag med ces bya bar mi
215a1('bum): spyod/dbang po rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/dbang po rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/dbang po rnams stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/dbang po rnams mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/dang
215a2('bum): po rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/dbang po rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/dbang po rnams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/dbang po rnams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod//
215a3('bum): dbang po rnams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/dbang po rnams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang /stobs rnams la mi spyod de/stobs rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing /stobs rnams rtag ces
215a4('bum): bya bar mi spyod/stobs rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/stobs rnams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/stobs rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/stobs rnams bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/
215a5('bum): stobs rnams bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/stobs rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/stobs rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/stobs rnams stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/stobs rnams mi
215a6('bum): stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/stobs rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/stobs rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/stobs rnams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/stobs
215a7('bum): rnams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/stobs rnams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/stobs rnams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la mi spyod de/byang
215b1('bum): chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/byang chub kyi yan 'bru rnams bde zhes bya
215b2('bum): bar mi spyod/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/byang chub kyi
215b3('bum): yan lag rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/
215b4('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/byang chub kyi

215b6('bum): brgyad pa la mi spyod de/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i mtshan ma la mi spyod cing /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi
215b7('bum): rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
216a1('bum): pa bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/'jigs pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pazhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/'phags pa'i lam
216a2('bum): yan lag brgyad pa ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/'phags pa'i lham
216a3('bum): yan lag brgyad pa mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa smon pa yod ces bya bar mi

216a5('bum): bar mi spyod pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la mi spyod de/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/'phags pa'i bden
216a6('bum): pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/'phags pa'i dod na pa rnams bdag ces
216a7('bum): bya nga me spyod/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/'phags
216b1('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mtshan
216b2('bum): ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dben zhes bya bar
216b3('bum): mi spyod/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang /bsam gtan rnams la mi spyod de/bsam gtan rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing /bsam gtan rnams rtag ces bya
216b4('bum): bar mi spyod/bsam gtan rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/bsam gtan rnams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/bsam gtan rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/bsam gtan rnams bdag ces

217a1('bum): tshad med pa rnams la mi spyod de/tshad med pa rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing /tshad med pa rnams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/tshad med pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod//

217b6('bum): thar pa rnams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/rnam par thar pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/rnam par thar pa rnams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/rnam par thar pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/

218a1('bum): rnam par thar pa rnams stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/rnam par thar pa rnams mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/rnam par thar pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/rnam par thar pa

218a3('bum): spyod/rnam par thar pa rnams mi dpon zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mi spyod de/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi mtshan ma

218b1('bum): pa rnams mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar

218b3('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med
218b4('bum): pa dang /smon pa med pa rnams la mi spyod de/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i mtshan ma la mi spyod cing /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan
218b5('bum): ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
218b6('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/rnam par thar pa'i sgo
218b7('bum): stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/rnam
219a1('bum): par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa ma

219a3('bum): pa med pa mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
219a4('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/rnam par
219a5('bum): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dben zhes bya
219a6('bum): pabar mi spyod/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /sngon du med pa mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams la mi spyod de/mngon par shes pa
219a7('bum): rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing /mngon par shes pa rnams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/mngon par shes pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/mngon par shes pa rnams bde zhes bya bar

219b2('bum): pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/mngon par shes pa rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/mngon par shes pa rnams stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/mngon par shes pa rnams mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/

219b5('bum): mi spyod de/ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing /ting nge 'dzin rnams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ting nge 'dzin rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ting nge 'dzin rnams bde zhes bya bar mi
219b6('bum): spyod/ting nge 'dzin rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ting nge 'dzin rnams bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ting nge 'dzin rnams bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ting nge 'dzin rnams zhi zhes bya
219b7('bum): bar mi spyod/ting nge 'dzin rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ting nge 'dzin rnams stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ting nge 'dzin rnams mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ting nge 'dzin rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi
220a1('bum): spyod/ting nge 'dzin rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ting nge 'dzin rnams smon pa 'od ces bya bar mi spyod/ting nge 'dzin rnams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ting
220a2('bum): 'dzin rnams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ting nge 'dzin rnams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mi spyod de/gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing /gzungs kyi
220a3('bum): sgo rnams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/gzungs kyi sgo rnams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/gzungs kyi sgo rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/gzungs kyi

220a5('bum): kyi sgo rnams stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/gzungs kyi sgo rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/gzungs kyi sgo rnams mtshan mo med ces bya
220a6('bum): bar mi spyod/gzungs kyi sgo rnams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/gzungs kyi sgo rnams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/gzungs kyi sgo rnams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/gzungs kyi sgo
220a7('bum): rnams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la mi spyod de/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing /de bzhin gshegs
220b1('bum): pa'i stobs rnams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stongs rnams mi rtag ces bya bar ma spyod/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dade zhes bya dang mi spyod/de bzhin gshegs par
220b2('bum): stobs rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar re spyod/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stongs rnams bdag ces bya dwa ra li spyod/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/de bzhin
220b3('bum): gshegs pa'i stong sa rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/
220b4('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mtshan

220b6('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams la mi spyod de/mi 'jigs
220b7('bum): pa rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing /mi 'jigs po rnams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/mi 'jigs pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/mi 'jigs pa rnams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod//
221a1('bum): mi 'jigs pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/mi 'jigs pa rnams bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/mi 'jigs pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/mi 'jigs pa
221a2('bum): rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/mi 'jigs pa rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/mi 'jigs pa rnams stong zhes bya bar mi spyong /mi 'jigs pa rnams mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/mi 'jigs pa rnams
221a3('bum): mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/mi 'jigs pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/mi 'jigs pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/mi 'jigs pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod//
221a4('bum): mi 'jigs pa rnams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/mi 'jigs pa rnams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la mi spyod de/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi mtshan
221a5('bum): ma la mi spyod cing /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod
221a6('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/so
221a7('bum): so yang dag par rig pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/so so yang dag par
221b1('bum): rig pa rnams mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/so so yang dag par rig pa
221b2('bum): rnams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mi
221b3('bum): dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang /snying rje chen po la mi spyod de/snying rje chen po'i mtshan ma la mi spyod cing /snying rje chen po rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/snying rje chen po mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/snying rje chen po
221b4('bum): bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/snying rje chen po sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/snying rje chen po bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/snying rje chen po bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/snying rje chen po zho zhes bya bar mi spyod/
221b5('bum): snying rje chen po ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/snying rje chen po stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/snying rje chen po mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/snying rje chen po mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/snying rje chen po
221b6('bum): mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/snying rje chen po smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/snying rje chen po smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/snying rje chen po dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/snying rje chen po mi dben zhes
221b7('bum): bya bar mi spyod pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mi spyod de/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rtag ces
222a1('bum): bya bar mi spyod/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
222a2('bum): bco brgyad sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/sangs rgyas
222a3('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/sangs
222a4('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mtshan ma med ces
222a5('bum): bya bar mi spyod/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
222a6('bum): bco brgyad dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa de'i tshe/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs mkhas par shes
222a7('bum): par bya'o///shes rad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa//bam po sum cu rtsa bdun pa//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang
222b1('bum): sbyin pa de'ang gzugs ma yin/stong pa nyid las gud na'ang gzugs med/gzugs las gu na'ang skyong ba nyid med de/nga ba nyid kyang gzugs/gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang
222b2('bum): phrin pa de'ang tshor ba ma yin/stong pa nyid las bud na 'a' tsha rang med/tshor ba las gud na 'di stong pa nyid med de/stong pa nyid kying tshor ba/tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//'du shes kyi stong pa nyid ga
222b3('bum): na pa de'ang 'du shes mayin/stong pa nyid las gud na'ang 'du shes med/'du shes las bud na'ang stong pa nyid mod de/stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes/'du shes nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//'du byed kyi stong
222b4('bum): pa nyid blang yin pa de nga 'du byed ma yin/stong pa rjid las grang na'ang 'du byed med/'du byed lam zud na dzi stong pa nyid med/stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed/'du byed nyid kyang stong pa nyid de//rnam par gas
222b5('bum): stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rnam par shes pa ma chi ma stong pa nyid 'as gud na rnam po shes pa med/rnam pa shes pa lngas tha~Md dang snang pa nyid med de/stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa/rnam pa
222b6('bum): sa pa rji nga stong ba nyid do//mi gi stong pa nyid dang yid pa de rang mig ma yin/stong pa nyid las gud na nga mig med/mig las gung tha~Mng stong pa nyid med de/stong pa nyid kyang mig/min nyid kya skyo
222b7('bum): banyid do//rna ba'i stong pa nyid gang yin pade'ang rnab ma yin/stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rna ba med/rna ba las gung na'ang stong pa nyid med de/stong pa nyid kyang rna ba/rna ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//sna'i stong pa
223a1('bum): nyid gang yin pa de'ang sna ma yin/stong pa nyid las gud na'ang sna med/sna las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/stong pa nyid kyang sna/sna nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//kye'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa/
223a2('bum): de'ang lce ma yin/stong pa nyid las gud na'ang lce med/lce las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/stong pa nyid kyang lce/lce nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//lus kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang lus ma yin/stong pa
223a3('bum): nyid las gud na'ang lus med/lus las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/stong pa nyid kyang lus/lus nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//yid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang yid ma yin/stong pa nyid las gud na'ang
223a4('bum): yid med/yid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/stong pa nyid kyang yid/yid nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang gzugs ma yin/stong pa nyid las gud na'ang gzugs

223a6('bum): las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/stong pa nyid kyang sgra/sgra nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//dri'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang dri ma yin/stong pa nyid las gud na'ang dri med/dri las bud na'ang stong pa nyid
223a7('bum): med de/stong pa nyid kyang dri/dri nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//ro'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang ro ma yin/stong pa nyid las gud na'ang ro med/ro las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/stong pa nyid kyang ro//
223b1('bum): ro nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//reg gi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang reg ma yin/stong pa nyid las gud na'ang reg med/rog las gung na'ang stong pa nyid med de/stong pa nyid kyang rig/reg nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//chas/
223b2('bum): kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang chos ma yin/stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos med /chos las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/stong pa nyid kyang chos/chos nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//mig gi khams kyi stong pa
223b3('bum): /nyid gang yin pa de'ang mig gi khams ma yin/stong pa nyid las gud na'ang mig gi khams med/mig gi khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/stong pa nyid kyang mig gi khams/mig gi khams nyid kyang
223b4('bum): stong pa nyid do//gzugs kyi khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang gzugs kyi khams ma yin/stong pa nyid las gu na'ang gzugs kyi khams med/gzugs kyi khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/

223b6('bum): las gud na'ang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams med/mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/stong pa nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams/mig gi rnam par shes
223b7('bum): pa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//rna ba'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rna ba'i khams ma yin/stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rna ba'i khams med/rna ba'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/

224a6('bum): dri'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/stong pa nyid kyang dri'i khams/dri'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang sna'i rnam par shes pa'i
224a7('bum): khams ma yin/stong pa nyid las gud na'ang sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams med/sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/stong pa nyid kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams/
224b1('bum): rnam pa gas pal /ma tu /smra ma sa so/ sa rgyu yod/lo tsun /
224b2('bum): med de/stong pa nyid krung lha'i khams/lha'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//ri'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang nga'i khams ma yin/stong pa nyid las gung na 'dra ri'i khams med/ro'i khams

224b4('bum): hrIn stong pa nyid las gung na ltang 'i rnam par shes pa mas myed/lha'i rnam par shes pa'i khangs las zung na'ang snang pa nyid med /stong pa nyid bang rje'i rnam par shes pa'i khams/lce'i rnam par
224b5('bum): shes pa'i khams nyid byang snang shing //rdzas kyi ma gyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de Ubi khams pa 'i na/stong pa nyid las sung ma bu po khams med/lus kyi khams las gud na nga da
224b6('bum): nyid med de/stong pa nyid kyang chus kyi khams/lus kyi khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//reg gi khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de' reg gi khams ma yin/stong ba nyid las gung na'ang dag gi khams me
224b7('bum): gi khams las grang 'ang byung pa nyid med de/snang pa nyid nga dag gi khams rigag 'angs nyid pang snang pa nyid //ru nam tshogs pa la lams kyi nyid gang yin pa de lus kyi rnam pags
225a1('bum): /pa'i khams ma yin/stong pa nyid las gung na 'ang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams med/lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i kham sal sa gud na'ang stong pa nyid med/stong pa nyid kyang

225a7('bum): bde'ang sa'i khams ma yin/stong pa nyid las gud na'ang sa'i khams med/sa'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/stong pa nyid kyang si'i khams sa'i khams nyid kya stong pa nyid do//chu'i khams kyi
225b1('bum): sto pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang chu'i khrims ma yin/stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chu'i khams med/chu'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/stong pa nyid kyang chu'i khams/chu'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid

225b6('bum): khams ma yin/stong pa nyid las bud na 'dra rnam par shes pa'i khams med/rnam par shes pa'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid me dang /stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams/rnam par shes pa'i

226a1('bum): ma rig pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//'du byed kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang 'du byed ma yin/stong pa nyid las gud na'ang 'du byed med/'du byed las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/stong/

226a6('bum): kyang stong pa nyid do//reg pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang reg pa ma yin/stong pa nyid las gud na'ang reg pa med/reg pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/stong pa nyid kyang reg pa/reg pa nyid
226a7('bum): kyang stong pa nyid do//tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang tshor ba ma yin/stong pa nyid las gud na'ang tshor ba med/tshor ba las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba/tshor ba nyid

226b6('bum): nyid gang yin pa de'ang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/stong pa nyid las gud na'ang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/stong pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i
226b7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/stong pa nyid las gud na'ang tshul

227a2('bum): phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/stong pa nyid las gud na'ang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med/brjod

227a5('bum): de/stong pa nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang bsam gtan gyi
227a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa ma yin/stong pa nyid las gud na'ang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa med/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/stong pa nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha
227a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/stong pa nyid las gung
227b1('bum): na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//
227b2('bum): nang stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang nang stong pa nyid ma yin/stong pa nyid las gud na'ang nang stong pa nyid med/nang stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/stong pa nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid//
227b3('bum): nang stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//phyi stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang phyi stong pa nyid ma yin/stong pa nyid las gud na'ang phyi stong pa nyid med/phyi stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med
227b4('bum): de/stong pa nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid/phyi stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin/stong pa nyid las gud na'ang phyi nang stong pa nyid med/phyi/
227b5('bum): nang stong pa nyid las bud na'ang stong pa nyid med do//stong pa nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid/phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang stong pa nyid ma yin//
227b6('bum): stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid med/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//chen
227b7('bum): po stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang chen po stong pa nyid ma yin/stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chen po stong pa nyid med/chen po stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/stong pa nyid kyang chen
228a1('bum): rmang nya ldan gastang pa nyid shA//dan d+ha chu na med padang dan dun su nga pa na/stong pa nyid las gung sa dadon dam
228a2('bum): stong pa nyid med/don dam pa stong pa nyid lngas su n+ya rang stong pa nyid med de/stong pa nyid ba drin dam pa stong pa nyid/don dum po stong pa nyid kyang rnying gyid de//dus skyes stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid
228a3('bum): gling yin pa de nga 'dus nas stong nyid pa 'in/pa nyid ma dung sa 'd-i byu med/'dus rgyas rlung nyid seM mdun pa sbyang brjid med de/stong nyid tsang chus rgyas
228a4('bum): nyid/'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid de//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang 'dzus ma gyis stong pa nyid ma yin/stong pa nyid las gud na 'ang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid me
228a5('bum): 'du ma byas stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/stong nga nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid
228a6('bum): gang yin pa de'ang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma yin/stong pa nyid las gud na'ang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid med /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de//
228a7('bum): stong pa nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid/mtha' sa 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//thon mi dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de 'ang thog mi dang thom med
228b1('bum): stong pa nyid ma yin/stong pa nyid las bud na'ang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid med/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/stong pa nyid kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa
228b2('bum): stong pa nyid/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//drong ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ma yin/stong pa nyid las gud na'ang dor ba
228b3('bum): med pa stong pa nyid med/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/stong pa nyid kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi
228b4('bum): stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma yin/stong pa nyid las gud nArang rang bzhin stong pa nyid med/rang bzhin stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid mod de/stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin
228b5('bum): stong pa nyid/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma yin/stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos thams
228b6('bum): cad stong pa nyid med/chos thams cad stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid mod de/stong pa nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid/chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//rang gi mtshan
228b7('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma yin/stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid med/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong
229a1('bum): pa nyid med de/stong pa nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang
229a2('bum): mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ma yin/stong pa nyid las bud na'ang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid med/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs pa
229a3('bum): stong pa nyid/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ma yin/stong pa nyid las gud na'ang dngos
229a4('bum): po med pa stong pa nyid med/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//ngo
229a5('bum): bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin/stong pa nyid las gud na'ang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/
229a6('bum): stong pa nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
229a7('bum): ma yin/stong pa nyid las gud na'ang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las bud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med
229b1('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ma yin/stong pa nyid
229b2('bum): las gud na'ang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams med/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/stong pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa nyid kyang stong
229b3('bum): pa nyid do//yang dag par spong ba bzhi'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang yang dag par spong ba rnams ma yin/stong pa nyid las gud na'ang yang dag par spong ba rnams med/yang dag par spong ba rnams
229b4('bum): las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/stong pa nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba/yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
229b5('bum): rnams ma yin/stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams med/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/stong pa nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid
229b6('bum): kyang stong pa nyid do//dbang po lnga'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang dbang po rnams ma yin/stong pa nyid las gud na'ang dbang po rnams med/dbang po rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/stong pa
229b7('bum): nyid kyang dbang po/dbang po nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stobs lnga'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang stobs rnams ma yin/stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stobs rnams med/stobs rnams las gud na'ang
230a1('bum): stong pa nyid med de/stong pa nyid kyang stobs/stobs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma yin/
230a2('bum): stong pa nyid lasaM gud na'ang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams med/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/stong pa nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag/byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang
230a3('bum): stong pa nyid do//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin/stong pa nyid las gud na'ang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
230a4('bum): brgyad pa med/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/stong pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang
230a5('bum): stong pa nyid do//'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma yin/stong pa nyid las gud na'ang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams med/'phags pa'i
230a6('bum): bden pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med do/stong pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa/'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//bsam gtan rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang
230a7('bum): babasam gtan rnams ma yin/stong pa nyid las gud na'ang bsam gtan rnams med/bsam gtan rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/stong pa nyid kyang bsam gtan/bsam gtan
230b1('bum): nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//tshad med pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang tshad med pa rnams ma yin/stong pa nyid las gud na'ang tshad med pa rnams med/tshad med pa rnams las gud narang stong pa nyid mud
230b2('bum): de/stong pa nyid kyang tshad med pa/tshad med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin/
230b3('bum): stong pa nyid las gud na'ang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams med/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams lngas gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/stong pa nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i
230b4('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rnam par thar pa ma yin/stong pa nyid las gud na'ang
230b5('bum): rnam par thar pa med/rnam par thar pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med do/stong pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa/rnam par thar pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
230b6('bum): pa dgu'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin/stong pa nyid las gud na'ang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams med/mthar gyis
230b7('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/stong pa nyid kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams nyid
231a1('bum): kyang stong pa nyid do//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de rang rnam par thar pa'i sgra stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma
231a2('bum): med pa dang /smon pa med pa ma yin/stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma mod pa dang /smon pa med pa med/rnam par zar po'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
231a3('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/stong pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa/rnam par thar pa'i
231a4('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//mngon par shes pa drug gi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang mngon par shes pa rnams ma yin/stong pa nyid
231a5('bum): las gud na'ang mngon par shes pa rnams med/mngon par shes pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/stong pa nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams/mngon par shes pa rnams nyid kyang
231a6('bum): stong pa nyid do//ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang ting nge 'dzin rnams ma yin/stong pa nyid las bud na'ang ting nge 'dzin rnams med/ting nge 'dzin rnams las gud na'ang
231a7('bum): stong pa nyid med de/stong pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams/ting nge 'dzin rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma yin/
231b1('bum): stong pa nyid las gud na'ang gzungs kyi sgo rnams med/gzungs kyi sgo rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/stong pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams/gzungs kyi sgo rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//
231b2('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma yin/stong pa nyid las gud na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams med/de bzhin
231b3('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//mi 'jigs pa
231b4('bum): bzhi'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang mi 'jigs pa rnams ma yin/stong pa nyid las gud na'ang mi 'jigs pa rnams med/mi 'jigs pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/stong pa nyid kyang ///
231b5('bum): mi 'jigs pa/mi 'jigs pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma yin/stong pa nyid las bud na'ang so
231b6('bum): so yang dag par rig pa rnams med/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/stong pa nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa/so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang stong pa
231b7('bum): nyid do//byams pa chen po'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang byams pa chen po ma yin/stong pa nyid las gud na'ang byams pa chen po med/byams pa chen po las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de
232a1('bum): nga na dang smras padzin pa/rgyas rdzun gyi byung nang / da khyod du spyod da ca du ston 'ang da las dung/
232a2('bum): rlung ni chen du med/snying rje chen pa ltas rba na nga stospyong pa nyid med de/stong brnyed pa'i snying rje chen ga shi rje rje pa nyid kyang rlung byed do//sa rlos pa rnas pa
232a3('bum): kyin pa sted ga pa'i na pa de ngas sa rgya kyi sa ma sa rnams ma yin/stong pa nyid sa phung na ngas sa rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres dngas me/sa sa d+d+ha gyen sum mung ma ma
232a4('bum): grad nga nang pa nyid med de/snod kyi ngas su rgyas kyi chos ma dzem pa/sas rnaMs kyi chos me nges pa nyid du byung ba nyid dang //bams bya sa pa rji kyi byung banyid dgang yin pa
232a5('bum): bamam ca zhes pa nyid masmin/nga nyid pas kyang nga thams cang skyes pa nyid med/thams cad shes pa nyid sa gung nga sto nyid myed de/
232a6('bum): stsu gis da/ rnas pa shes rdzog pa byed kyang yin pa sa rnaM ma shes pa nyid pa yin/snod g+h+ri ya nga phrus
232a7('bum): /sakhyenapa shis kyid sa 'du chu kyi / pa sa nas shes kyad/ ga byed /
232b1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin/stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gud
232b2('bum): na'ang stong pa nyid med de/stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
232b3('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni thabs mkhas par shes par bya'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
232b4('bum): phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i skal ba yod do//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
232b5('bum): pa la spyod kyang spyod do zhes bya bar mi dmigs so//mi spyod do zhes bya bar mi dmigs so//spyod kyang spyod la/mi spyod kyang mi spyod ces bya bar mi dmigs so//spyod pa'ang ma yin/mi spyod pa'ang
232b6('bum): ma yin zhes bya bar mi dmigs so//shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
232b7('bum): tshe/spyod ces bya bar yang mi dmigs/mi spyod ces bya bar yang mi dmigs/spyod kyang spyod la/mi spyod kyang mi spyod ces bya bar yang mi dmigs/spyod pa'ang ma yin/mi spyod pa'ang mi yin zhes
233a1('bum): bya bar yang mi dmigs pa 'in/rab byor gyis smras pa tshe dang ldan pa shA ra ci'i bu/de ni 'di ltar shes rab gyi la 'dren pa rang zhan mo dngags pa'i byo /du/
233a2('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin te/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
233a3('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/spyod do zhes bya bar yang mi dmigs so//mi spyod do zhes bya bar yang mi dmigs so//spyod kyang spyod la/mi spyod kyang mi spyod do zhes bya bar yang mi dmigs so//
233a4('bum): spyod pa'ang ma yin/mi spyod pa'ang ma yin na zhes bya bar yang mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar des chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin du khong du chud de mablangs pa'i
233a5('bum): //gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/sems zhum pa med cing yongs su zhum pa med de/mi 'jigs ma dang /skrag pa
233a6('bum): mi 'gyur na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nye bar gyur par shes par bya'o//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
233a7('bum): pa de 'i chos thams cad darnam pa med pa'i ji nyid kyi phyir/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med pa ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin chos thangs
233b1('bum): cad skye ba med pa zhes bya ba ste/rgya che ba/mchog tu bya ba/tshad med par nges pa/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi 'drogs pa ste/ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub
233b2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o//smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin 'di 'ba' zhig gis rnam par spyod
233b3('bum): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'am/'on tam de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gzhan dag kyang yod/rab 'byor
233b4('bum): gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ting nge 'dzin gzhan dag la rnam par spyad pas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
233b5('bum): mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba yod do//smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin gzhan gang dag gis/rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na
233b6('bum): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba yin/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
233b7('bum): kyi ting nge 'dzin dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba yod de/ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
234a1('bum): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//rin chen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na
234a2('bum): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//seng ge rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
234a3('bum): sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod
234a4('bum): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//zla ba'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
234a5('bum): yod de/ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//chos
234a6('bum): thams cad las shin tu 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
234a7('bum): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

247a5('bum): 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//ye shes chen po'i
