247a7('bum): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//stobs bcu'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
247b1('bum): sbyar du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//sgo rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems
247b2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ting
247b3('bum): nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//ngag gi skyon rnam par
247b4('bum): 'jig pas nam mkha' ltar gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
247b5('bum): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//ngag gi skyon yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
247b6('bum): dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//yid kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ting nge 'dzin
247b7('bum): des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//kun tu rtog pa zhes bya ba'i
248a1('bum): ting nge 'dzin yod de/ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
248a2('bum): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//nam mkha' lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag
248a3('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ting nge 'dzin des
248a4('bum): rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de
248a5('bum): dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin te/ting nge 'dzin de dag gis rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni/myur du
248a6('bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs kyi sgo gang la bslabs pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
248a7('bum): rnams/myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de lta bu tshad med grangs med pa gzhan dag kyang yod do//de nas sangs
248b1('bum): rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis yang 'di skad ces smras so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ting nge 'dzin 'di dag gis rnam par
248b2('bum): spyod pa de ni/sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to//da
248b3('bum): ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba ji snyed cig
248b4('bum): bzhugs pa de dag gis kyang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
248b5('bum): des ni ting nge 'dzin kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //bdag ni snyoms par zhugs so zhes bya bar ting nge 'dzin des rlom sems su 'gyur ba'ang med do//badrag ni snyoms par 'jug
248b6('bum): go/bdag gis mnyam par bzhag par bya'o//bdag ni mnyam par bzhag par gyur to zhes rlom sems su 'gyur ba med de/de la rnam par rtog pa de dag med cing mi rgyu'o//smras pa tshe dang /
248b7('bum): ldan pa rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/lung bstan pa
249a1('bum): snod dam/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA rAdwa ti'i zla nI ma do//de ci'i phyir na na/tshe dang ldan pA shArA r+ya tI ts+tsha/shes rlung kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang
249a2('bum): gzhan la/ting nge 'dzin kyang gzhan te/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan zhes bya ba med kyi/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin to//ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang byang chub sems
249a3('bum): dpa'o//byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin to//smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te de ltar ting nge 'dzin kyang gzhan la/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan zhes bya ba med/
249a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan le/ting nge 'dzin kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir/ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa'/byang chub sems
249a5('bum): dpa'i nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin yin na/de la ting nge 'dzin bstan par nus snum/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/de ni ma yin no//smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa rab
249a6('bum): 'byor rigs kyi bu de ting nge 'dzin de la 'du shes su byed dam/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'du shes su byed pa med do//smras pa/ji ltar de la 'du shes su
249a7('bum): byed par mi 'gyur/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/rtag pa med pa'i phyir ro//smras pa/de la ji ltar rtog pa med pa yin/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/chos thams cad med pa'i phyir rtog pa
249b1('bum): med de/de ltar na rigs kyi bu de ting nge 'dzin de la rtog pa med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/rigs kyi bu de ting nge 'dzin de la rnam par shes par byed pa med do//'du shes
249b2('bum): su byed par 'gyur ba med do//smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ci'i phyir rnam par shes par byed pa med cing /'du shes su 'gyur ba med/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ting nge 'dzin de'ang med la//
249b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'ang med pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa med do//'du shes su 'gyur ba med do//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la
249b4('bum): legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/rab 'byor legs so legs so//tshig 'di ni legs par bshad do//ji ltar ngas nyon mongs pa med pa la rnam par spyod pa'i nyan thos kyi nang na/mchog tu
249b5('bum): bshad pa des bshad pa ni 'di yin no//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang /de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
249b6('bum): pa la bslab par bya'o//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lnga bslab par bya'o//
249b7('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la bslab par bya'o//yang dag par spong ba rnams la bslab par bya'o//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la
250a1('bum): bslab par bya'o//dbang po rnams la bslab par bya'o//stobs rnams la bslab par bya'o//byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la bslab par bya'o//'phags pa'i lam yan
250a2('bum): lag brgyad pa la bslab par bya'o//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la bslab par bya'o//bsam gtan rnams la bslab par bya'o//tshad med pa rnams la bslab par bya'o//gzugs med
250a3('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la bslab par bya'o//rnam par thar pa rnams la bslab par bya'o//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la bslab par bya'o//rnam par thar
250a4('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa la bslab par bya'o//mngon par shes pa rnams la bslab par bya'o//ting nge 'dzin rnams la bslab par bya'o//gzungs
250a5('bum): kyi sgo rnams la bslab par bya'o//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la bslab par bya'o//mi 'jigs pa rnams la bslab par bya'o//so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la bslab par
250a6('bum): bya'o//byams pa chen po la bslab par bya'o//snying rje chen po la bslab par bya'o//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la bslab par bya'o//de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus//
250a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul
250b1('bum): gyis slong po//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la
250b2('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo//dran pa nye bar
250b3('bum): bzhag pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo//yang dag par spong ba rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo//
250b4('bum): dbang po rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo//stobs rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo//byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo//'phags
250b5('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo//bsam gtan rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
250b6('bum): slob bo//tshad med pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob po//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo//rnam par thar pa rnams la mi
250b7('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob po//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /
251a1('bum): smyon pa med pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo//mngon par shes pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo//ting nge 'dzin rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
251a2('bum): slob bo//gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo//mi 'jigs pa rnams la mi de rigs
251a3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis slob bo//so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo//byams pa chen po la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo//snying rje chen po la mi
251a4('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems
251a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
251a6('bum): slob pa yin/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/tshul khrims
251a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la mi dmigs
251b1('bum): pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/yang drag par spong ba rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/dbang po rnams la
251b2('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/stobs rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/'phags pa'i
251b3('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/bsam gtan rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
251b4('bum): slob pa yin/tshad med pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slong pa yin/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/rnam par thar pa rnams
251b5('bum): la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slong nga yin/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan
251b6('bum): ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/mngon par shes pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ting nge 'dzin rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul
251b7('bum): gyis slob pa yin/gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/mi 'jigs pa rnams la
252a1('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/byams pa chen po la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
252a2('bum): slob pa yin/snying rje chen po la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin no//shA ra dwa ti'i bus gsol
252a3('bum): pa/bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du mi dmigs pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir bdag mi dmigs so//sems can
252a4('bum): mi dmigs so//'gro ba mi dmigs so//gso ba mi dmigs so//skyes bu mi dmigs so//gang zag mi dmigs so//shed can mi dmigs so//shed bdag mi dmigs so//
252a5('bum): byed pa po ma dmigs so//tshor ba po mi dmigs so//shes pa po ma dmigs so//mthong ba po mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir gzugs mi dmigs so//shin
252a6('bum): tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir tshor ba mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'du shes mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'du byed mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam
252a7('bum): par dag pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir mig mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rna ba mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par
252b1('bum): dag pa'i phyir sna mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir lce mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir lus mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir yid mi dmigs
252b2('bum): so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir gzugs mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sgra mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir dri mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par
252b3('bum): dradag pa'i phyir ro mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir reg mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir chos mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir mig gi khams
252b4('bum): mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par drag pa'i phyir gzugs kyi khams mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par
252b5('bum): dag pa'i phyir rna ba'i khams mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sgra'i khams mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dmigs
252b6('bum): so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sna'i khams mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir dri'i khams mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sna'i rnam par shes pa'i
252b7('bum): khams mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir lce'i khams mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro'i khams mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir
253a1('bum): lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir lus kyi khams mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par drag pa'i phyir reg gi khams ma
253a2('bum): dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir yid kyi khams mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag
253a3('bum): pa'i phyir chos kyi khams mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sna'i khams mi dmigs so//
253a4('bum): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir chu'i khams mi dmyigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir me'i khams mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rlung gi khams mi dmigs so//
253a5('bum): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir nam mkha'i khams mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dmigs so//shAn tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ma rig
253a6('bum): pa mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'du byed mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ming
253a7('bum): dang gzugs mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir skye mched drug mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir reg pa mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir
253b1('bum): tshor ba mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par drag pa'i phyir sred pa mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par drag pa'i phyir len pa mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir srid pa mi dmigs so//
253b2('bum): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir skye ba mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rga shi mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sdug bsngal mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par
253b3('bum): dag pa'i phyir kun 'byung ba mi domigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'gog pa mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir lam mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'dod
253b4('bum): pa'i khams mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir gzugs kyi khams mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir gzugs med pa'i khams mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam
253b5('bum): par dag pa'i phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir bzod po'i pha rol
253b6('bum): tu phyin pa mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so//
253b7('bum): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i
254a1('bum): phyir yang dag par spong ba rnams mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir dbang po rnams
254a2('bum): mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir stobs rnams mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag
254a3('bum): pa'i phyir 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir bsdam
254a4('bum): gtan rnams mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir tshad med pa rnams mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi
254a5('bum): dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par thar pa rnams mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi dmigs
254a6('bum): so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan mA med pa dang /smon pa med pa mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dgu pa'i phyir mngon par shes
254a7('bum): pa rnams mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin rnams mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam
254b1('bum): par dag pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir mi 'jigs pa rnams mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir so so yang dag par
254b2('bum): rig pa rnams mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir byams pa chen po mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir snying rje chen po mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir
254b3('bum): spangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rgyun du zhugs pa mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir lhan cig phyir 'ong ba mi dmigs so//
254b4('bum): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir phyir mi 'ong ba mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par drag pa'i phyir dgra bcom pa mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rang sangs rgyas mi dmigs
254b5('bum): so/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par drag pa'i phyir byang chub mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sangs rgyas mi
254b6('bum): dmigs so//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/chos thams cad mA skyes pa dang /mi 'gag pa dang /kun nas nyon
254b7('bum): mongs pa med pa dang /rnam par byang ba med pa dang /'byung ba med pa dang /dmigs pa med pa dang /mngon par 'du bya ba med pa 'di ni/rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba ste/shA ra dwa ti'i
255a1('bum): bu de ltar na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ltar slob
255a2('bum): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/chos gang dang gang la slob pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA rA dwa ti'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
255a3('bum): sems dpa' chen po ni/chos gang la'ang slob pa med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos 'di dag ni/byis pa so so'i skye bos ji ltar mngon par chags par bya ba de lta bu'i rnam
255a4('bum): par rtog pa yod pa ma yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'o na chos 'di dge rnam pa gang gis mchis pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ji ltar med pa de ltar
255a5('bum): yod de/de ltar yod pa ma yin pas/de'i phyir med ces bya'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du mchis pa ma lags pa la ma mchis pa zhes bgyi/bcom ldan 'das
255a6('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam
255a7('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /dor ba med pa

255b2('bum): pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no//shA ra dwa ti'i bu tshor ba nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid

274a4('bum): dag par rig pa rnams nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus

274a6('bum): pa nyid dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang
274a7('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no//shA ra dwa ti'i bu snying rje chen po nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong
274b1('bum): pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma drang tha ma med
274b2('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /dngos
274b3('bum): po med pa stong pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no//shA ra dwa ti'i bu sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad nang stong
274b4('bum): pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /'dus ma byas
274b5('bum): stong pa nyid dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid
274b6('bum): dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/
274b7('bum): yod pa ma yin no//de la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams med pa la mngon par zhen pas/sred pa la mngon par zhen te/de dag gis med pa la yongs su brtags pas/med pa la mngon
275a1('bum): par zhen cing /'di lta ste/chad pa dang /rtag pa'i mtha' gnyis la chags pas de dag mi shes mi mthong ste/gang med pa'i chos de dag la ljongs su brtags nas/
275a2('bum): ming dang gzugs la mngon par zhen pa de dag/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par zhen to//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par zhen to//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la
275a3('bum): mngon par zhen to//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par zhen to//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par zhen to//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par
275a4('bum): zhen to//nang stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to//phyi stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to//phyi nang stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to//chen
275a5('bum): po stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to//don dam pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to//'dus byas stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to//
275a6('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid lnga mngon par zhen to//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to//rang bzhin
275a7('bum): stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to//chos thams cad stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la mngon
275b1('bum): par zhen to//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa
275b2('bum): rnams la mngon par zhen to//yang dag par spong ba rnams la mngon par zhen to//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la mngon par zhen to//dbang po rnams la mngon par zhen to//stongs rnams la mngon
275b3('bum): par zhen to//byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la mngon par zhen to//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mngon par zhen to//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la mngon par zhen to//bsam
275b4('bum): gtan rnams la mngon par zhen to//tshad med pa rnams la mngon par zhen to//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mngon par zhen to//rnam par thar pa rnams la mngon par zhen to///
275b5('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mngon par zhen to//stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa la mngon par zhen to//mngon par shes pa rnams la mngon
275b6('bum): par zhen to//ting nge 'dzin rnams la mngon par zhen to//gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mngon par zhen to//snying rje chen po la mngon par zhen to//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la mngon par
275b7('bum): zhan to//mi 'jigs pa rnams la mngon par zher to//so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la mngon par zhen to//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mngon par zhen to//de dag de ltar
276a1('bum): mngon par zhen pas/yod pa ma yin pa'i chos rnams la yongs su rtog ste/de dag mi shes mi mthong ngo //ci mi shes mi mthong zhe na/gzugs mi shes mi mthong
276a2('bum): ngo//tshor ba mi shes mi mthong ngo //'du shes mi shes mi mthong ngo //'du byed mi shes mi mthong ngo //rnam par shes pa mi shes mi mthong ngo //mig mi shes mi mthong ngo //rna ba mi
276a3('bum): shes mi mthong ngo //sna mi shes mi mthong ngo //lce mi shes mi mthong ngo //lus mi shes mi mthong ngo //yid mi shes mi mthong ngo //gzugs mi shes mi mthong ngo //sgra mi shes mi mthong
276a4('bum): //dri mI shes mi mthong ngo //ro mi shes mi mthong ngo //reg mi shes mi mthong ngo //chos mi shes mi mthong ngo //mig gi rnam par shes pa mi shes mi mthong ngo //rna ba'i rnam par shes pa
276a5('bum): mi shes mi mthong ngo //sna'i rnam par shes pa mi shes mi mthong ngo //lce'i rnam par shes pa mi shes mi mthong ngo //lus kyi rnam par shes pa mi shes mi mthong ngo //yid kyi rnam par
276a6('bum): shes pa mi shes mi mthong ngo //mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi shes mi mthong ngo //rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mi shes mi mthong ngo //sna'i 'dus te reg pa mi shes mi mthong ngo //lce'i 'dus
276a7('bum): te reg pa mi shes mi mthong ngo //lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mi shes mi mthong ngo //yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi shes mi mthong ngo //mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi shes mi
276b1('bum): mthong ngo //rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi shes mi mthong ngo //sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bami shes mi mthong ngo //lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi shes mi mthong ngo //
276b2('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi shes mi mthong ngo //yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi shes mi mthong ngo //sa'i khams mi shes mi mthong ngo //chu'i khams mi shes mi mthong
276b3('bum): ngo//me'i khams mi shes mi mthong ngo //rlung gi khams mi shes mi mthong ngo //nam mkha'i khams mi shes mi mthong ngo //rnam par shes pa'i khams mi shes mi mthong ngo //ma rig pa
276b4('bum): mi shes mi mthong ngo //'du byed mi shes mi mthong ngo //rnam par shes pa mi shes mi mthong ngo //ming dang gzugs mi shes mi mthong ngo //skye mched drug mi shes mi mthong ngo //reg pa mi
276b5('bum): shes mi mthong ngo //tsher po mi shes mi mthong ngo //sred pa mi shes mi mthong ngo //len pa mi shes mi mthong ngo //srid pa mi shes mi mthong ngo //skye bo mi shes mi mthong ngo //rga shi mi shes
276b6('bum): mi mthong ngo //sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi shes mi mthong ngo //tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi shes mi mthong ngo //bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi shes mi mthong ngo //brtson 'grus
276b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin po mi shes mi mthong ngo //bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi shes mi mthong ngo //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi shes mi mthong ngo //nang stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo //
277a1('bum): gyi stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo //phyi nang stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo //stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo //chen po stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo //
277a2('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo //'dus byas stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo //'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo //mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi shes mi
277a3('bum): mthong ngo //thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo //dUr ba med pa stong pa nyid mi shos mi mthong ngo //rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo //chos thams cad
277a4('bum): stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo //rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo //mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo //dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong
277a5('bum): do//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo //dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo //dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi mi shes mi mthong ngo //yang dag par spong ba
277a6('bum): bzhi mi shes mi mthong ngo //rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi mi shes mi mthong ngo //dbang po lnga mi shes mi mthong ngo //stobs lnga mi shes mi mthong ngo //byang chub kyi yan lag bdun mi shes
277a7('bum): mi mthong ngo //'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi shes mi mthong ngo //'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mi shes mi mthong ngo //bsam gtan rnams mi shes mi mthong ngo //tshad med
277b1('bum): pa rnams mi shes mi mthong ngo //bzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bani mi shes mi mthong ngo //rnam par thar pa brgyad mi shes mi mthong ngo //mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyom sna 'jug pa
277b2('bum): dgu mi shes mi mthong ngo //stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smod pa med pa mi shes mi mthong ngo //mngon par shes pa rnams mi shes mi mthong ngo //ting nge 'dzin rnams mi shes mi mthong
277b3('bum): ngo//gzungs kyi sgo rnams mAM shes mi mthong ngo //snying rje chen po mi shes mi mthong ngo //de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mi shes mi mthong ngo //mi 'jigs pa bani mi shes mi mthong ngo //
277b4('bum): so sngo yang dag par rig pa bzhi mi shes mi mthong ngo //sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi shes mi mthong ngo //de ltar de dag ni byis pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'dong ba ste/de dag 'drung ba
277b5('bum): ma yin no//gang nas 'byung ba ma yin zhe na/'dod pa'i khams nas 'byung ba ma yin no//gzugs kyi khams nas 'byung ba ma yin no//gzugs med pa'i khams nas 'byung ba ma yin no//
277b6('bum): nyan thos kyi sa nas 'byung ba ma yin no//rang sangs rgyas kyi sa nus 'byung ba ma yin no//de dag ni yid mi ches pa ste/ji ltar yid mi ches she na/gzugs gzugs kyis stong zhes bya
277b7('bum): yid mi ches so//tshor ba tshor bas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//'du shes 'du shes kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi chis so//'du byed 'du byed kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi
278a1('bum): ches so//rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//mig mig bris stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//rna brnabs stong zhes
278a2('bum): bya bar yid mi ches so//sna snas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//lce lces stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//lus lus kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//yid yid kyis stong zhes
278a3('bum): bya dang yid mi ches so//gzugs gzugs kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//sgra sgras stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//dri dIs stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//ro ros stong zhes bya
278a4('bum): bar yid mi ches so//reg reg gis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//chos chos kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//mig gi rnam par shes pa mig gi rnam par shes pas stong zhes
278a5('bum): bya bar yid mi ches so//rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rna ba'i rnam par shes pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//sna'i rnam par shes pa sna'i rnam par shes pas stong zhes bya bar yid
278a6('bum): rmi ches so//lce'i rnam par shes pa lce'i rnam par shes pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//lus kyi rnam par shes pa lus kyi rnam par shes pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//
278a7('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa yid kyi rnam par shes pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//mig gi 'dus te reg pa mig gi 'dus te reg pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//rna ba'i
278b1('bum): dus te reg rna ba'i 'dus te reg pas stong zhes bya ngar yid mi ches so//sna'i 'dus te reg pa sna'i 'dus te reg pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//lce'i 'dus te reg pa lce'i 'dus te reg
278b2('bum): dras stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa lus kyi 'dus te reg pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yid kyi 'dus te reg pas stong zhes bya bar yid
278b3('bum): mi ches so//mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshe rlabs stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rna ba'i 'dus te
278b4('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//lce'i 'dus
278b5('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas
278b6('bum): sbyong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba srid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//sa'i khams sa'i khams kyis stong
278b7('bum): zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//chu'i khams chu'i khams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//me'i khams me'i khams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//rlung gi khams rlung gi khams
279a1('bum): kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//nam mkha'i khams nam mkha'i khams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//rnam par shes pa'i khams rnam par shes pa'i
279a2('bum): khams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//ma rig pa ma rig pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//'du byed 'du byed kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//rnam par shes pa rnam par
279a3('bum): shes pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//ming dang gzugs ming dang gzugs kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//skye mched drug skye mched drug gis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so///
279a4('bum): reg pa reg pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//tshor ba tshor bas stong zhes bya bar yang mi ches so//sred pa sred pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//len pa len pas stong zhes bya
279a5('bum): bar yid mi ches so//srid pa srid pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//skye ba skye bas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//rga shi rga shis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//sbyin pa'i pha rol
279a6('bum): tu phyin pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//bzod pa'i
279a7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//
279b1('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sa stong zhes bya bar yid mi chos
279b2('bum): so//nang stong pa nyid nang stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//phyi stong pa nyid phyi stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//phyi nang stong pa nyid phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong
279b3('bum): zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//chen po stong pa nyid chen po stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yad mi ches so//
279b4('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//'dus byas stong pa nyid 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yang mi ches so//'dus ma
279b5('bum): byas stong pa nyid 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//
279b6('bum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya
279b7('bum): bar yid mi ches so//rang bzhin stong pa nyid rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//chos thams cad stong pa nyid chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar
280a1('bum): yid mi ches so//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa
280a2('bum): stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid stong pa
280a3('bum): nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa
280a4('bum): bzhi dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//yang dag par spong ba bzhi yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
280a5('bum): pa bzhi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//dbang po lnga dbang po rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//stobs lnga stobs rnams kyis stong zhes bya
280a6('bum): bar yid mi ches so//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi tshos so//bsam gtan rnams bsam gtan rnams kyis stong zhes bya/
280a7('bum): bar yid mi ches so//tshad med pa rnams tshad med pa rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
280b1('bum): pa rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//rnam par thar pa brgyad rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu
280b2('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong
280b3('bum): pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//ting
280b4('bum): nge 'dzin rnams ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid ma ches so//gzungs kyi sgo rnams gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i
280b5('bum): stobs bcu de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//mi 'jigs pa bzhi mi 'jigs pa bzhis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//so so yang dag par rig pa
280b6('bum): bzhi so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//snying rje chen po snying rje chen pos stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sangs
280b7('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bus stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//lan cig phyir 'ong
281a1('bum): ba'i 'bras bu lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches
281a2('bum): so//dgra bcom pa nyid dgra bcom pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//rang byang chub rang byang chub kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid
281a3('bum): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//de dag
281a4('bum): ni gnas pa ma yin pa ste/ji ltar gnas pa ma yin zhe na/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ma yin/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ma yin/bzod pa'i pha rol
281a5('bum): tu phyin pa la gnas pa ma yin/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ma yin/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ma yin/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
281a6('bum): granas pa ma yin/nang stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/phyi stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/phyi nang stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid lnga gnas pa ma
281a7('bum): yin/chen po stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/don dam pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/'dus byas stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la gnas pa
281b1('bum): ma yin/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/rang bzhin stong pa
281b2('bum): nyid la gnas pa ma yin/chos thams cad stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/dngos
281b3('bum): blo med pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa ma
281b4('bum): yin/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la gnas pa ma yin/yang dag par spong ba rnams la gnas pa ma yin/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gnas pa ma yin/dbang po rnams la gnas
281b5('bum): pa ma yin/stobs rnams la gnas pa ma yin/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la gnas pa ma yin/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gnas pa ma yin/'phags pa'i bden pa
281b6('bum): rnams la gnas pa ma yin/bsam gtan rnams lnga gnas pa ma yin/tshad med pa rnams la gnas pa ma yin/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas pa ma yin//
281b7('bum): rnam par thar pa brgyad la gnas pa ma yin/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la gnas pa ma yin/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon
282a1('bum): pa med pa la gnas pa ma yin/mngon par shes pa rnams lnga gnas pa ma yin/ting nge 'dzin rnams lnga gnas bla ma yin/gzungs kyi rdo rnams la gnas pa sa
282a2('bum): yin/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu lnga gnas pa ma yin/mi 'jigs pa bzhi la gnas pa ma yin/so so yang drag par rig pa bzhi lnga gnas bla ma yin/byams pa chen po la
282a3('bum): gnas pa yin/snying rje chen po la gnas pa ma yin/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la gnas pa pa yino//de dag ni mngon par zhen pa yin te/ji ltar mngon par zhen pa yin zhe/
282a4('bum): na/gzugs la mngon par zhen pa yin/tshor ba lnga mngon par zhen pa yin/'du shes la mngon par zhen pa yin/'du byed la mngon par zhen pa yin/rnam par shes pa
282a5('bum): mngon par zhen pa yin/mig la mngon par zhen po yin/rna ba la mngon par zhen pa yin/snal mngon par zhen pa yid/lce la mngon par zhen pa yin/lus la mngon par
282a6('bum): glen pa yin/yid la mngon par glen pa yin/gzugs la mngon par zhen pa yin/sbrul mngon par zhen pa yin+ta/dri la mngon par zhen pa yin/rol mngon par zhen pa
282a7('bum): yin/reg la mngon par zhen pa yin/chos la mngon par zhen pa yin/mig gi khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/gzugs kyi khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/mig
282b1('bum): gi rnam par shes pa'i khrims la mngon par zhen pa yin/rna ba'i khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/sgra'i khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams la mngon/
282b2('bum): par zhen pa yin/sna'i khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/dri'i khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams lnga mngon par zhen pa yin/lce'i khams la
282b3('bum): mngon par zhen pa yin/ro'i khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/lus kyi khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/reg
282b4('bum): bya'i khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/yid kyi khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/chos kyi khams la mngon par
282b5('bum): zhen pa yin/yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/'dod chags la mngon par zhen pa yin/zhe sdang la mngon par zhen pa yin/gti mug la mngon par zhen pa
282b6('bum): yin/lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ma rig pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/'du byed la mngon par zhen pa yin/rnam par shes pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ming dang /
282b7('bum): gzugs la mngon par zhen pa yin/skye mched drug la mngon par zhen pa yin/reg pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/tshor ba la mngon par zhen pa yin/sred pa la mngon par zhen pa
283a1('bum): yin/len pa lnga mngon par zhen pa smin/srid pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/skye ba la mngon par zhen pa ljin/rga shing mngon par zhen pa yid/spyod pa'i
283a2('bum): ror tu phyin pa la mngon par zhen pa sbyin/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par zhen pa yin+d+ra/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/brtson 'grus kyi pha
283a3('bum): rol tu phyin pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin bra la mngon par zhen pa yin/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/nu'i stong
283a4('bum): nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/phyi stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/phyi nang stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/stong po nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/chen
283a5('bum): bopo stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/don dam pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/'dus byas stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la mngon
283a6('bum): par zhen pa yin/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/thog pa dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la mngon
283a7('bum): par zhen pa yin/rang bzhin stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/chos thams cad stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa
283b1('bum): yin/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/dngos po med
283b2('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin/yang dag par spong ba rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin/rdzu 'phrul gyi
283b3('bum): rkang pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin/dbang po rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin/stobs rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la mngon par zhen po yin//
283b4('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin/bsam gtan rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin/tshad med
283b5('bum): pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin/rnam par thar pa brgyad la mngon par zhen pa yin/mthar gyis gnas
283b6('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mngon par zhen pa yin/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/mngon par shes pa
283b7('bum): drangs pa mngon par zhen pa yin/ting nge 'dzin rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin/gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la mngon par
284a1('bum): zhen pa yin/mi 'jigs pa bzhi la mngon par zhen pa yin/sa so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la mngon par zhen pa yin/byams pa chen po la mngon par zhen du
284a2('bum): /srin/snying rje chen po la mngon par zhen pa yin/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyud la mngon par zhen pa yin/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la mngon par zhen pa yin/lan cig
284a3('bum): phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la mngon par zhen pa yin/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la mngon par zhen pa yin/dgra bcom pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/rang byang chub la mngon par zhen pa
284a4('bum): yin/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la mngon
284a5('bum): par zhen pa yin te/de'i phyir na byis pa zhes bya'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems drapa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi slob cing /
284a6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba lags sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
284a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi slob pa yin/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba yin/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
284b1('bum): po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi slob pa lags/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu/'dri la byang chub
284b2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mi mkhas pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags shing mngon par zhe na/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags shing mngon par
284b3('bum): zhe na/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags shing mngon par zhe na/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags shing mngon par zhe na/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags shing
284b4('bum): mngon par zhe na/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags shing mngon par zhe na/nang stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhe na/phyi stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhe na/phyi nang
284b5('bum): stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhe na/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhe na/chen po stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhe na/don dam pa stong pa nyid la
284b6('bum): brtags shing mngon par zhe na/'dus byas stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhe na/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhe na/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la
284b7('bum): brtags shing mngon par zhe na/thog mo dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/rang bzhin stong pa nyid
285a1('bum): la brtags shing mngon par zhe na/chos thams cad stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhe na/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon
285a2('bum): par zhe na/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhe na/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhe na/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon
285a3('bum): par zhe na/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhe na/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhe na/yang dag par spong ba rnams
285a4('bum): la brtags shing mngon par zhe na/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/dbang po rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhe na/stobs rnams lnga brtags shing
285a5('bum): mngon par zhe na/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhe na/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
285a6('bum): la brtags shing mngon par zhen/bsam gtan rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/tshad med pa rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
285a7('bum): 'jug pa rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhe na/rnam par thar pa brgyad la brtags shing mngon par zhen/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la brtags shing
285b1('bum): mngon par zhen/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen/mngon par shes pa rnams la brtags shing mngon
285b2('bum): par zhen/ting nge 'dzin rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/gzungs kyi sgo rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhe na/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu lnga brtags shing mngon
285b3('bum): par zhen/mi 'jigs pa bzhi la brtags shing mngon par zhe na/so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la brtags shing mngon par zhen/snying rje chen po la brtags shing mngon par zhen/
285b4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la brtags shing mngon par zhen/thams cad shes pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la brtags shing
285b5('bum): mngon par zhe na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen pas/shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes
285b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi slob pa yin/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta lpags na/byang chub sems dpa' sems
285b7('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam pa gang gis slob par 'gyur ba lags/ji ltar bslabs na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ba lags/bcom ldan 'das
286a1('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/shA radwa ti'i bu/nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lnga spyod pa'i tshe/shes rab kyi pha rol
286a2('bum): tu phyin pa de mi dmigs/yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing /shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob na/rnam pa thams
286a3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'byung ba yin no//shA radwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ngasam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
286a4('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa de myi dmigs shing /yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
286a5('bum): pa la de ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo //shA rAdwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
286a6('bum): tuphyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong s+t+wa~M/shA radwa ti'i bu byang chub de ras dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
286a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slong pa ni mi dmigs po'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo //shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
286b1('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de mi dmigs shing /yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
286b2('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo //shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
286b3('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems
286b4('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo //shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa'
286b5('bum): sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de mi dmigs shing /yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems
286b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/mi dmyags pa'i tshul gyis/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo ///
286b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa//bam po bzhi bcu pa//shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/nang stong pa nyid
287a1('bum): dri me myigs shing /yang dag par rjes sgyu mi mthong ste/shA tIrIH/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rabaSh+Ti pa rom tu phyin pa lta d+mo lta/
287a2('bum): skyoslob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo //shA radwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/
287a3('bum): phyi stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing /yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dri ltar slob pa
287a4('bum): ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo //shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/phyi
287a5('bum): nang stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/shA radwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob
287a6('bum): pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo //shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod
287a7('bum): pa'i tshe/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing /yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/shA radwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi bar
287b1('bum): byin pa la de ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo //shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chen po stong pa nyid laspyod
287b2('bum): pa'i tshe/chen po stong pa nyid dri mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lo/
287b3('bum): de ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo //shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don dam pa stong pa nyid la
287b4('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/dron dam pa stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
287b5('bum): la de ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo //shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dus byas stong pa nyid la
287b6('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/'dus byas stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
287b7('bum): phyin pa la de ltar slob po ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo //shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dus ma
288a1('bum): byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/'dus ma byas spyong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa'
288a2('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo //shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems
288a3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/shA ra dwa ti'i
288a4('bum): bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo //
288a5('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thog ma dang ba ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag
288a6('bum): par rjes su mi mthong ste/shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa
288a7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo //shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid de mi
288b1('bum): dmigs shing /yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i
288b2('bum): tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo //shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/rang bzhin stong pa nyid
288b3('bum): de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i
288b4('bum): tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo //shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/chos thams
288b5('bum): cad stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing /yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni
288b6('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo //shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/
288b7('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing /yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
289a1('bum): /de ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo //shA rAdwa ti'i du/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen du rma
289a2('bum): dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing /yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems
289a3('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo //shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa'
289a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid de mi dra mig sra shing /yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub
289a5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo //shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang
289a6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de me migs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang
289a7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo //shA ra dwa ti'i bu/
289b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong
289b2('bum): ste/shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
289b3('bum): 'byung ngo //shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par
289b4('bum): rjes su mi mthong ste/shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
289b5('bum): nyid du 'byung ngo //shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/yang drag par spong ba de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag
289b6('bum): par rjes su mi mthong ste/shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lo de ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad
289b7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo //shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa de dag mi dmigs shing yang
290a1('bum): dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul
290a2('bum): gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo //shA re dwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbang po rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/dbang po de dag mi dmigs shIng
290a3('bum): yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
290a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo //shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stobs rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/stobs de dag mi dmigs shing
290a5('bum): yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam
290a6('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo //shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/byang chub kyi yan lag dri
290a7('bum): dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni mi
290b1('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo //shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod
290b2('bum): pa'i tshe/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
290b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo //shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags
290b4('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/'phags pa'i bden pa de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
290b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo //shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
290b6('bum): bsam gtan rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/bsam gtan de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
290b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo //shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med
291a1('bum): pa rnams la spyod pa'i cha/tshad med pa de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
291a2('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo //shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems
291a3('bum): dpa' chen po gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong
291a4('bum): ste/shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
291a5('bum): pa nyid du 'byung ngo //shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par thar pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam par thar pa de dag mi dmigs shing yang
291a6('bum): dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
291a7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo //shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod pa'i
291b1('bum): tshe/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu po de dag ma dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/shA ra dwa tI'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes/
291b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo //shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam
291b3('bum): pApar thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa de dag mi dmigs
291b4('bum): shing /yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
291b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo //shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/mngon par shes pa de dag mi
291b6('bum): dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ngo ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
291b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo //shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ting nge 'dzin de dag mi dmigs shing
292a1('bum): yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i
292a2('bum): tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo //shA ra dwa tI'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/gzugs kyi sgo de
292a3('bum): ngag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs
292a4('bum): pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo //shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la spyod pa'i tshe/de
292a5('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu po de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
292a6('bum): phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo //shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'jigs pa
292a7('bum): bzhi la spyod pa'i tshe/mi 'jigs pa bzhi po de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
292b1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo //shA rAdwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa so yang dag
292b2('bum): par rig pa bzhi la spyod pa'i tshe/so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi po de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
292b3('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pA la de ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo //shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems
292b4('bum): dpa' chen po snying rje chen po la spyod pa'i tshe/snying rje chen po de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
292b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo //shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs
292b6('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/sangs rgyas kyi chos mA 'dres pa de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/shA ra dwa tI'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems
292b7('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo //shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems
293a1('bum): dpa' chen po thams cad shes pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/thams cad shes pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byung
293a2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la da ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo //shA ra dwa ti'i bu/
293a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/shA
293a4('bum): radwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo //
293a5('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par
293a6('bum): rjes su mi mthong ste/shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lnga de ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa
293a7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo //shA ra dwa ti'i bu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /de ltar shes rab kyi
293b1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo //gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams
293b2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ba lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /phyi stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid
293b3('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /chen po stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /'dus
293b4('bum): byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /thog ma dang tha ma med
293b5('bum): pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi dmigs
293b6('bum): pa'i tshul dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
293b7('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar shes par bya'o//
294a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa lngas/le'u drug pa'o////de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
294a2('bum): ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing /ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
294a3('bum): nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur rA ma zhes mchi na/bcom ldan 'das de skad ces 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/bcom ldan
294a4('bum): 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing /ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram//
294a5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram+bo zhes mchi na/bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du
294a6('bum): 'dri zhing /ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslang sra shing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur rer/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
294a7('bum): pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing /ci sgyu ma'i skyes
294b1('bum): bu 'di/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/
294b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing /ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing
294b3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi//
294b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing /ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/rnam
294b5('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing /ci sgyu
294b6('bum): ma'i skyes bu 'di/nang stong pa nyid la bslabs shing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/
294b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing /ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/phyi stong pa nyid la bslabs shing /rnam
295a1('bum): rgyu/ m+b+ha du na mang rlu /rlu ma sgyu nga sa nga ngas /na dud /
295a2('bum): 'i skad du bstan pa brtsi/bcom ldan 'das la la zhug 'di skang du 'dri zhing /tsi sna ma'i skyes m+b+ha ni/byin sto pa nyid la bas bas shing /rnam pa mas cad mkhyen pa nyid
295a3('bum): 'aM ma/rnam byumams nga khyen nga nas ma sa de da pa ji 'du ya rgyu
295a4('bum): dim dang dzi / m+b+ha ma'i sa chu /ngas kyi kyi shing /rnam rnams byed pa nyid su byu ng+ge zung rnam tha
295a5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid bab par 'gyur ram zhes mdzin/bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri bde la ji skad du bstad par bgyi/bcom ldan 'dasa'i lce 'di nad du 'dri zhi dri/tsi sU 'i
295a6('bum): bu'adi/rten pa stong pa rnyed lnga ba srangs shing /rnam+b+ha pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'thung la 'i gyung d+ham/rnam+be gams cid mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ri ma nas mtsha/

302b1('bum): gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
