302b3('bum): du sems/yid kyi 'dus te reg po'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang gzhan la/sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam ma mA/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das
302b4('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/sa'i khams kyang gzhan la/sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//bcom
302b5('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal po/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/chu'i khams kyang gzhan la/sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//
302b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/me'i khams kyang gzhan la/sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mAm/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags
302b7('bum): so/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/rlung gi khams kyang gzhan la/sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhog yin snyam mam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta
303a1('bum): ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/nam mkha'i khams kyang gzhan la/sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam
303a2('bum): mam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang gzhan la/sgyu ma'ang
303a3('bum): gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ma rig pa'ang gzhan la/
303a4('bum): sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/'du byed kyang
303a5('bum): gzhan la/sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/rnam
303a6('bum): par shes pa'ang gzhan la/sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam
303a7('bum): du sems/ming dang gzugs kyang gzhan la/sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
303b1('bum): rab 'byor dang snyam du sems/skyo mchod dug kyang gzhan la/sgyum 'ang gzhan zhog yon snyam mam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das dri ltam lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis 'a gyu/
303b2('bum): pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/reg pa'ang gzhan la/sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
303b3('bum): pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems tshor ba'ang gzhan la/sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
303b4('bum): pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/sred pa'ang gzhan la/sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
303b5('bum): pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/len pa'ang gzhan la/sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
303b6('bum): pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/srid pa'ang gzhan la/sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhi yin snyam mam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
303b7('bum): pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/skye ba'ang gzhan la/sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
304a1('bum): stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/rga shi'ang gzhan la/sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mamra/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma 'gas so//bcom ldan
304a2('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan la/sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags
304a3('bum): so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan la/sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/gsol pa/bcom ldan
304a4('bum): 'das de lta ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan la/sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam//
304a5('bum): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan la/sgyu ma'ang
304a6('bum): gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
304a7('bum): phyin pa'ang gzhan la/sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji
304b1('bum): snyam du sems/shes ra'i kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan la/sgyu ma'ang gzhan nog yon snyam mamA/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de rna ma dgas so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
304b2('bum): sprul pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/nang stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das
304b3('bum): kyis bka' stsal po/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/phyi stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snum mAm/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//bcom ldan
304b4('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang bzhin lnga/sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mAm/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//
304b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de
304b6('bum): lha ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/chen po stong pa nyid kying gzhan la/sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mAm/gsol pa/bcom
304b7('bum): ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/gsol/
305a1('bum): pA/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/
305a2('bum): sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/'dus ma byas
305a3('bum): stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji
305a4('bum): snyam du sems/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das
305a5('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de
305a6('bum): lha ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/gsol pa/

305b1('bum): snyam mam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/sgyu

305b3('bum): kyang gzhan la/sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma legs so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/mi
305b4('bum): dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji
305b5('bum): snyam du sems/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
305b6('bum): stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//bcom ldan
305b7('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das
306a1('bum): de lta ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyang gzhan la/sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig
306a2('bum): yin snyam mam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang gzhan la/
306a3('bum): sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
306a4('bum): po rnams kyang gzhan la/sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam

306a6('bum): rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/stobs rnams kyang gzhan la/sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis
306a7('bum): bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang gzhan la/sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma
306b1('bum): lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'ang gzhan la/sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/gsol
306b2('bum): pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang gzhan la/sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig
306b3('bum): yin snyam mam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/bsam gtan rnams kyang gzhan la/sgyu
306b4('bum): ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/tshad med pa rnams kyang
306b5('bum): gzhan la/sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/gzugs
306b6('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang gzhan la/sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//
306b7('bum): rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/rnam par thar pa brgyad kyang gzhan la/sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis
307a1('bum): /bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor deng snyam du sems/mthar thos nanang dus rnams pang na pa dbu nga dang /sbyar+ya'ang gzhan don yon snyam mapa/zhus pa ra/
307a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis g+ha stsal pa/rang myong de ji snyam du sems/rnam pa dbang pa'i ni bo nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med
307a3('bum): ra'ang gzhan la/sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/glaso lnga pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta mi lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis dka' stsal pa/rab myor de ji snyam du sems/
307a4('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams kyang gzhan la/sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab
307a5('bum): 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang gzhan la/sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de d+ha me lags so//bcom ldan 'das
307a6('bum): gyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang gzhan la/skyon 'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta mi 'gas so//
307a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stongs rnams kyang gzhan la/sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/gsol pa/
307b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang gzhan la/sgyu na'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam
307b2('bum): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/so so yang dag dra 'i rig pa rnams kyang gzhan la/sgyu
307b3('bum): ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/snying rje chen po'ang gzhan
307b4('bum): la/sgyu ra'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/sangs rgyas
307b5('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang gzhan la/sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab
307b6('bum): 'byor de ji snyam du sems/byang chub kyang gzhan la/sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so///shes rab kyi pha
307b7('bum): rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa//bam po bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/gzugs
308a1('bum): nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang gzugs so//bcom ldan 'das tshor ba'ang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lpags te/tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid
308a2('bum): kyang tshor ba'o//bcom ldan 'das 'du shes kyang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/'du shes nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang 'du shes so//bcom ldan 'das 'du
308a3('bum): byed kyang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lpags te/'du byed nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang 'du byed do//bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan ma lags/sgyu
308a4('bum): ma'adra gzhan ma lags te/rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o//bcom ldan 'das mig kyang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te//
308a5('bum): mig nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang mig go/bcom ldan 'das rna ba'ang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/rna ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang rna ba'o//bcom
308a6('bum): ldan 'das sna'adra gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan me lags te/sna nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang sna'o//bcom ldan 'das lce'ang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma
308a7('bum): lags te/lce nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu mi nyid kyang lce'o//bcom ldan 'das lus kyang gzhan ma legs/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/lus nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang lus so//
308b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das yid kyang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/yid nyid bang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang yid do//bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang/
308b2('bum): gzhan ma lags te/gzugs nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang gzugs so//bcom ldan 'das sgra'ang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/sgra nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid
308b3('bum): kyang sgra'o//bcom ldan 'das dri'ang gzhan ma lpags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/dri nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang dri'i//bcom ldan 'das dro'ang gzhan ma lags/sgyu mi'ang
308b4('bum): gzhan ma lags te/ro nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang ro'o//bcom ldan 'das rog kyang gzhan ma legs/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/reg nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang reg
308b5('bum): go/bcom ldan 'das chos kyang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/chos nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang chos so//bcom ldan 'das mig gi rnam par shes pa'ang
308b6('bum): gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o//bcom ldan 'das rna ba'i rnam par shes
308b7('bum): pa'ang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o//bcom ldan 'das sna'i rnam par shes
309a1('bum): da'ang gzhanam lags/sgyum dang gzhanas gas/ nam par shes pad sgrum/ rdzung 'i rnam ngar shes pa'o//bcom ldan 'das
309a2('bum): rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan ma lags/sbru ma 'ang gzhan ma 'bras te/rje'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sbrum/spyad nyid kyang d+ha'i rnam par shes pa'o//bcom ldan 'das lus kyi rnam/
309a3('bum): brir shes pa'ang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang snum/sgro ma nyid kyang lus ni rnam par shes pa'o//bcom ldan 'das yid
309a4('bum): kyi rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o//bcom ldan 'das
309a5('bum): ri thA gi 'dus te reg pa'ang gzhan ma lags/sgyun 'ang gzhan ma lags te/smig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang s+thA ma~M/sna ma nyid kyang ni kri gi 'dus te reg pa'o//bcom ldan da/
309a6('bum): da'i dus te rig pa'ang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma 'ang gnan pa lags te/rna ba'i tshus te dag pa nyid s+thA ma~M/ nyi /tan 'di 'dus te dag pa'o//bcom ldan 'ang
309a7('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa'ang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid cing sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o//bcom ldan 'das lce'i
309b1('bum): 'dus te reg pa'ang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o//bcom ldan 'das lus kyi 'dus te reg
309b2('bum): pa'ang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu mi nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o//bcom ldan 'da' yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang
309b3('bum): gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma legs te/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o//bcom ldan 'das mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i
309b4('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang gnan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
309b5('bum): ba'o//bcom ldan 'das rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/rno ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu
309b6('bum): ma nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o//bcom ldan 'das sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/sde'i 'dus
309b7('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o//bcom ldan 'das lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang gzhan ma lags
310a1('bum): sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang sbrum/sgyu ma nyid kyang blo'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor 'a'o//bcom ldan 'das
310a2('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus
310a3('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o//bcom ldan 'das yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
310a4('bum): gyis tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o//bcom ldan 'das sa'i khams kyang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/sa'i
310a5('bum): khams nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang sa'i khams so//bcom ldan 'das chu'i khams kyang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/chu'i khams nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid
310a6('bum): kyang chu'i khams so//bcom ldan 'das me'i khams kyang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma 'dra gzhan ma lags te/me'i khams nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang me'i khams so//bcom
310a7('bum): pAR+Sha 'das rlung gi khams kyang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/rlung gi khams nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang rlung gi khams so//bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i
310b1('bum): khams kyang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams so//bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa'i
310b2('bum): khams kyang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so//bcom ldan 'das ma rig
310b3('bum): pa'ang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/mi reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang ma rig pa'i//bcom ldan 'das 'du byed kyang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan
310b4('bum): ma lags te/'du byed nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang 'du byed do//bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/rnam par shes pa nyid/
310b5('bum): kyang sgyu ma/sgyu mi nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o//bcom ldan 'das ming dang gzugs kyang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ming dang gzugs nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu
310b6('bum): ma nyid kyang ming dang gzugs so//bcom ldan 'das skye mched drug kyang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma legs te/skye mched drug nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang skye mched
310b7('bum): drug go/bcom ldan 'das reg pa'ang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang reg pa'o//bcom ldan 'das tsher ba'ang gzhan ma
311a1('bum): lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang tshor ba'o//bcom ldan 'das sred pa'ang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang ga nan/
311a2('bum): ma lags te/sred pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang sred pa'o//bcom ldan 'das len pa'ang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/len pa nyid kyang sgyu maM/sgyu ma
311a3('bum): nyid kyang len pa'o//bcom ldan 'das srid pa'ang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/srid pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang srid pa'o//bcom ldan 'das skye ba'ang
311a4('bum): gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/skye ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang skye ba'o//bcom ldan 'das rga shi'ang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/
311a5('bum): rga shi nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang rga shi'o//bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
311a6('bum): pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/tshul
311a7('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang
311b1('bum): gzhan ma lags te/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan ma lags/
311b2('bum): sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
311b3('bum): pa'ang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das
311b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
311b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das nang stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/nang stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu mi nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do//bcom ldan 'das phyi stong pa
311b6('bum): nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/phyi stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid do//bcom ldan 'das phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags//
311b7('bum): sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid do//bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang
312a1('bum): gzhan ma lags te/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid cang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang stong pa nyid spyong pa nyid do//bcom ldan 'das chen po stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/
312a2('bum): sgrasgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/chen po stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid do//bcom ldan 'das don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'
312a3('bum): gzhan ma lags te/don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid do//bcom ldan 'das 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan
312a4('bum): ma lags te/'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid do//bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma
312a5('bum): lags te/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do//bcom ldan 'das mtho' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang/
312a6('bum): gzhan ma lags te/mtha' las 'das po stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do//bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid
312a7('bum): kyang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang thog ma deng ba ma med pa stong pa nyid do//bcom ldan
312b1('bum): 'das dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do//bcom ldan 'das
312b2('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//bcom ldan 'das chos
312b3('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/chos thams cad stong po nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid de//bcom ldan
312b4('bum): 'das rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan mi lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/rang gi mtshan nyid stong po nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa
312b5('bum): nyid do//bcom ldan 'das mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang mi dmigs pa
312b6('bum): stong pa nyid do//bcom ldan 'das dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang dang
312b7('bum): po med pa stong pa nyid do//bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong
313a1('bum): pa nyid do//bcom ldan 'das dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
313a2('bum): kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do//bcom ldan 'das dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/dran pa
313a3('bum): bar bzhag pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams so//bcom ldan 'das yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang gzhan mi lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags
313a4('bum): te/yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams so//bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma
313a5('bum): lags te/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so//bcom ldan 'das dbang po rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags
313a6('bum): te/dbang po nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang dbang po rnams so//bcom ldan 'das stobs rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/stabs nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu
313a7('bum): ma nyid kyang stobs rnams so//bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma
313b1('bum): nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so//bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'ang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/'phags pa'i lam yan lag
313b2('bum): brgyad pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags
313b3('bum): te/'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so//bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags
313b4('bum): te/bsam gtan nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams so//bcom ldan 'das tshad med pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/tshad med pa nyid
313b5('bum): kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang tshad med pa rnams so//bcom ldan 'das gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/gzugs
313b6('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so//bcom ldan 'das rnam par thar pa brgyad kyang gzhan ma lags//
313b7('bum): sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/rnam par thar pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par thar pa rnams so//bcom ldan 'das mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
314a1('bum): dbu'ang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i
314a2('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so//bcom ldan 'das rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'ang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags
314a3('bum): te/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /
314a4('bum): smon pa med pa'o//bcom ldan 'das mngon par shes pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/mngon par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid
314a5('bum): kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so//bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma legs te/ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid
314a6('bum): kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams so//bcom ldan 'das gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang gzungs
314a7('bum): kyi sgo rnams so//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid kyang sgyu ma//
314b1('bum): sgyu ma nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so//bcom ldan 'das mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/mi 'jigs pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu
314b2('bum): me nyid kyang mi 'jigs pa rnams so//bcom ldan 'das so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang skye
314b3('bum): ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so//bcom ldan 'das snying rje chen po'ang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/snying rje chen po nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu
314b4('bum): ma nyid kyang snying rje chen po'o//bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
314b5('bum): nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so//bcom ldan 'das rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'ang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/rgyun du
314b6('bum): zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o//bcom ldan 'das lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma
314b7('bum): lags te/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o//bcom ldan 'das phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang gzhan ma lags//
315a1('bum): sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o//bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa nyid kyang
315a2('bum): gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/dgra bcom pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang dgra bcom pa nyid do//bcom ldan 'das rang byang chub kyang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang
315a3('bum): gzhan ma lags te/rang byang chub nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang rang byang chub bo//bcom ldan 'das lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma
315a4('bum): lags te/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang lom gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid do//bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags//
315a5('bum): sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor
315a6('bum): de ji snyam du sems/sgyu ma la skye ba'am 'gag pa yod dam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du
315a7('bum): sems/sgyu ma la kun nas nyon mongs pa'am rnam par byang ba yod dam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du
315b1('bum): sems/gang la skye ba med cing 'gag pa med pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing /rnam par byang ba med pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ram/rnam pa bams
315b2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
315b3('bum): stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po 'di dag la 'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya bar 'du shes dang /brda dang /gdags pa dang /tha snyad
315b4('bum): du bya ba yin nam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/'du shes dang /brda dang /gdags
315b5('bum): pa dang /tha snyad tsam gyis nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po skye ba 'am 'gag pa 'am kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/rnam par byung bar dmigs par 'gyur ram/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das
315b6('bum): de ni mi 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/gang la 'du shes med cing /brda med pa dang /gdags pa med pa dang /tha snyad med pa dang /ming
315b7('bum): med pa dang /ming du gdags pa med pa dang /lus med pa dang /lus kyi las med pa dang /ngag med pa dang /ngag gi las med pa dang /yid med pa dang /yid kyi las med pa dang /skye ba
316a1('bum): med pa dang /'gag pa med pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /rnam par byang ba med pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing /rnam pa thams
316a2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
316a3('bum): sprul pa/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing /mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
316a4('bum): nyid du 'byung ngo //rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad du gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal te/shes rab kyi pha
316a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/sgyu ma'i skyes bus bslabs pa ltar/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bslab par
316a6('bum): bgyi'o//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di lta ste/phung po lnga po de nyid sgyu ma'i skyes bur rig par bgyi ba sha stag go//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
316a7('bum): rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/phung po lnga po 'di dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/gsol pa//
316b1('bum): ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro// ci'i slad du nan/bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di nga sa po rnams ma ba mchis pa'i dang bdon to/dngas po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhinang
316b2('bum): nidamigs su ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/rmi la mu lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing //
316b3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rmi lam ni dngos po ma
316b4('bum): mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs su ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/sgyu ma lta bu'i phung
316b5('bum): po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lnga bsgrubs shing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro//de ci'i slad
316b6('bum): du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar sgyu ma ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs su ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
316b7('bum): stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/sgra brnyan lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur
317a1('bum): rAm/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar sgra brnyan ni/dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin to/
317a2('bum): dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs su ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/mig yor lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes
317a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan
317a4('bum): 'das de ni 'di ltar mig yor ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs su ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab
317a5('bum): 'byor de ji snyam du sems/chu zla lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lnga bslabs shing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram+ba/gsol pa/
317a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar chu zla ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs
317a7('bum): su ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/smig rgyu lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing /
317b1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar smig rgyu ni dngos po ma mchis
317b2('bum): pa'i rang bzhin te/dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs su ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/sprul pa lta bu'i phung po lnga po de
317b3('bum): dag/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom
317b4('bum): ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar sprul pa ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs su ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de
317b5('bum): ni 'di ltar gzugs ni rmi lam lta bu/tshor ba ni rmi lam lta bu/'du shes ni rmi lam lta bu/'du byed ni rmi lam lta bu/rnam par shes pa ni rmi lam lta bu ste/rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de
317b6('bum): ni dbang po drug go/de ni phung po lnga'o//de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//stong pa nyid stong
317b7('bum): pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//'dus ma byas
318a1('bum): stong du nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs sa//mtha' las 'das pa spyong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//thog ma dang bam+b+ha me pa stod pa nyid kyi rgyur mi dmigs so//dor dwa
318a2('bum): med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir
318a3('bum): mi dmigs so//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//dngos po
318a4('bum): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmimyigs so//rab 'byor gzugs ni sgyu ma lta bu/tshor ba ni sgyu ma lta bu/'du shes ni sgyu ma lta bu/'du byed ni sgyu mu lta bu/rnam par shes
318a5('bum): pa ni sgyu ma lta bu ste/rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go//de ni phung po lnga'o//de dag ni ning stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//
318a6('bum): phyi na stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs
318a7('bum): so/'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//thog ma dang tha ma med pa
318b1('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//drar ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir mo dmigs so//chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//
318b2('bum): rarung gI mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi
318b3('bum): phyir mi dmigs so//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//rab 'byor gzugs ni sku brnyan lta bu/tshor ba ni sgra brnyan lta bu/'du shes ni sgra bad+ha na lta bu/
318b4('bum): 'du byed ni sgra brnyan lta bu/rnam par shes pa ni sgra brnyan lta bu ste/rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug ga/de ni phung po lnga'o//de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs
318b5('bum): so//phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//
318b6('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
318b7('bum): nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmig
319a1('bum): sa//chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//
319a2('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//rab 'byor gzugs ni
319a3('bum): mig yor lta bu/tshor ba ni mig yor lta bu/'du shes ni mig yor lta bu/'du byed ni mig yor lta bu/rnam par shes pa ni mig yor lta bu ste/rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de
319a4('bum): ni dbang po drug go/de ni phung po lnga'o//de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//

319b1('bum): gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir
319b2('bum): mi dmigs so//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//rab 'byor gzugs ni chu zla lta bu/tshor ba ni chu zla lta bu/'du shes ni chu zla lta bu/'du byed ni chu
319b3('bum): zla lta bu/rnam par shes pa ni chu zla lta bu ste/rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go/de ni phung po lnga'o//de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//phyi stong pa nyid
319b4('bum): kyi phyir mi dmigs so//phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//don dam pa stong pa
319b5('bum): nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs
319b6('bum): so//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//chos thams
319b7('bum): cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir
320a1('bum): mi dmigs so//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//rab 'byor gzugs ni smig rgyu lta bu/
320a2('bum): tshor ba ni smig rgyu lta bu/'du shes ni smig rgyu lta bu/'du byed ni smig rgyu lta bu/rnam par shes pa ni smig rgyu lta bu ste/rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go//de ni phung
320a3('bum): po lnga'o//de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi
320a4('bum): dmigs so//chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi
