320a6('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//mi dmigs pa stong pa
320a7('bum): nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi
320b1('bum): dmigs so//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/gzugs ni sprul pa lta bu/tshor ba ni sprul pa lta bu/'du shes ni sprul pa lta bu/'du byed ni sprul pa lta bu/rnam par shes pa ni sprul pa lta bu
320b2('bum): skye/rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go//de ni phung po lnga'o//de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir mI dmigs so//phyi nang stong pa nyid
320b3('bum): kyi phyir mi dmigs so//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmyigs so//chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//'dus byas sto
320b4('bum): pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//mtha' las 'dres pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//thog mA dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi
320b5('bum): dmigs so//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//rang gi mtshan
320b6('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs
320b7('bum): so//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta lags na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar
321a1('bum): du zhugs pas/bstan pa 'di thos na/'jigs shing dngang ba dang /skrag par mi 'gyur lags grang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor gal te
321a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'ang yin la/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la thabs kyang mi mkhas pa zhig ste/dge ba'i bshes gnyen
321a3('bum): gyi lag tu'ang ma 'ongs na/'jigs shing dngang ba dang /skrag par yang 'gyur ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bstan pa 'di thos
321a4('bum): na/mi 'jigs mi dngang /mi skrag pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la thabs mkhas pa de gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub
321a5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar
321a6('bum): rtog ste/de mi dmigs so//tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar rtog ste/de mi dmigs so//'du shes mi rtag ces bya bar rtog ste/de mi dmigs so//'du byed mi rtag ces bya bar rtog
321a7('bum): ste/de mi dmigs so//rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar rtog ste/de mi dmigs so//rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
321b1('bum): byiphyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
321b2('bum): dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog ste/de mi dmigs so//tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog ste/de mi dmigs so//'du shes sdug bsngal zhes bya bar
321b3('bum): rtog ste/de mi dmigs so//'du byed sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog ste/de mi dmigs so//rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog ste/de mi dmigs so//rab 'byor 'di ni
321b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
321b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/gzugs bdag med ces bya bar rtog ste/de mi dmigs so//tshor ba bdag
321b6('bum): med ces bya bar rtog ste/de mi dmigs so//'du shes bdag med ces bya bar rtog ste/de mi dmigs so//'du byed bdag med ces bya bar rtog ste/de mi dmigs so//rnam par shes
321b7('bum): pa bdag med ces bya bar rtog ste/de mi dmigs so//rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o//rab 'byor
322a1('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis//
322a2('bum): zugs zhi ba zhes bya bar rtog ste/de mi dmigs so//tshor ba zhi pa zhes bya bar rtog ste/de mi dmigs so//'du shes zhi ba zhes bya bar rtog ste/de mi dmigs so//'du byed
322a3('bum): zhi bI zhes bya bar rtog ste/de mi dmigs so//rnam par shes pa zhi pa zhes bya bar rtog ste/de mi dmigs so//rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
322a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa
322a5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/gzugs stong zhes bya bar rtog ste/de mi dmigs so//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis tshor ba
322a6('bum): stong zhes bya bar rtog ste/de mi dmigs so//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/'du shes stong zhes bya bar rtog ste/de mi dmigs so//rnam
322a7('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/'du byed stong zhes bya bar rtog ste/de mi dmigs so//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis//
322b1('bum): na par shes pa stong zhes bya bar rtog s+ho/de mi dmigs so//ra 'byur dri na byang chub snyoms drab mas dang can pa shes ky-i parab tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thangs mdzes
322b2('bum): ba'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis
322b3('bum): gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya bar rtog ste/de mi dmigs so//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/norab mtshan ma mod ces bya bar rtog ste/de mi
322b4('bum): dmigs s+ho//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/'du shes mtshan ma med ces bya bar rtog ste/dri mi dmigs s+ho//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
322b5('bum): dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/'du byed mtshan ma med ces bya bar rtog ste/de mi dmigs so//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/rnam par shes pa
322b6('bum): mtshan ma med ces bya bar rtog ste/de mi dmigs so//rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o//
322b7('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/gzugs
323a1('bum): smon pa med ces bya bar rtog ste/de mi dmigs so//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/tshor ba smon pa med ces bya bar rtog ste/de mi
323a2('bum): dmigs so//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/'du shes smon pa med ces bya bar rtog ste/de mi dmigs so//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
323a3('bum): dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/'du byed smon pa med ces bya bar rtog ste/de mi dmigs so//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/rnam par shes pa
323a4('bum): smon pa med ces bya bar rtog ste/de mi dmigs so//rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o//
323a5('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis//
323a6('bum): gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar rtog ste/de mi dmigs so//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces
323a7('bum): bya bar rtog ste/de mi dmigs so//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/'du shes mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar rtog ste/de mi dmigs so///
323b1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/'du byed mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar rtog ste/de mI dmigs so//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
323b2('bum): pa'i sems kyis/rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar rtog ste/de mi dmigs so//rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
323b3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams
323b4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/gzugs dben zhes bya bar rtog ste/de mi dmigs so//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/tshor ba
323b5('bum): dben zhes bya bar rtog ste/de mi dmigs so//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/'du shes dben zhes bya bar rtog ste/de mi dmigs so//rnam pa
323b6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/'du byed dben zhes bya bar rtog ste/de mi dmigs so//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/rnam par
323b7('bum): shes pa dben zhes bya bar rtog ste/de mi dmigs so//rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas
324a1('bum): pa'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sen sna dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lnga spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
324a2('bum): pa'i yid la bya bas/gzugs mi rtag pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/de mi dmigs so//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshor ba mi rtag pa'i rnam
324a3('bum): par rtog par byed de/de mi dmigs so//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/'du shes mi rtag pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/de mi dmigs so//
324a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/'du byed mi rtag pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/de mi dmigs so//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
324a5('bum): yid la bya bas/rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/de mi dmigs so//rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/shes rab kyi pha
324a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams
324a7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/gzugs sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par rtog par byed de/de mi dmigs so//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
324b1('bum): bas/tshor ba sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par rtog par byed de/de mi dmigs so//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/'du shes sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par rtog par
324b2('bum): byed de/de mi dmigs so//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byangs/'du byed sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par rtog par byed de/dri mi dmigs so//rnam pa thams
324b3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par rtog par byed de/de mi dmigs so//rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
324b4('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//
324b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/gzugs bdag med pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/de mi dmigs so//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
324b6('bum): yid la bya bas tshor ba bdag med pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/de mi dmigs so//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/'du shes bdag med pa'i rnam
324b7('bum): par rtog par byed de/de mi dmigs so//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/'du byed bdag med pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/de mi dmigs so///
325a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/rnam par shes pa bdag med pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/de mi dmigs so//rab 'byor 'di ni
325a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
325a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/gzugs zhi ba'i rnam par rtog par byed de/de mi dmigs so//
325a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/tsher ba zhi ba'i rnam par rtog par byed de/de mi dmigs so//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
325a5('bum): yid la bya bas/'du shes zhi ba'i rnam par rtog par byed de/de mi dmigs so//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/'du byed zhi ba'i rnam par
325a6('bum): rtog par byed do/de mi dmigs so//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/rnam par shes pa zhi ba'i rnam par rtog par byed de/de mi dmigs so//
325a7('bum): rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
325b1('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/gzugs stong pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/de
325b2('bum): mi dmigs so//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/tshor ba stong pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/de mi dmigs so//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
325b3('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/'du shes stong pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/de mi dmigs so//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/'du byed
325b4('bum): stong pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/de mi dmigs so//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/rnam par shes pa stong pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/
325b5('bum): dedo mi dmigs so//rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thebs mkhas pa'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems
325b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/gzugs mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par
325b7('bum): rtog par byed de/de mi dmigs so//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/tshor ba mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de de mi dmigs so//
326a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/'du shes mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/de mi dmigs so//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
326a2('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/'du byed mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/de mi dmigs so//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/
326a3('bum): rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/de mi dmigs so//rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
326a4('bum): spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
326a5('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/gzugs smon pa med pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/de mi dmigs so//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/tshor
326a6('bum): ba smon pa med pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/de mi dmigs so//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/'du shes smon pa med pa'i rnam par rtog par
326a7('bum): byed de/de mi dmigs so//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/'du byed smon pa med pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/de mi dmigs so//
326b1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/rnam par shes pa smon pa med pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/de mi dmigs so//rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
326b2('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thungs mkhas pa'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
326b3('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/gzugs mngon par 'du bya bo med pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/de mi dmigs so//rnam pa thams
326b4('bum): cod mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/de mi dmigs so//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
326b5('bum): yid la bya bas/'du shes mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/de mi dmigs so//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/'du
326b6('bum): byed mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/de mi dmigs so//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/rnam par shes pa mngon par
326b7('bum): 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par rtog par byed do/de mi dmigs so//rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs/
327a1('bum): rnakhas pa'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'argyan tha shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
327a2('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/gzugs dben pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/de mi dmigs so//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/tshor ba
327a3('bum): dben pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/de mi dmigs so//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/'du shes dben pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/de mi
327a4('bum): dmigs so//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/'du byed dben pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/dri mi dmigs so//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
327a5('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/rnam par shes pa dben pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/de mi dmigs so//rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
327a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o////shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa//bam po bzhi bcu gnyis pa//
327a7('bum): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar rtog pa de 'di snyam du sems te/sems can thams cad la gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
327b1('bum): gyis chos bstan to//gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to//gzugs bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to//gzugs
327b2('bum): zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to//gzugs stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to//gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
327b3('bum): bapa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to//gzugs smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to//gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
327b4('bum): tshul gyis chos bstan to//gzugs dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to//tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to//tshor ba
327b5('bum): sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to//tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to//tshor bzhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs
327b6('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to//tshor ba stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to//tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to//
327b7('bum): tshor ba smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to//tsher ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to//tshor ba dben zhes
328a1('bum): bya bar dri mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to//'du shes mi rtag ces bya bar da me dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to//'jugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar
328a2('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to//'du shes bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to//'du shes zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
328a3('bum): chos bstan to//'du shes stong zhes bya bar de mi dmags pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to//'du shes mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to//'du
328a4('bum): shes smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to//'du shes mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to//'du shes
328a5('bum): dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to//'du byed mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to//'du byed sdug bsngal zhes bya bar
328a6('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to//'du byed bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to//'du byed zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
328a7('bum): chos bstan to//'du byed stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to//'du byed mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to//'dradu
328b1('bum): byed smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to//'du byed mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to//'du byed dben zhes
328b2('bum): byA bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to//rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar dri mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to//rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de
328b3('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to//rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to//rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
328b4('bum): tshul gyis chos bstan to//rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de mI dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan te//rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
328b5('bum): chos bstan to//rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to//rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
328b6('bum): tshul gyis chos bstan to//rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to snyam mo//rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
328b7('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mi 'jigs mi dang skrag par mi 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
329a1('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/gzugs gang mi rtag pa'i rnam par
329a2('bum): yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do//nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/gzugs gang sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa
329a3('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do//nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/gzugs gang bdag med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs
329a4('bum): pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do//nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/gzugs grang zhi ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la
329a5('bum): byed do//nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/gzugs gang stong pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do//nyan thos
329a6('bum): dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/gzugs gang mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do//nyan thos dang
329a7('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/gzugs gang smon pa med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do//nyan thos dang rang sangs
329b1('bum): rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/gzugs gang mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa dri mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yod la byed do//nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid
329b2('bum): la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/gzugs gang dben pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do//nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas//
329b3('bum): tshor ba gang mi rtag pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do//nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/tshor ba gang sdug bsngal ba'i rnam
329b4('bum): par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do//nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/tshor ba gang bdag med pa'i rnam par yad la byed pa de mi
329b5('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do//nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/tshor ba gang zhi ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la
329b6('bum): byed do//nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/tshor ba gang stong pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do//nyan thos dang rang
329b7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/tshor ba gang mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do//nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
330a1('bum): kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/tshor ba gang smon pa med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do//nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
330a2('bum): kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/tshor ba gang mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do//nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
330a3('bum): kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/tshor ba gang dben pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do//nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi
330a4('bum): ldan pas/'du shes gang mi rtag pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do//nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas//
330a5('bum): 'du shes gang sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do//nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/'du shes gang
330a6('bum): bdag med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do//nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/'du shes gang zhi ba'i rnam
330a7('bum): par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do//nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/'du shes gang stong pa'i rnam par yid la byed
330b1('bum): pade mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do//nyan thos dang sangs rgyas kyi spyod la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/'du gas ga mtshan ma myod pa'i rnam par spod pyod pa dri mi dmigs
330b2('bum): 'i tshul gyis yid la byed do//nyan thos dang rang spangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/'du shes gang smon pa med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
330b3('bum): yid la byed do//nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/'du shes gang mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid
330b4('bum): la byed do//nyan thos drang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/'du shes gang dben pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do//nyan thos
330b5('bum): dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/'du byed gang mi rtag pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do//nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi
330b6('bum): yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/'du byed gang sdug bsngalnga ba'i rnam par yid la byed pade mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do//nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang
330b7('bum): mi ldan pas/'du byed gang bdag med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do//nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/
331a1('bum): 'du byed gang zhi ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do//nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/'du byed
331a2('bum): gang stong pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do//nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/'du byed gang mtshan ma med
331a3('bum): pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do//nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/'du byed gang smon pa med pa'i rnam par
331a4('bum): yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do//nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/'du byed gang mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par
331a5('bum): yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do//nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/'du byed gang dben pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi
331a6('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do//nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/rnam par shes pa gang mi rtag pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i
331a7('bum): tshul gyis yid la byed do//nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/rnam par shes pa gang sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i
331b1('bum): tshul gyis yid la byed do//nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/rnam par shes pa gang bdag med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la
331b2('bum): byed do//nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/rnam par shes pa gang zhi ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do//nyan thos drang
331b3('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/rnam par shes pa gang stong pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do//nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid
331b4('bum): la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/rnam par shes pa gang mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do//nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang
331b5('bum): mi ldan pas/rnam par shes pa gang smon pa med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do//nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/
331b6('bum): rnam par shes pa gang mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do//nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas//
331b7('bum): rnam par shes pa gang dben pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do//rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi
332a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa nyams pa med pa ste/de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gzhan
332a2('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/chos de dag la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang /sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang /bdag med pa'i
332a3('bum): rnam pa dang /zhi ba'i rnam pa dang /stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dang /mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang /smon pa med pa'i rnam pa dang /mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam pa dang /dben pa'i
332a4('bum): rnam par rtog par byed pa dang /bzod pa dang /mos pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems
332a5('bum): dpa' chen po mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa
332a6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
332a7('bum): yid la bya bas/gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/gzugs bdag med
332b1('bum): ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ste/gzugs ni zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog
332b2('bum): go/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/gzugs stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
332b3('bum): pa'i yid la bya bas/gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bos/gzugs
332b4('bum): smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de
332b5('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/gzugs dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/
332b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad me khyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/cher bo mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
332b7('bum): bya bas/tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/tshor ba bdag med ces
333a1('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis///
333a2('bum): rab tu rtog go/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/tshor ba stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
333a3('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/tshor ba sgon
333a4('bum): pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/tsher ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi
333a5('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go//
333a6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/'du shes mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
333a7('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/'du shes sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/'du shes
333b1('bum): bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/'du shes zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu
333b2('bum): rtog go//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/'du shes stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
333b3('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/'du shes mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/'du shes
333b4('bum): smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/'du shes mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi
333b5('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/'du shes dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go//rnam pa
333b6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/'du byed mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
333b7('bum): bya bas/'du byed sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/'du byed bdag med ces bya bar
334a1('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/'du byed zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu
334a2('bum): rtog go/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/'du byed stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
334a3('bum): pa'i yid la bya bas/'du byed mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/'du byed smon pa meng
334a4('bum): ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/'du byed mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
334a5('bum): tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/'du byed dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/rnam pa thams cad
334a6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
334a7('bum): bya bas/rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/rnam par shes pa
334b1('bum): bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab
334b2('bum): tu rtog go//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /
334b3('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/rnam par
334b4('bum): shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces
334b5('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu
334b6('bum): rtog go/de ltar de dag la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/mi gtong zhing /brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
334b7('bum): de'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub
335a1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyod pa'i tshe/nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byangs/gzugs mi rtan
335a2('bum): rjes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi glegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi skangs
335a3('bum): mi 'byed pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod po'i tshe/namA rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/
335a4('bum): gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su
335a5('bum): 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
335a6('bum): yid la bya bas/gzugs bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /nyan thos dang /rong spangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /mi dge ba de ma yin pa
335a7('bum): byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mo 'byed pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
335b1('bum): dadang ldan pa'i yod 'argyas/bzlags gnas bya bar desod mogs pa'i tshu rgyas rtagacong /nyan sa da stongasangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i rnyed la bya ba dang /mi ge bdon rin dung
335b2('bum): chu kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go ma 'byed pa dang /byang chub se sa dpa' sems dang 'chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgyed pa'i tshe/nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
335b3('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/gzugs stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /mi dge bde ma yon pa byang chub
335b4('bum): kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/nAm rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
335b5('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/gzugs mtshon ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang mi dgod de ma yin pa
335b6('bum): byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
335b7('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/gzugs smon pa med ces bya bar ngo mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /mi dge bdom
336a1('bum): rin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi ga mi 'byed pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen po she rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'am/
336a2('bum): na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byangs/gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /nyan thos dang rang sangs
336a3('bum): rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
336a4('bum): kyipha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/gzugs dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /nyan
336a5('bum): thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go me 'byed pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
336a6('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/nur rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/tshor po m+me r+d+ha ga ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i rgyal gyi
336a7('bum): rtog cing /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /mi dge bde ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'apyod pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'
336b1('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rangab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'ocha/nam rnam pa thams cad ma byon pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byangs/tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar da mong rigs pa'i tshul
336b2('bum): rtog cing /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /mi dge ba de mi yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems
336b3('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
336b4('bum): gyis rtog cing /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'
336b5('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/tshor bzhi zhes bya bar ngo mi dmigs pa'i tshul
336b6('bum): gyis rtog cing /nyan thos dang /rang spangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang /byang chub sems
336b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/tshor ba stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
337a1('bum): tshul gyis rtog cing /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang //
337a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/tshor ba mtshan ma med
337a3('bum): ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi
337a4('bum): go mi 'byed pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/nA ma rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/
337a5('bum): tshor ba smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su
337a6('bum): 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems drapa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
337a7('bum): pa'i yid la bya bas/tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /mi
337b1('bum): dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bregs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/nam rnam pa thams
337b2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'o yid la bya ba dang /mi dge ba de
337b3('bum): ma yin pa byang chub kyi glegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/nam rnam pa thams cad
337b4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/'du shes mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /mi dge ba de
337b5('bum): ma yin pa byang chub kyi glegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/nam rnam pa thams cad
337b6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/'du shes sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /mi dge
337b7('bum): ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/nam rnam pa thams
338a1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/'du shes bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang ldan
338a2('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba dang /mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
338a3('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/nA ma rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/'du shes zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /nyan thos dang rang sangs
338a4('bum): rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
338a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/nAm rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/'du shes stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /nyan
338a6('bum): thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems
338a7('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/'du shes mtshon ma med ces bya bar de mi dmin
338b1('bum): pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang /byang chub
338b2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/nAm rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid dang ldan pa'i yod la bya bas/'du shes smon pa med ces bya bar
338b3('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang //
338b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/'du shes mngon par
338b5('bum): 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba
338b6('bum): gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya/
338b7('bum): bas/'du shes dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su
339a1('bum): 'gyur ba gan phyag suM rjod pa dang /b+h+yang rmya sa sa sa smos smra rtson spyod pa'o/rnam pa mas da pa
339a2('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/'du byed mi rtag ces bya bor dri mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /mi dgo
339a3('bum): de ma yin pa byang chub kyi glegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/nam rnam
339a4('bum): bla thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/'du byed sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i
339a5('bum): yid la bya ba dang /mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
339a6('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid lnga byu bas/'du byed bdag mod ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /nyan thos dang rang
339a7('bum): sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
339b1('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/'du byed zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /
339b2('bum): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
339b3('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/'du byed stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog
339b4('bum): cing /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'
339b5('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/'du byed mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi
339b6('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang /
339b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/'du byed smon pa med
340a1('bum): ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su
340a2('bum): 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
340a3('bum): yid la bya bas/'du byed mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /mi dge ba
340a4('bum): de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/nam rnam
340a5('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/'du byed dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dong ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang //
340a6('bum): mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//
340a7('bum): nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /nyan thos dang rang sangs
340b1('bum): rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
340b2('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /nyan thos
340b3('bum): dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
340b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
340b5('bum): rtog cing /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'
340b6('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs
340b7('bum): pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang /byang chub
341a1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/rnam par shes pa stong
341a2('bum): zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi
341a3('bum): 'byed pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/rnam par
341a4('bum): shes pa mtshan mA med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su
341a5('bum): 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
341a6('bum): la bya bas/rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /mi dge ba de ma yin
341a7('bum): pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/nam rnam pa thams
341b1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i
341b2('bum): yid la bya ba dang /mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
341b3('bum): pa'i tshe/nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /nyan thos dang /rang sangs
341b4('bum): rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan
341b5('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ma 'jigs mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
341b6('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/rnam pa 'di ltar rab tu rtog ste/gzugs kyi stong pa nyid
341b7('bum): kyis/gzugs stong pa ma yin gyi/gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so//tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis/tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/tshor ba nyid kyang
342a1('bum): stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o//'du shes kyi stong pa nyid kyis/'du shes stong pa ma yin gyi/'du shes nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid
342a2('bum): kyang 'du shes so//'du byed kyi stong pa nyid kyis/'du byed stong pa ma yin gyi/'du byed nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed do//rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid
342a3('bum): kyis/rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o//mig gi stong pa nyid kyis/mig stong pa ma yin
342a4('bum): gyi/mig nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang mig go/rna ba'i stong pa nyid kyis/rna ba stong pa ma yin gyi/rna ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'o//
342a5('bum): sna'i stong pa nyid kyis/sna stong pa ma yin gyi/sna nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang sna'o//lce'i stong pa nyid kyis/lce stong pa ma yin gyi/lce nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//
342a6('bum): stong pa nyid kyang lce'o//lus kyi stong pa nyid kyis/lus stong pa ma yin gyi/lus nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang lus so//yid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/yid stong pa
342a7('bum): ma yin gyi/yid nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang yid do//gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis/gzugs stong pa ma yin gyi/gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa
342b1('bum): nyid kyang gzugs so//sgra'i stong pa nyid kyis sgra stong bla ma yin gyi/sgra nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang sgra'o//dri'i stong pa nyid kyis/dri stong pa m+bu yin gyi/dri nyid kyang stong /
342b2('bum): pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang dri'o//ro'i stong pa nyid kyis/ro stong pa ma yin gyi/ro nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang ro'o//reg gi stong pa nyid kyis/reg stong pa ma yin
342b3('bum): gyi/reg nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang rig go/chos kyi stong pa nyid kyis/chos stong pa ma yin gyi/chos nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang chos so//mig gi rnam
342b4('bum): par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o//rna
342b5('bum): ba'i rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o//
342b6('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'o//
342b7('bum): lce'i rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o//lus
343a1('bum): na da ldanam pa nas pa skong ngam na /smra rna par shes pa nyi rlung nga//dz+nyA nga
343a2('bum): par shes pa'o//nyid kyi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin ni/ljid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//snang pa nyid mi
343a3('bum): kyi rnam par shes pa'o//mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa mi yin sti/mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid
343a4('bum): kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o//rna ba'i 'dus te rag pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma smin gyi/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong
343a5('bum): byung na du'i dus twA~M ga d+hA//'i rjes pa'i pa ny-id d+hI/smra dus te ga pa bI ma smin d+hi/rgyu'i dus te shrI pa nyid stong pa nyid do//stong ba
343a6('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o//lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/lha'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyi
343a7('bum): spyi'i 'dus te reg pa'o//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/lus kyi 'dus te rig pa spyong pa ma yin gyi/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa
343b1('bum): ts+tshed kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o//srid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/yid kyi 'dus te rog pa stong pa ma yin gyi/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang skyong ba nyid do//stong pa
343b2('bum): nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o//mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/mig gi 'dus te reg
343b3('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis/rna ba'i 'dus
343b4('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o//sna'i
343b5('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong
343b6('bum): pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o//lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/lce'i 'dus
343b7('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis/lus kyi
344a1('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg
344a2('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
344a3('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o//sa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid kyis/sa'i khams stong pa ma yin gyi/sa'i khams
344a4('bum): nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang snga'i khams so//chu'i khams kyi stong pa nyid kyis/chu'i khams stong pa mi yin gyi/chu'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa
344a5('bum): nyid kyang chu'i khams so//me'i khams kyi stong pa nyid kyis/me'i khams stong pa ma yin gyi/me'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang me'i khams so//
344a6('bum): rlung gi khams kyi stong pa nyid kyis/rlung gi khams stong pa ma yin gyi/rlung gi khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang rlung gi khams so//nam mkha'i khams kyi
344a7('bum): stong pa nyid kyis/nam mkha'i khams stong pa ma yin gyi/nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams so//rnam par shes pa'i
344b1('bum): kyi stong pa nyid rjes/rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa ma pan rje/rnam par zlos pa'o/khams da du//rlung pa rnam pa shes pa ldar ro//
344b2('bum): rlig pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ma rig pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ma rig pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang mi rig pa'o//'du byed kyi stong pa nyid kyis/'du byed stong pa ma yin
344b3('bum): gyi/'du byed nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed do//rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong
344b4('bum): pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o//ming dang gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ming dang gzugs stong pa ma yin gyi/ming dang gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong
344b5('bum): pa nyid kyang ming dang gzugs so//skye mched drug gi stong pa nyid kyis/skye mched drug stong pa ma yin gyi/skye mched drug nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang skye mched drug go/
344b6('bum): reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang rig pa'o//tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis/tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/tshor ba nyid
344b7('bum): kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o//sred pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/sred pa stong pa ma yin gyi/sred pa nyid cang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang srid pa'o//len pa'i stong
345a1('bum): pa nyid kyis/len pa stong ba ma yin te/len panyid kyang stong //stong pa nyid kyang ljon par//srod pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/srong ba stong ba ma smin gyi/srid pa/
345a2('bum): nyid ljang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang srong ba'o//skye ba'i stong pa nyid kyis/skye ba stong pa ma yin gyi/skye ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang skye ba'o//rga shi'i stong pa nyid kyis
345a3('bum): rga shi stong pa ma yin gyi/rga shi nyid kyang stong pa nyid de//stong pa nyid kyang rga shi'o//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa ma yin gyi/
345a4('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
345a5('bum): po stong pa ma yin gyi/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis
345a6('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa ma yin gyi/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
345a7('bum): phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa ma yin gyi/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
345b1('bum): tu phyin pa'o//bsam gtan gyi pha rab tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/bas mA gtan gying rol tu phyin pa stong pa ma yin gyi/bsam gtan rdzi pha rol tu phyinangapa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid
345b2('bum): kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa ma yin gyi/shos rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa
345b3('bum): nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//nang stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/nang stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/nang stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang
345b4('bum): nang stong pa nyid do//phyi stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/byi stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/phyi stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid do//phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi stong pa
345b5('bum): nyid kyis/phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/stong pa nyid stong
345b6('bum): pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong po nyid do//chen po stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/chen po stong pa nyid stong pa mi
345b7('bum): yin gyi/chen po stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid do//don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/don
346a1('bum): dam pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid do//'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/'dus byas stong pa nyid stong pa ma
346a2('bum): yin gyi/'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid do//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin
346a3('bum): gyi/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/mtha' las 'das pa stong
346a4('bum): pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi
346a5('bum): stong pa nyid kyis/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong
346a6('bum): pa nyid do//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang dor ba med pa
346a7('bum): stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi spyong pa nyid kyis/rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/rang bzhir stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong
346b1('bum): panyid do//chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang chos thams
346b2('bum): cad stong pa nyid do//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa
346b3('bum): nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa
346b4('bum): nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid do//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/dngos po med pa stong pa
346b5('bum): nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
346b6('bum): kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/
346b7('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/dran pa nye bar
347a1('bum): bzhag pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams so//yang dag par spong ba'i
347a2('bum): stong pa nyid kyis/yang dag par spong ba rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams so//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
347a3('bum): pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so//dbang po'i stong pa
347a4('bum): nyid kyis/dbang po rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/dbang po nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang dbang po rnams so//stobs kyi stong pa nyid kyis/stobs rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/
347a5('bum): stobs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang stobs rnams so//byang chub kyi yan lag gi stong pa nyid kyis/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/byang chub kyi yan
347a6('bum): lag nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad

347b1('bum): stong pa nyid kyis/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so//bsam gtan gyi
347b2('bum): stong pa nyid kyis/bsnam gtan rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/bsam gtan nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams so//tshad med pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/tshad med pa

347b7('bum): do/stong pa nyid kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/rnam
348a1('bum): par thar pa'i sgra stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa stong pa ma yin gyi/rnam par thar pa'i sgra stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa

348a3('bum): shes pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/mngon par shes pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so//ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ting nge 'dzin

351b2('bum): thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la rnam par shes pa stong zhes

351b4('bum): yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/gang de la gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi
351b5('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor
351b6('bum): mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
351b7('bum): dar/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la 'du shes mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
352a1('bum): dge ba'i rna ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//
352a2('bum): gang de la 'du byed mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan
352a3('bum): thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i
352a4('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang
352a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/gang de la gzugs smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa
352a6('bum): ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la tshor ba smon pa
352a7('bum): med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs

352b2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la 'du byed smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul

352b6('bum): la gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par//

353a3('bum): par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la 'du byed mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
353a4('bum): cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la
353a5('bum): rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
353a6('bum): par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sngar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen
353a7('bum): ni/gang de la gzugs dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan
353b1('bum): thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
353b2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la 'du shes dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs

353b5('bum): kyi sa'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
353b6('bum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa ste/rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
353b7('bum): dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la mig mi rtag ces bya/
