358b5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la yid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi
358b6('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi slar yongs su
358b7('bum): bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/gang de la mig dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
359a1('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
359a2('bum): bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la rna ba dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsab thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/
359a3('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la sna dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
359a4('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyad kyi sar yongs su bsngar mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la lce dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs
359a5('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyen thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi
359a6('bum): 'jug pa'o//gang de la lus dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/
359a7('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la yid dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba
359b1('bum): thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//rang 'gyur gzhan yang byang chung sems dpa'//
359b2('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/gang de la gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rna ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
359b3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la sgra mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
359b4('bum): dge ba'i rtsab thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi ser yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o//gang de la dri mi rtag ces bya
359b5('bum): bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
359b6('bum): bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//deng de la ro mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan
359b7('bum): thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la reg mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
360a1('bum): klung rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang dri la cho ma
360a2('bum): rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mA ga togs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang
360a3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/gang de la gzugs sdug
360a4('bum): bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang
360a5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la sgra sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
360a6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la dri sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
360a7('bum): gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//
360b1('bum): gang de la ro sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/

360b3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la chos sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
360b4('bum): gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o///
360b5('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/gang de la gzugs bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing //
360b6('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la sgra bdag
360b7('bum): med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas
361a1('bum): kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la dri bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams

361a7('bum): dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/gang de la gzugs zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
361b1('bum): gtogs par/nyan pos kyis 'am/rangasangs rgyas kyi sa yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//dang dul swA hrI zhes bya ba ng+ge mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos skyon cing /dge ba'i rgya ba rnams
361b2('bum): cang kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sa yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la dri zhi zhes bya bar dri mi dmigs pa'i tshul

361b4('bum): de la rlo zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs

365a6('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos
365a7('bum): kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la lce'i rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa
365b1('bum): ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la lus kyi rnam par shes pa mi rtag
365b2('bum): ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
365b3('bum): yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
365b4('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i
365b5('bum): bshes gnyen ni/gang de la mig gi rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
365b6('bum): nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
365b7('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug
366a1('bum): pa'o//gang de la sna'i rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos snyan cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
366a2('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyis 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi ser yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de rgya'i rnam yeshes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
366a3('bum): chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang
366a4('bum): del lus kyi rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsang thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi gtogs par/
366a5('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
366a6('bum): cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//rab
366a7('bum): 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/gang de la mig gi rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar nga mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
366b1('bum): chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la rna
366b2('bum): ba'i rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma de togs par/nyan thos kyi sa
366b3('bum): 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la sna'i rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
366b4('bum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la lce'i rnam par shes pa bdag med ces
366b5('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
366b6('bum): su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la lus kyi rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
366b7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
367a1('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyis 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
367a2('bum): bsngar mi 'jug pa'o///shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgyu pa//bam po bzhi bcu bzhi pa//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
367a3('bum): po'i dge ba'i ye shes gnyen ni/glang del mig gi rnam par shes pa zhe zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos sbyin cing /dge ba'i rtsabab mos cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
367a4('bum): nyid mu gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la rna ba'i rnam shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi de nigs nga'i tshul gyis chos
367a5('bum): ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de
367a6('bum): la sna'i rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi
367a7('bum): sa 'im/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la lce'i rnam par shes bzhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
367b1('bum): tsa kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs drar/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyisararwa yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la lus kyi rnam par shes bzhi zhes bya bar
367b2('bum): dri mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dag pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyis 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sngar yongs su bsngor
367b3('bum): mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la yid kyi rnam par shes bzhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/
367b4('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sa rwa yongs su bsnor mi 'jug pa'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshos gnyen ni/gang de la
367b5('bum): mig gi rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa
367b6('bum): 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi ser yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
367b7('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la sna'i rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar
368a1('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas
368a2('bum): kyisar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la lce'i rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
368a3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de mi
368a4('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
368a5('bum): bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
368a6('bum): nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i
368a7('bum): bshes gnyen ni/gang de la mig gi rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
368b1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
368b2('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug
368b3('bum): pa'o//gang de la sna'i rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigasnga pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma

368b7('bum): thos kyi sa'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing //
369a1('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsnor myi 'jug pa'o//

369a3('bum): gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//
369a4('bum): gang de la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/
369a5('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la sna'i rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i
369a6('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la lce'i rnam par
369a7('bum): shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/
369b1('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyis yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la lus kyi rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces babyur de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos snyan cing /dge ba'i rna ba thams cad kyang rnam
369b2('bum): 'ams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyis 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sa yongs su bsngar mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs

369b4('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa'i dge pa'i bshes gnyen ni/gang da la mig zhi rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba nga dmigs pa
369b5('bum): tshul gyis chos sbyin cing /dge ba'i rgyabathams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi snga 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyisar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o//
369b6('bum): nga da lan 'i rnam par shes pa mngan pa du byab med ces bya ba da mi ma bus pa'i tshu gyis rgyas sbyin cing /dge pa thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad rkyen pa nyid ma
369b7('bum): par/nyan thos kyis 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi so yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la sna'i rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du byad med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyi sachos
370a1('bum): skyon cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyis 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug
370a2('bum): pa'o//gang de la lho'i rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma

370a7('bum): ba'i bshes gnyen ni/gang de la mig gi rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa

371a1('bum): kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa ste/rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dpe ba'i ba shes gnyen du rig par bya'o//
371a2('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshos gnyen ni/gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos

371a4('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi
371a5('bum): sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
371a6('bum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa mi rtag
371a7('bum): ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi
371b1('bum): sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dbye ba'i rdza ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
371b2('bum): panyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos

371b4('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge

371b6('bum): sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid me gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs
371b7('bum): rgyas kyi ser yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa
372a1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal

372a3('bum): yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad

372a6('bum): 'jug pa'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs

372b2('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa bdag med ces bya bar dri mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rnab

372b5('bum): yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
372b6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
372b7('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug
373a1('bum): pa'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/gang de la mig gi 'dus te rog pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs
373a2('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug
373a3('bum): pa'o//gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg bzhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/
373a4('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//grang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa
373a5('bum): ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa zhi
373a6('bum): zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi
373a7('bum): sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
373b1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//grang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshu la
373b2('bum): gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi slar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//rab
373b3('bum): 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
373b4('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la rna ba'i 'dus
373b5('bum): te reg pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs parwa/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang
373b6('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//ga de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa
373b7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya bar de mi
374a1('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi
374a2('bum): sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
374a3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
374a4('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug
374a5('bum): pa'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
374a6('bum): tshul gyis chechos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug
374a7('bum): pa'o//gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
374b1('bum): ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
374b2('bum): chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang
374b3('bum): de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan
374b4('bum): thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge
374b5('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg
374b6('bum): pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang
374b7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/gang de la mig gi 'dus te
375a1('bum): reg pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan
375a2('bum): thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge
375a3('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la sna'i 'dus te
375a4('bum): reg pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa'am/
375a5('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
375a6('bum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa smon
375a7('bum): pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa'am/rang sangs
375b1('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//grang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
375b2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
375b3('bum): dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
375b4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi
375b5('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi ser yongs su bsngor mi
375b6('bum): 'jug pa'o//gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
375b7('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
376a1('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos skyon cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sna 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
376a2('bum): bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
376a3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de
376a4('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
376a5('bum): su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bya bar de mi
376a6('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
376a7('bum): bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
376b1('bum): gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bya bar de ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stan cing /dge
376b2('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sngar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa
376b3('bum): dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
376b4('bum): yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
376b5('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
376b6('bum): chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//rab 'byor
376b7('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
377a1('bum): gyis chas ston cing /dge ba'i rtsab thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyis 'am/rangs ngas rgyas kyis yongs su bsgyu /
377a2('bum): 'jug pa'o//gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
377a3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sra 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi
377a4('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bstod
377a5('bum): mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
377a6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyis 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de tshus kyi 'dus te reg pa lngas byung ba'i tshar ba mi rtag ces
377a7('bum): bar de mi dmigs pa'i chur gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtadang par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyis
377b1('bum): yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ras byung ba'i tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa
377b2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
377b3('bum): po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar dri mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
377b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bsdug
377b5('bum): bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas
377b6('bum): kyi ser yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
377b7('bum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung
378a1('bum): pa'i tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan
378a2('bum): thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
378a3('bum): gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sor yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//
378a4('bum): gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
378a5('bum): nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i
378a6('bum): bshes gnyen ni/gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
378a7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag med ces
378b1('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
378b2('bum): bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
378b3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag med ces bya/
378b4('bum): bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
378b5('bum): su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa
378b6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la yid kyi 'dus te rig pa las byung ba'i tshor ba
378b7('bum): bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas
379a1('bum): kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/gang de la mig gi 'dus te/
379a2('bum): reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi
379a3('bum): sa'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge
379a4('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa
379a5('bum): las byung ba'i tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/
379a6('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba
379a7('bum): thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa
379b1('bum): las byung ba'i tshor bzhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang
379b2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tsher bzhi zhes bya bar dri mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
379b3('bum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
379b4('bum): dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
379b5('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tsher ba
379b6('bum): stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mu gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi
379b7('bum): ser yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam
380a1('bum): pa jams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i
380a2('bum): tshetshor ba stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs
380a3('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
380a4('bum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor
380a5('bum): ba stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas
380a6('bum): kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/glang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i
380a7('bum): tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/
380b1('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsnor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la rna pa'i 'dus te rig pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma tshan ma med ces bya ba de mi dmigs pa'i tshul bas chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa
380b2('bum): thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtags par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i
380b3('bum): tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cade mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang
380b4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba
380b5('bum): thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//glang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa lngas
380b6('bum): byung ba'i tshor ba mtshan mA med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyis
380b7('bum): 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing //
381a1('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//
381a2('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs/
381a3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug
381a4('bum): pa'o//gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
381a5('bum): nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba smon pa med ces bya bar de
381a6('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
381a7('bum): bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam
381b1('bum): pathams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshar ba smon med
381b2('bum): ces bya bad+ma de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rlung sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
381b3('bum): su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshang ba smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam
381b4('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
381b5('bum): po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
381b6('bum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor
381b7('bum): ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/
382a1('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
382a2('bum): gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang
382a3('bum): del lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
382a4('bum): nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med
382a5('bum): ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi
382a6('bum): sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge
382a7('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang
382b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tshes ston cing /
382b2('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te/
382b3('bum): reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa
382b4('bum): 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa

382b6('bum): byung ba'i tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am//
382b7('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa
383a1('bum): kyis ma/rangs sa rgyas ser sangs su smo ste ga 'o//

383b1('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sngar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la rten cing 'brel par 'byung
383b2('bum): bzhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
383b3('bum): yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
383b4('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi snga 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
383b5('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi

384a2('bum): bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa

384a7('bum): gang de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtse ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/
384b1('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i
384b2('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
384b3('bum): pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas
384b4('bum): kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
384b5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge
384b6('bum): ba'i bshes gnyen ni/gang de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
384b7('bum): pa nyid pa gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs

385a2('bum): bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa

385a6('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rlung sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi

385b1('bum): bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/gang de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs

385b4('bum): par/nyan thos kyi sa'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
385b5('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la brtson 'grus kyi pha
385b6('bum): rol tu phyin pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa'am/rang
385b7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
386a1('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la shes rab kyi pha rol
386a2('bum): tu phyin pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs
386a3('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/gang de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes
386a4('bum): bya bar dri mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
386a5('bum): bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
386a6('bum): nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
386a7('bum): chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang
386b1('bum): de la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa
386b2('bum): 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
386b3('bum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi ser yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bya
386b4('bum): bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sarA yongs su

386b6('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//
386b7('bum): gang de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan
387a1('bum): thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngar mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
387a2('bum): cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la brtson
387a3('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyis
387a4('bum): 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba
387a5('bum): thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong
387a6('bum): zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
387a7('bum): yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ne/gang de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma med
387b1('bum): ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
387b2('bum): su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
387b3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
387b4('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o///
387b5('bum): gang de la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
387b6('bum): par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o//gang de la bsam btan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
387b7('bum): ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la shes
388a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
388a2('bum): par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni//
388a3('bum): gang de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par//
388a4('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing //
388a5('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la bzod pa'i pha
388a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa
388a7('bum): 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge
388b1('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol
388b2('bum): tu phyin pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
388b3('bum): bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
388b4('bum): nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes
388b5('bum): gnyen ni/gang de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
388b6('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar du mi
388b7('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug
389a1('bum): pa'o//gang de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
389a2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya/
389a3('bum): bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
389a4('bum): su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam
389a5('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par 'du bya ba
389a6('bum): med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi
389a7('bum): sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/gang de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bya
389b1('bum): bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor
389b2('bum): mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
389b3('bum): gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
389b4('bum): cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la brtson 'grus
389b5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/
389b6('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsnor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
389b7('bum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
390a1('bum): dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sku'am/
390a2('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/gang de la nang stong pa nyid mi rtag
390a3('bum): ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
390a4('bum): yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la phyi stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
390a5('bum): nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la phyi nang stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
390a6('bum): ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la
390a7('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi/
390b1('bum): sa'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la chen po stong du nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
390b2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la don dam pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi
390b3('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug
390b4('bum): pa'o//gang de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtags par/nyan
390b5('bum): thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba
390b6('bum): thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi
390b7('bum): rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi
391a1('bum): sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
391a2('bum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces
391a3('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
391a4('bum): bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
391a5('bum): mA gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
391a6('bum): gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//
391a7('bum): gang de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par//
391b1('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba
391b2('bum): thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi rtag
391b3('bum): ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
391b4('bum): su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
391b5('bum): gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
391b6('bum): chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//rab 'byor gzhan
391b7('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/gang de la nang stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa
392a1('bum): pa thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs parla/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi snar yongs stor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la phyi stong
392a2('bum): pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang
392a3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la phyi nang stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
392a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid me gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes
392a5('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs po'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
392a6('bum): yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la chen po stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs po'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
392a7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la don dam pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi
392b1('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi
392b2('bum): 'jug pa'o//gang de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
392b3('bum): gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
392b4('bum): chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang /
392b5('bum): de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/
392b6('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi ser yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
392b7('bum): ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang
393a1('bum): de la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
393a2('bum): ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
393a3('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi
393a4('bum): 'jug pa'o//gang de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
393a5('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs
393a6('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi
393a7('bum): 'jug pa'o//gang de la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
393b1('bum): nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
393b2('bum): chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sngar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la ngo bo nyid
393b3('bum): stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang
393b4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
393b5('bum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
393b6('bum): dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/gang de la nang stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
393b7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la phyi stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
394a1('bum): gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bskor
394a2('bum): mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la phyi nang stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
394a3('bum): par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
394a4('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la chen po stong
394a5('bum): pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang
394a6('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la don dam pa stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
394a7('bum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid bdag
394b1('bum): med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
394b2('bum): su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
394b3('bum): nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
394b4('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//
394b5('bum): gang de la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
394b6('bum): pApar/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
394b7('bum): cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la rang
395a1('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/

395a4('bum): stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang

395a7('bum): bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
395b1('bum): bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
395b2('bum): par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing //

395b4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/gang de la nang stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa bo thams cad kyang rnam pa
395b5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la phyi stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
395b6('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing /drage ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//
395b7('bum): gang de la phyi nang stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyis

400a6('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sor yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i
