400b1('bum): nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas
400b2('bum): kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
400b3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi
400b4('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs

400b6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma med

401a1('bum): sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa
401a2('bum): ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la ngo bo nyid stong pa
401a3('bum): nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am//
401a4('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing //
401a5('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sor yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//rab 'byor gzhan
401a6('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/gang de la nang stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge
401a7('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la phyi stong pa
401b1('bum): nyid smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs
401b2('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la phyi nang stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa
401b3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar de
401b4('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
401b5('bum): bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la chen po stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
401b6('bum): ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la don dam pa stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
401b7('bum): gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//
402a1('bum): gang de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
402a2('bum): ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
402a3('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi snga 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o///
402a4('bum): gang de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
402a5('bum): gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
402a6('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor
402a7('bum): mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
402b1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar dri mi dmigs pa'i//
402b2('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//
402b3('bum): gang de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ches ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/
402b4('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
402b5('bum): cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la mi
402b6('bum): dmigs pa stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos
402b7('bum): kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge
403a1('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su dasngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la
403a2('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan
403a3('bum): thos kyi sa'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la dngos po meng pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
403a4('bum): ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sor yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//
403a5('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/gang de la nang stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
403a6('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi
403a7('bum): 'jug pa'o//gang de la phyi stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
403b1('bum): mkhyed pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la phyi nang stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs

403b4('bum): ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la chen po stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
403b5('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o///
403b6('bum): gang de la don dam pa stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
403b7('bum): gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
404a1('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i zla ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyis 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
404a2('bum): sngor mi 'jug pa'i//gang de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar ngo mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa

404a4('bum): 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mA gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang
404a5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang dri la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing //
404a6('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la dor ba med
404a7('bum): pa stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par//

404b3('bum): cad stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mA gtogs par/nyan thos
404b4('bum): kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshal gyis chos ston
404b5('bum): cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la mi dmigs
404b6('bum): pa stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos
404b7('bum): kyis 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /

405a2('bum): de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs

406a3('bum): pastong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa
406a4('bum): 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge
406a5('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la dor ba med
406a6('bum): pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am

406b1('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar

406b5('bum): chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//
406b6('bum): gang de la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigaso pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/
406b7('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i
407a1('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la
407a2('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par//
407a3('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/
407a4('bum): gang de la dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
407a5('bum): par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
407a6('bum): chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//
407a7('bum): gang de la dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
407b1('bum): pa/nyan pos kyis 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngod mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge
407b2('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la dran pa nye bar bzhag
407b3('bum): pa rnams stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs
407b4('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
407b5('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams smon pa med
407b6('bum): ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
407b7('bum): yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
408a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la dran pa nye bar bzhag pa
408a2('bum): rnams dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs
408a3('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams bsgom pa'i phyir/de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
408a4('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la yang dag par spong ba rnams mi rtag
408a5('bum): ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas
408a6('bum): kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la yang dag par spong ba rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam
408a7('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la yang dag par spong ba rnams bdag med ces
408b1('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
408b2('bum): nga sngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la yang dag par spong ba rnams zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
408b3('bum): nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la yang dag par spong ba rnams stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
408b4('bum): gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//
408b5('bum): gang de la yang dag par spong ba rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
408b6('bum): par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la yang dag par spong ba rnams smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
408b7('bum): cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la
409a1('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
409a2('bum): nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la yang dag par spong ba rnams dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
409a3('bum): chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la
409a4('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams bsgom pa'i phyir/de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi
409a5('bum): sa'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o////shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa//bam po zhe drug pa//gang de la rdzu 'phrul gyi
409a6('bum): rkang pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/
409a7('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba
409b1('bum): thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bdag
409b2('bum): med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi
409b3('bum): sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
409b4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul

409b6('bum): de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/

410a3('bum): par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /

410a6('bum): 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la dbang po rnams mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad

410b2('bum): yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//grang de la dbang po rnams bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen

413a6('bum): kyi yan lag rnams bsgom pa'i phyir/de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos
413a7('bum): kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston

414b2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i ba shes gnyen ni/gang de la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i rdul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i

414b6('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mA gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la 'phags

415b1('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//
415b2('bum): gang de la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bsgom pa'i phyir/de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
415b3('bum): par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la bsam gtan rnams mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing
415b4('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la bsam
415b5('bum): gtan rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am//
415b6('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la bsam gtan rnams bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
415b7('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid me gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la bsam gtan rnams zhi zhes bya bar de
416a1('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyad kyi sar
416a2('bum): yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la bsam gtan rnams stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
416a3('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la bsam gtan rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
416a4('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi
416a5('bum): 'jug pa'o//gang de la bsam gtan rnams smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa

422b6('bum): rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa'am/
422b7('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la mngon par shes pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba
423a1('bum): thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogasra par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la mngon
423a2('bum): par shes pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
423a3('bum): par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la mngon par shes pa rnams dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigaso ba'i tshul gyis chos
423a4('bum): ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//
423a5('bum): gang de la mngon par shes pa rnams bsgom pa'i phyir/de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
423a6('bum): par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la ting nge 'dzin rnams mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
423a7('bum): cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang
423b1('bum): de la ting nge 'dzin rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos
423b2('bum): kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la ting nge 'dzin rnams bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshulo gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba
423b3('bum): thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//grang de la ting nge 'dzin rnams zhi zhes
423b4('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
423b5('bum): yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la ting nge 'dzin rnams stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
423b6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la ting nge 'dzin rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
423b7('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//
424a1('bum): gang de la ting nge 'dzin rnams smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
424a2('bum): pAr/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la ting nge 'dzin rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
424a3('bum): gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sor yongs su bsngor mi 'jug
424a4('bum): pa'o//gang de lnga ting nge 'dzin rnams dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
424a5('bum): par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sor yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la ting nge 'dzin rnams bsgom pa'i phyir/de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing //
424a6('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la gzungs
424a7('bum): kyi sgo rnams mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/
424b1('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la gzungs kyi sgo rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
424b2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la gzungs kyi sgo rnams bdag med ces bya/
424b3('bum): bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
424b4('bum): yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la gzungs kyi sgo rnams zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
424b5('bum): nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la gzungs kyi sgo rnams stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
424b6('bum): chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams da kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sor yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//
424b7('bum): gang de la gzungs kyi sgo rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par//
425a1('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la gzungs kyi sgo rnams smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
425a2('bum): chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//
425a3('bum): gang de la gzungs kyi sgo rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
425a4('bum): gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la gzungs kyi sgo rnams dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
425a5('bum): ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//
425a6('bum): gang de la gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom pa'i phyir/de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par//
425a7('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni//
425b1('bum): gang de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs//
425b2('bum): par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
425b3('bum): gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//
425b4('bum): gang de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
425b5('bum): gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
425b6('bum): gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang
425b7('bum): de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
426a1('bum): par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mtshan ma med ces bya bar
426a2('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
426a3('bum): yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
426a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
426a5('bum): bcu mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos
426a6('bum): kyis 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing //
426a7('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la de bzhin
426b1('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bsgom pa'i phyir/de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chas ston cing /drug pa'i rnab sems cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan pas
426b2('bum): sa'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang du la mi 'jigs pa bzhi mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tshad ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
426b3('bum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la ma 'jigs pa rnams sdug bsngal
426b4('bum): zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas
426b5('bum): kyi ro yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la mi 'jigs pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa
426b6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sor yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la mi 'jigs pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar de mi
426b7('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sor yongs su
427a1('bum): bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la mi 'jigs pa rnams stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
427a2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la mi 'jigs pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi
427a3('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
427a4('bum): su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la mi 'jigs pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
427a5('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la mi 'jigs pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi
427a6('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
427a7('bum): bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la mi 'jigs pa rnams dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
427b1('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la mi 'jigs pa rnams bsgom pa'i phyir/de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
427b2('bum): gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//
427b3('bum): gang de la so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
427b4('bum): par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
427b5('bum): chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang
427b6('bum): de la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
427b7('bum): par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
428a1('bum): cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor ma
428a2('bum): 'jug pa'o//gang de la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
428a3('bum): nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar do mi
428a4('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
428a5('bum): bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar do mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
428a6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mngon par 'du bya/
428a7('bum): ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang
428b1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
428b2('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bsgom
428b3('bum): pa'i phyir/de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mA gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi
428b4('bum): sngar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la snying rje chen po mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
428b5('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la snying rje chen po sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
428b6('bum): chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de
428b7('bum): la snying rje chen po bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa
429a1('bum): 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la snying rje chen po zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba
429a2('bum): thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la snying rje chen po stong zhes
429a3('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
429a4('bum): yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la snying rje chen po mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
429a5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la snying rje chen po smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
429a6('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi
429a7('bum): 'jug pa'o//gang de la snying rje chen po mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
429b1('bum): ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la snying rje chen po dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge
429b2('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la snying rje chen po bsgom
429b3('bum): pa'i phyir/de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
429b4('bum): su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi rtag ces bya bar dri mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
429b5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar
429b6('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
429b7('bum): bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
430a1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams
430a2('bum): zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas
430a3('bum): kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
430a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams
430a5('bum): mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang
430a6('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba
430a7('bum): thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
430b1('bum): 'dres pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos
430b2('bum): kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i
430b3('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
430b4('bum): 'dres pa rnams bsgom pa'i phyir/de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa'am/
430b5('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgom pa'i phyir/de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
430b6('bum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//gang de la byang chub bsgom pa'i phyir/de mi
430b7('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor
431a1('bum): mi 'jug pa'o///shes rang kyi la tu rkyen pa sgyung brag brgya //bam pan dun pa//rab 'byu 'di ni byang chub sems dang 'a sems drub tshan
431a2('bum): dge ba'i bshes gnyen du shes par bya ste/dge ba'i bshes gnyen des yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos na/
431a3('bum): 'jigs/mi dngas skrag par mi 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
431a4('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan po 'di thos na/'jigs shing dadengs la skrag par 'gyur zhing thabs mi mkhas te sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu lhung zhing /dge
431a5('bum): bo'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su spongs pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'dri la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/shes rab kyi
431a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom zhing dmigs te/shes rab kyi pha rol tu
431a7('bum): byin pa des rlom sems su byed pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom zhing dmigs te/bsam gtan
431b1('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom zhing dmigs te/
431b2('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid lta bya ba med par/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom zhing
431b3('bum): dmigs te/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
431b4('bum): zhing dmigs te/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
431b5('bum): bsgom zhing dmigs te/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa de lta bu ni/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
431b6('bum): pa'i thabs mi mkhas par rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad
431b7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/gzugs nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang
432a1('bum): rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/gzugs phyi stong
432a2('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
432a3('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/gzugs phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong
432a4('bum): po nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
432a5('bum): la bya ba med par/gzugs stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
432a6('bum): su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/gzugs chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
432a7('bum): byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam
432b1('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/gzugs don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/
432b2('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/gzugs 'dus byas
432b3('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
432b4('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/gzugs 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas
432b5('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
432b6('bum): med par/gzugs mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
432b7('bum): sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/gzugs thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar
433a1('bum): yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol
433a2('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/gzugs dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
433a3('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
433a4('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/gzugs rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang
433a5('bum): rlom sems su byed do//de shesnga rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/gzugs chos thams cad stong pa
433a6('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
433a7('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/gzugs rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang
433b1('bum): gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
433b2('bum): la bya ba med par/gzugs mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi ngomigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
433b3('bum): sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/gzugs dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya
433b4('bum): bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
433b5('bum): tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/gzugs ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
433b6('bum): la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/gzugs dngos
433b7('bum): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed
434a1('bum): do//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen gyi/da shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
434a2('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rlung stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlomasams
434a3('bum): su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lnga spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/tshor ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yod la byed de/
434a4('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad
434a5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/tshor ba phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid
434a6('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/tsher ba stong pa nyid
434a7('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
434b1('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/tshor ba chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid
434b2('bum): kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/
434b3('bum): tshor ba don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//dri shes rab kyi
434b4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/tshor ba 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
434b5('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
434b6('bum): yid la bya ba med par/tshor ba 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
434b7('bum): byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/tshor ba mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid
435a1('bum): la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' lngas 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de she sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
435a2('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/tshor ba thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma
435a3('bum): dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
435a4('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/tshor ba dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs lnga/stong pa nyid kyis kyang
435a5('bum): rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/tshor ba rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar
435a6('bum): yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam
435a7('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/tshor ba chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang
435b1('bum): dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//dri shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byang ba med par/tshor ba rang gi
435b2('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi phra
435b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/tshor ba mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi
435b4('bum): dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
435b5('bum): yid la bya ba med par/tshor ba dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
435b6('bum): byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par tshor ba ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs
435b7('bum): pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
436a1('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/tshor ba dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
436a2('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
436a3('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/'du shes rlung stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
436a4('bum): lo/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lnga spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/'du shes
436a5('bum): phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
436a6('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/'du shes phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid
436a7('bum): kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med
436b1('bum): par/'du shes stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes
436b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/'du shes chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul
436b3('bum): gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
436b4('bum): la bya ba med par/'du shes don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
436b5('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/'du shes 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i
436b6('bum): tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
436b7('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/'du shes 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong po nyid kyis kyang
437a1('bum): rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/'du shes mtha' las
437a2('bum): 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab
437a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/'du shes thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs
437a4('bum): pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dong tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams
437a5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/'du shes dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dror ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/
437a6('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/'du shes rang
437a7('bum): bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
437b1('bum): byin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/'du shes chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
437b2('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
437b3('bum): bya ba med par/'du shes rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
437b4('bum): su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/'du shes mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
437b5('bum): byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams
437b6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/'du shes dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong
437b7('bum): pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/'du shes ngo bo nyid stong pa
438a1('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
438a2('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/'du shes dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i
438a3('bum): tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
438a4('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lnga spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/'du byed nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i
438a5('bum): tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
438a6('bum): yid la bya ba med par/'du byed phyi spyod pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de
438a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/'du byed phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i
438b1('bum): tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
438b2('bum): la bya ba med par/'du byed stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
438b3('bum): dride shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/'du byed chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul
438b4('bum): gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
438b5('bum): la bya ba med par/'du byed don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
438b6('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/'du byed 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs
438b7('bum): pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
439a1('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/'du byed 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong
439a2('bum): pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/'du byed mtha' las
439a3('bum): 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha
439a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/'du byed thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i
439a5('bum): tshul gyis thog mu drang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
439a6('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/'du byed dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis
439a7('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/'du byed rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar
439b1('bum): yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams
439b2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/'du byed chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/
439b3('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/'du byed rang gi mtshan nyid
439b4('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
439b5('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/'du byed mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa
439b6('bum): nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/
439b7('bum): 'du byed dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab
440a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/'du byed ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs
440a2('bum): pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
440a3('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/'du byed dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/
440a4('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad
440a5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rnam par shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis
440a6('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rnam par shes pa phyi stong pa zhes
440a7('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam
440b1('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong
440b2('bum): ngapa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid
440b3('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
440b4('bum): pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rnam par shes pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid
440b5('bum): kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rnam
440b6('bum): par shes pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab
440b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rnam par shes pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i
441a1('bum): tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
441a2('bum): panyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rnam par shes pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong
441a3('bum): pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rnam par shes pa mtha'
441a4('bum): las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab
441a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya med par/rnam par shes pa thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
441a6('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thob ma drang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams
441a7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rnam par shes pa dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang
441b1('bum): dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rnam par
441b2('bum): shes pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol
441b3('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rnam par shes pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
441b4('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lnga spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
441b5('bum): yid la bya ba med par/rnam par shes pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis
441b6('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa stong
441b7('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
442a1('bum): pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i
442a2('bum): tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
442a3('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis
442a4('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa'i
442a5('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//rab 'byor
442a6('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/mig nang
442a7('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
442b1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/mig phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
442b2('bum): sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/mig phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs
442b3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
442b4('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba med par/mig stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed
442b5('bum): do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/mig chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul
442b6('bum): byis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
442b7('bum): la bya ba med par/mig don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
443a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/mig 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed pa/
443a2('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad
443a3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/mig 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong
443a4('bum): pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/mig mtha' las
443a5('bum): 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab
443a6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/mig thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs
443a7('bum): pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad
