443b1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/mig dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la stong pa nyid kyis
443b2('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/mig rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid
443b3('bum): labyed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams
443b4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/mig chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/
443b5('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/mig rang gi mtshan
443b6('bum): nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlon sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
443b7('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par mig mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid
444a1('bum): dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
444a2('bum): yid la bya ba med par mig dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
444a3('bum): byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/mig ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs
444a4('bum): pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
444a5('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/mig dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po red pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
444a6('bum): la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams
444a7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rna ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
444b1('bum): sems su byed //dashes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rna ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmyigs//
444b2('bum): pa'i chul gyos phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de she sar ba kyi rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid dang ldang pa'i ming
444b3('bum): la bya ba med par/rna ba phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab
444b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rna ba stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong
444b5('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
444b6('bum): la bya ba med par/rna ba chen po steng pra zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de
444b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rna ba don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i
445a1('bum): tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/rnam pa thams
445a2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rna ba 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong po nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid
445a3('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rna ba 'dus ma byas stong pa
445a4('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed do/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
445a5('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rna ba mtha' las 'dres pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha'
445a6('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
445a7('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rna ba thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
445b1('bum): la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rna ba dor ba
445b2('bum): med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
445b3('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rna ba rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong
445b4('bum): pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyed pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/
445b5('bum): ba chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes
445b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rna ba rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i
445b7('bum): tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
446a1('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rna ba mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
446a2('bum): la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i chu/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rna ba dngos
446a3('bum): po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab
446a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rna ba ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul
446a5('bum): gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lnga spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
446a6('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rna ba dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang
446a7('bum): dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//
446b1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sna nang spyong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid
446b2('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sna phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
446b3('bum): byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
446b4('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sna phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
446b5('bum): dedri shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sna stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul
446b6('bum): gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
446b7('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sna chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de
447a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sna don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do//
447a2('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad
447a3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sna 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis
447a4('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sna 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar
447a5('bum): yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
447a6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sna mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong
447a7('bum): pa nyid kyang dmigs lo/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med
447b1('bum): 8/sna bog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
447b2('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sna dror ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i
447b3('bum): tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
447b4('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sna rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed
447b5('bum): do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sna chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de
447b6('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad
447b7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sna rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/
448a1('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/
448a2('bum): sna mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes
448a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sna dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i
448a4('bum): tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
448a5('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sna ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis
448a6('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sna dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
448a7('bum): nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//rab 'byor
448b1('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lce nang stong
448b2('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//
448b3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lce phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis
448b4('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lce phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid
448b5('bum): la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigaso la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams
448b6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lce stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid
448b7('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lce chen po stong pa zhes bya bar
449a1('bum): yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la/
449a2('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lce don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dron dam pa stong pa
449a3('bum): nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//dri shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med
449a4('bum): par/lce 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes
449a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lce 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i
449a6('bum): tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
449a7('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lce mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yod la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
449b1('bum): la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lce thog nA dang
449b2('bum): tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha
449b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lce dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med
449b4('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med
449b5('bum): par/lce rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha
449b6('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lce chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
449b7('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
450a1('bum): yid la bya ba med par/lce rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid
450a2('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lce mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes
450a3('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
450a4('bum): pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lce dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa
450a5('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
450a6('bum): la bya ba med par/lce ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
450a7('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lce dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
450b1('bum): byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
450b2('bum): sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lus nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
450b3('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
450b4('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lus phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
450b5('bum): byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lus phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs
450b6('bum): pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
450b7('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lus stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang
451a1('bum): rlom sems su pyod //de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i snod 'dru ba med par/lum chen po snang /
451a2('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la snyed pa'i
451a3('bum): /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lus don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang
451a4('bum): dmigs la/stong ba nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi rab tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/
451a5('bum): lus 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes
451a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lus 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i
451a7('bum): tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang drim sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
451b1('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lus mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa
451b2('bum): nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lus thog ma dang tha ma med pa
451b3('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
451b4('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lus dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa
451b5('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med
451b6('bum): par/lus rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab
451b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lus chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul
452a1('bum): gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams
452a2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lus rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
452a3('bum): la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lus mi
452a4('bum): dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha
452a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lus dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul
452a6('bum): gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
452a7('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lus ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang
452b1('bum): rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha ral tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rje/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/pus dngos pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes
452b2('bum): bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do///shes rab kyi pha ro
452b3('bum): tu sprin da skyeng drag brgya pa//bam pa zla brgyad pa//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen pa/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rje/rnam pa thams cad
452b4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/yid nang stong pa zhes bya ba ro yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
452b5('bum): su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/yid phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs
452b6('bum): pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
452b7('bum): ldan pa'i yid lo bya ba med par/yid phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
453a1('bum): byed do//de shes rlab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/yid stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar
453a2('bum): yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rang kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//
453a3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/yid chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/
453a4('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/yid don
453a5('bum): dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol
453a6('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/yid 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas
453a7('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med/
453b1('bum): par/yid 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha
453b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/yid mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha'
453b3('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
453b4('bum): la bya ba med par/yid thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
453b5('bum): sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/yid dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
453b6('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
453b7('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/yid rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
454a1('bum): byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/yid chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
454a2('bum): byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam
454a3('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/yid rung gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gro mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi
454a4('bum): dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/yid mi
454a5('bum): dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha
454a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/yid dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
454a7('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
454b1('bum): yid la bya ba med par/yid ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes
454b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/yid dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs

454b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/gzugs nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang
454b5('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/
454b6('bum): gzugs phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
454b7('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/gzugs phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang
455a1('bum): dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba/
455a2('bum): med par/gzugs stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
455a3('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/gzugs chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs
455a4('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
455a5('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/gzugs don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dron dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang
455a6('bum): rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/gzugs 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya
455a7('bum): bar yid la byed do/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
455b1('bum): tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/gzugs 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmiklas pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang
455b2('bum): dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lo spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/gzugs
455b3('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes
455b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/gzugs thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs
455b5('bum): pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad
455b6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/gzugs dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa
455b7('bum): nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/gzugs rang bzhin stong pa zhes
456a1('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
456a2('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/gzugs chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams
456a3('bum): cod stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
456a4('bum): med par/gzugs rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang blo mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
456a5('bum): byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/gzugs mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
456a6('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad
456a7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/gzugs dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong
456b1('bum): pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/gzugs nga ba nyid stong pa zhes bya
456b2('bum): bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
456b3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/gzugs dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya b.ro yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i
456b4('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
456b5('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sgra rlung stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/
456b6('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sgra phyi stong pa zhes bya
456b7('bum): par yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams
457a1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sgra phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid
457a2('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sgra stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar
457a3('bum): yid la byed de/dmigasngo pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam
457a4('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sgra chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid
457a5('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sgra don dam pa stong pa zhes
457a6('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam+bu pA stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
457a7('bum): pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sgra 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do//dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa
457b1('bum): nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sgra
457b2('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
457b3('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sgra mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha'
457b4('bum): lngas 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
457b5('bum): yid la bya ba med par/sgra thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis
457b6('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sgra dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar
457b7('bum): yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam
458a1('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid bya ba med par/sgra rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang
458a2('bum): dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sgra
458a3('bum): chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi
458a4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sgra rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
458a5('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
458a6('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sgra mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
458a7('bum): sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sgra dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
458b1('bum): byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad
458b2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sgra ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs lo/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
458b3('bum): su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sgra dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
458b4('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo nga nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po//
458b5('bum): deshes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/dri nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong
458b6('bum): pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par//
458b7('bum): dri phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
459a1('bum): tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/dri phyi nang stong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
459a2('bum): la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par /dri stong pa nyid stong
459a3('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
459a4('bum): tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/dri chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la//
459a5('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/dri don dam pa stong pa
459a6('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//
459a7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/dri 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong
459b1('bum): pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/dri 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar
459b2('bum): yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe
459b3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/dri mtha' lngas 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mthu' las 'das pa stong pa
459b4('bum): nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par//
459b5('bum): dri thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
459b6('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lnga spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med parA/dri dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i
459b7('bum): tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
460a1('bum): ma mas da/ sa rkye la nga /rnam pa shidang nga da sa
460a2('bum): byung snyid byed de//de migs rgyu gyi tshas pa slong 'i ny-id nga dmig nga rnamasems sa
460a3('bum): spyod du'i hUM/rnam pa rnams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/dri mtshan nyid stong pa nas bya ba yid yo byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ring gi ma dz+nyAn
460a4('bum): da stong pa nyid kya myi gastsal/sto ba nyid kyis de rnamasems su byed de/shes sa sbyin pa la spyod ba'i na/rnam pa sems ca du mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i nga
460a5('bum): la bya ba med par/dri mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs nga'i tshul gyis mI dmigs pa stong bo nyid kyang migs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed
460a6('bum): shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//rnam pathams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/dri dngas pa med pa stong ba zhis bya bar yid la byed do//
460b1('bum): da migs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lnga spyad pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad

460b4('bum): yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med po'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems

461a5('bum): byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams
461a6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ro don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid
461a7('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ro 'dus byas stong pa zhes
461b1('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam

461b5('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ro thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
461b6('bum): bogr-i mA dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
461b7('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba med par/re dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su

462a5('bum): nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis raring gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis cang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol
462a6('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ro mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi
462a7('bum): dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
462b1('bum): yid la bya ba med par/ra dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//

462b4('bum): la bya ba med par/ro dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang

462b6('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/reg nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do///

463a1('bum): kyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
463a2('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/reg phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//

463b6('bum): bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
463b7('bum): tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/reg dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang
464a1('bum): dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba

464a4('bum): gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigasnga la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
464a5('bum): dradang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/reg rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid
464a6('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/reg mi dmigs pa stong pa
464a7('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
464b1('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/reg dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa
464b2('bum): nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/
464b3('bum): reg ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
464b4('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/reg dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos
464b5('bum): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/de shes rab kyi pha
464b6('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/chos nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa
464b7('bum): nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/
465a1('bum): chos phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha
465a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/chos phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong
465a3('bum): pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med
465a4('bum): par/chos stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes
465a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/chos chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul
465a6('bum): gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
465a7('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/chos don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang
465b1('bum): rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/chos 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar/
465b2('bum): yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam
465b3('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/chos 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
465b4('bum): la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/chos mtha'
465b5('bum): las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'odas pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes
465b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/chos thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs
465b7('bum): pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad
466a1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/chos dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang
466a2('bum): dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par//
466a3('bum): chos rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab
466a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i
466a5('bum): tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad
466a6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/chos rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yod la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
466a7('bum): la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par//
466b1('bum): chos mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi
466b2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/chos dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa
466b3('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/chos
466b4('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
466b5('bum): pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/chos dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
466b6('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
466b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/mig gi rnam par shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/
467a1('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/mig
467a2('bum): gi rnam par shes pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha
467a3('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/mig gi rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i
467a4('bum): tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
467a5('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba med par/mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid
467a6('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/mig gi rnam par shes pa chen
467a7('bum): po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
467b1('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/mig pa rnam par shes pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la bya dang /dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam
467b2('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med
467b3('bum): par/mig gi rnam par shes pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
467b4('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/mig gi rnam par shes pa 'dus ma byas spyong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
467b5('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
467b6('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/mig gi rnam par shes pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
467b7('bum): la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/mig gi rnam par shes pa
468a1('bum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
468a2('bum): su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/mig gi rnam par shes pa dor ba med pa stong pa zhes
468a3('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
468a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/mig gi rnam par shes pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa
468a5('bum): nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med
468a6('bum): par/mig gi rnam par shes pa cho sde thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
468a7('bum): su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/mig gi rnam par shes pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes
468b1('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa
468b2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/mig gi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang
468b3('bum): dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/mig gi rnam par shes
468b4('bum): pa dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol
468b5('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/mig gi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo
468b6('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par//
468b7('bum): mig gi rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
469a1('bum): sems su byed do//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
469a2('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
469a3('bum): sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar
469a4('bum): yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad
469a5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong
469a6('bum): pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rna ba'i rnam par shes
469a7('bum): pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol
469b1('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
469b2('bum): chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
469b3('bum): la bya ba med par/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yod la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
469b4('bum): su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar
469b5('bum): yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa
469b6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
469b7('bum): kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rna
470a1('bum): ba'i rnam par shes pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid
470a2('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bye ba med par/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa thog
470a3('bum): ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha mu med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
470a4('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
470a5('bum): byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams
470a6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
470a7('bum): la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rna ba'i rnam par
470b1('bum): shes pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab
470b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs
470b3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
470b4('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/
470b5('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa
470b6('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yod la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//dri shes rab kyi pha
470b7('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul
471a1('bum): gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
471a2('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
471a3('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do///shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa//bam po zhe dgu pa//rab 'byor
471a4('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sna'i
471a5('bum): rnam par shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
471a6('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sna'i rnam par shes pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi
471a7('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
471b1('bum): nemed par/sna'i rnam par shes pa phyi nung stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de
471b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid lo byed de/
471b3('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
471b4('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sna'i rnam par shes pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang
471b5('bum): rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sna'i rnam par shes pa don dam pa stong pa zhes
471b6('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam
471b7('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sna'i rnam par shes pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang
472a1('bum): dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
472a2('bum): med par/sna'i rnam par shes pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang da migs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
472a3('bum): sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sna'i rnam par shes pa mtha' las 'das pa
472a4('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol
472a5('bum): ta phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sna'i rnam par shes pa thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
472a6('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang bla ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa
472a7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sna'i rnam par shes pa dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong
472b1('bum): pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/
472b2('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes
472b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sna'i rnam par shes pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs
472b4('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
472b5('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sna'i rnam par shes pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gri mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/
472b6('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sna'i rnam par shes
472b7('bum): pa mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi
473a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sna'i rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid
473a2('bum): la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam
473a3('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sna'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang
473a4('bum): dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sna'i
473a5('bum): rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang
473a6('bum): rlom sems su byed do//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
473a7('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lce'i rnam par shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
473b1('bum): sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lce'i rnam par shes pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
473b2('bum): byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
473b3('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lce'i rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang
473b4('bum): rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes
473b5('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams
473b6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lce'i rnam par shes pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong
473b7('bum): panyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lce'i rnam par shes pa don
474a1('bum): dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes
474a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lce'i rnam par shes pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
474a3('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams
474a4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lce'i rnam par shes pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
474a5('bum): kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/
474a6('bum): lce'i rnam par shes pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
