474a7('bum): sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lce'i rnam par shes pa thog ma dang tha ma
474b1('bum): medapa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med ngapa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
474b2('bum): phyin pa la spyad pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lce'i rnam par shes pa der ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yod la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul
474b3('bum): gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
474b4('bum): la bya ba med par/lce'i rnam par shes pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
474b5('bum): byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lce'i rnam par shes pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar
474b6('bum): yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe
474b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lce'i rnam par shes pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan
475a1('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
475a2('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lce'i rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la
475a3('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lce'i rnam par
475a4('bum): shes pa dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de
475a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lnga spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lce'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de//
475a6('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad
475a7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lce'i rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i
475b1('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
475b2('bum): pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lus kyi rnam par shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid
475b3('bum): kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lus
475b4('bum): kyi rnam par shes pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
475b5('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lus kyi rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang
475b6('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med
475b7('bum): par/lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
476a1('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lus kyi rnam par shes pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar
476a2('bum): yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams
476a3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lus kyi rnam par shes pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang
476a4('bum): dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/
476a5('bum): lus kyi rnam par shes pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
476a6('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lus kyi rnam par shes pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
476a7('bum): byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa
476b1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lus kyi rnam par shes pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa
476b2('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med
476b3('bum): par/lus kyi rnam par shes pa thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang ba ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang
476b4('bum): rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lus kyi rnam par shes pa dor ba med pa stong
476b5('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
476b6('bum): tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lus kyi rnam par shes pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong
476b7('bum): nga nyid kyang dmigs pa/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med
477a1('bum): dar/lus kyi rnam par shes pa rjes thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thanas cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong
477a2('bum): nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lus kyi rnam par shes pa
477a3('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab
477a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lus kyi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de//
477a5('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad
477a6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lus kyi rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa
477a7('bum): nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
477b1('bum): med par/lus kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
477b2('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lus kyi rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya
477b3('bum): bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems
477b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/yid kyi rnam par shes pa nang stong pa zhes
477b5('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa
477b6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yod la bya ba med par/yid kyi rnam par shes pa phyi sbyong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/
477b7('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/yid kyi rnam par
478a1('bum): shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
478a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed
478a3('bum): de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad
478a4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/yid kyi rnam par shes pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la
478a5('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/yid kyi rnam par shes
478a6('bum): pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha
478a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs
478b1('bum): pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
478b2('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba med par/yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid
478b3('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/yid kyi rnam par shes pa mtha' las
478b4('bum): 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha
478b5('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/yid kyi rnam par shes pa thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
478b6('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa
478b7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/yid kyi rnam par shes pa dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid
479a1('bum): kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
479a2('bum): ba med par/yid kyi rnam par shes pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
479a3('bum): su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/yid kyi rnam par shes pa chos thams cad stong pa
479a4('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
479a5('bum): pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/yid kyi rnam par shes pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang
479a6('bum): gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
479a7('bum): yid la bya ba med par/yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid
479b1('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/yid kyi rnam par shes pa dngos
479b2('bum): po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
479b3('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/yid kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
479b4('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
479b5('bum): med par/yid kyi rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid
479b6('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
479b7('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/mig gi 'dus te reg pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
480a1('bum): sems su byed do//dri shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/mig gi 'dus te reg pa phyi
480a2('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
480a3('bum): pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/mig gi 'dus te reg pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang
480a4('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
480a5('bum): bya ba med par/mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
480a6('bum): sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/mig gi 'dus te reg pa chen po stong pa zhes
480a7('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
480b1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/mig bri 'dus te reg pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid
480b2('bum): kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/mig gi
480b3('bum): 'dus te reg pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha
480b4('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/mig gi 'dus te reg pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul
480b5('bum): gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
480b6('bum): yid la bya ba med par/mig gi 'dus te reg pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid
480b7('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/mig gi 'dus te reg pa thog ma dang tha
481a1('bum): ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do///
481a2('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/mig gi 'dus te reg pa dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yod la
481a3('bum): byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa
481a4('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/mig gi 'dus te reg pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid
481a5('bum): kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/
481a6('bum): mig gi 'dus te reg pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
481a7('bum): su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/mig gi 'dus te reg pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong
481b1('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
481b2('bum): tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa
481b3('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/
481b4('bum): mig gi 'dus te reg pa dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
481b5('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/mig gi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs
481b6('bum): pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
481b7('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/mig gi 'dus te reg pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang
482a1('bum): dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
482a2('bum): pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rlung stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid
482a3('bum): kya dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rnam sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha ma tu phyin bra la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/
482a4('bum): ba'i 'dus te reg pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do//dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
482a5('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do//dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi
482a6('bum): nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
482a7('bum): med par/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
482b1('bum): byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lnga spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs
482b2('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
482b3('bum): la bya ba med par/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
482b4('bum): byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
482b5('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
482b6('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid
482b7('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mtha'
483a1('bum): las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' lngas 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed
483a2('bum): do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya
483a3('bum): bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
483a4('bum): pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med
483a5('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
483a6('bum): ba med par/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
483a7('bum): su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa chos thams cad stong pa
483b1('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byedade/dmigs pa'i rgyal gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de//de shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pA la spyong nga'i /
483b2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong
483b3('bum): pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rna
483b4('bum): ba'i 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigaso pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de
483b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
483b6('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad
483b7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa
484a1('bum): nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byu ba med par/rna ba'i 'dus te
484a2('bum): reg pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
484a3('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/
484a4('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol
484a5('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sna'i 'dus te reg pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi
484a6('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
484a7('bum): med par/sna'i 'dus te reg pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
484b1('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs
484b2('bum): pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
484b3('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sna'i 'dus te reg pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do//dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
484b4('bum): sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sna'i 'dus te reg pa don dam pa stong pa zhes
484b5('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa
484b6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sna'i 'dus te reg pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed ngo /dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
484b7('bum): la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sna'i 'dus te reg pa
485a1('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de
485a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sna'i 'dus te reg pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
485a3('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams
485a4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sna'i 'dus te reg pa thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong
485a5('bum): pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/
485a6('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de
485a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sna'i 'dus te reg pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
485b1('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
485b2('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sna'i 'dus te reg pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/
485b3('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sna'i 'dus te reg pa rang gi
485b4('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol
485b5('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sna'i 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul
485b6('bum): gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
485b7('bum): yid la bya ba med par/sna'i 'dus te reg pa dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang
486a1('bum): rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sna'i 'dus te reg pa
486a2('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
486a3('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sna'i 'dus te reg pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i
486a4('bum): tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/de
486a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lce'i 'dus te reg pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs
486a6('bum): pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
486a7('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lce'i 'dus te reg pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
486b1('bum): su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lce'i 'dus te reg pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
486b2('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
486b3('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis
486b4('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lce'i 'dus te reg pa chen pa stong pa zhes bya
486b5('bum): bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams
486b6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lce'i 'dus te reg pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/
486b7('bum): stong po nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lce'i 'dus te reg pa
487a1('bum): 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmid so 'o/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de
487a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lce'i 'dus te reg pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
487a3('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
487a4('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lce'i 'dus te reg pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang
487a5('bum): dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lce'i 'dus
487a6('bum): te reg pa thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bag ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyi rlom sems su byed
487a7('bum): do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lce'i 'dus te reg pa der b.re dang stong pa zhes bya bar yi la
487b1('bum): byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
487b2('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byad med par/lce'i 'dus te reg pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis
487b3('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lce'i 'dus te reg pa chos thams cad stong pa
487b4('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//
487b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lce'i 'dus te reg pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa
487b6('bum): nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lce'i
487b7('bum): 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab
488a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lce'i 'dus te reg pa dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid
488a2('bum): la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa
488a3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lce'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong po nyid kyang dmigs la/
488a4('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lce'i 'dus te reg pa
488a5('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do///
488a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa//bam po lnga bcu pa//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//
488a7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nang steng pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang
488b1('bum): dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rang kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lus kyi 'dus
488b2('bum): te reg pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dra migs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis sdang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
488b3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la
488b4('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong/
488b5('bum): pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
488b6('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong
488b7('bum): pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/
489a1('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
489a2('bum): byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
489a3('bum): byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams
489a4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang
489a5('bum): dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lus
489a6('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
489a7('bum): su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa
489b1('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
489b2('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dar ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med
489b3('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med
489b4('bum): par/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de
489b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed
489b6('bum): re/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tshwa sde thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dra migs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams
489b7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa
490a1('bum): nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
490a2('bum): yid la bya ba med par/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis
490a3('bum): nga rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dngos po
490a4('bum): med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol
490a5('bum): tuphyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul
490a6('bum): gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
490a7('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs po'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
490b1('bum): kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa
490b2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/
490b3('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa
490b4('bum): phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
490b5('bum): tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong po nyid
490b6('bum): kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/
490b7('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de
491a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/yId kyi 'dus te reg pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar
491a2('bum): yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams
491a3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/
491a4('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa
491a5('bum): 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
491a6('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
491a7('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
491b1('bum): yid la bya ba med par/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mtha' las 'dres pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid
491b2('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa thog ma dang tha ma
491b3('bum): med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog mu dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
491b4('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba
491b5('bum): med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med
491b6('bum): par/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes
491b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs
492a1('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams
492a2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gri mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang
492a3('bum): dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/yid
492a4('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de
492a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
492a6('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos pa med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigasal/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad
492a7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong
492b1('bum): pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dngos po med pa'i
492b2('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//rab 'byor gzhan yang
492b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
492b4('bum): tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//
492b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmibs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang
492b6('bum): dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/mig gi 'dus
492b7('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab
493a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya
493a2('bum): bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams
493a3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya med par/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang
493a4('bum): dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/mig gi
493a5('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
493a6('bum): byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'dus byas
493a7('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
493b1('bum): pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byang med par/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
493b2('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
493b3('bum): med par/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa
493b4('bum): nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
493b5('bum): ba thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab
493b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
493b7('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
494a1('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rang bzhin steng pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/darig pa'i chung d+hIs rang bzhin stong
494a2('bum): pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mong
494a3('bum): par/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa
494a4('bum): nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/mig gi 'dus te
494a5('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
494a6('bum): su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi
494a7('bum): dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi
494b1('bum): nga rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
494b2('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
494b3('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
494b4('bum): la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/mig gi 'dus
494b5('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yod la byed do//dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid
494b6('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
494b7('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigaso la/stong /
495a1('bum): pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rna ba'i 'dus
495a2('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi
495a3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
495a4('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byeng ngo //de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
495a5('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
495a6('bum): la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rna ba'i 'dus te reg
495a7('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes
495b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
495b2('bum): byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
495b3('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/
495b4('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
495b5('bum): gyis tshor ba 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha
495b6('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
495b7('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad
496a1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul
496a2('bum): gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
496a3('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
496a4('bum): la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rna ba'i 'dus te reg
496a5('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes
496a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid
496a7('bum): la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa
496b1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan
496b2('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med
496b3('bum): par/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
496b4('bum): sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yad la bya ba med par/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po med pa
496b5('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
496b6('bum): tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo ba
496b7('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med
497a1('bum): par rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
497a2('bum): kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa
497a3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang
497a4('bum): dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sna'i 'dus
497a5('bum): te reg du'i rkyen gyis tshor ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha
497a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs
497a7('bum): pa'i tshur gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
497b1('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong
497b2('bum): pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
497b3('bum): gyis tshor ba chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
497b4('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs
497b5('bum): pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
497b6('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
497b7('bum): la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sna'i 'dus te/
498a1('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
498a2('bum): sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mtha'
498a3('bum): las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha
498a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar
498a5('bum): yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
498a6('bum): tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
498a7('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
498b1('bum): yid la bya ba med par/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid
498b2('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
498b3('bum): tshor ba chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de
498b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa
498b5('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
498b6('bum): pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul
498b7('bum): gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
499a1('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po mang ba stong
499a2('bum): pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lnga spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med
499a3('bum): par/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
499a4('bum): sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
499a5('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
499a6('bum): byebyu ngo //rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
499a7('bum): med par/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
499b1('bum): su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid
499b2('bum): la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
499b3('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong
499b4('bum): pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
499b5('bum): tshor ba stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
499b6('bum): byin+da pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs
499b7('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
500a1('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang
500a2('bum): dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lce'i
500a3('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
500a4('bum): byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'dus ma byas stong pa
500a5('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
500a6('bum): tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i
500a7('bum): tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
500b1('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong
500b2('bum): pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/
500b3('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dor ba med pa spyod pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
500b4('bum): su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rang bzhin stong pa
500b5('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam
500b6('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
500b7('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
501a1('bum): yid la bya ba med par/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rlung gi mtshan nyid stong pa
501a2('bum): nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/
501a3('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
501a4('bum): sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos
501a5('bum): po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol
501a6('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
501a7('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
501b1('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i/
501b2('bum): ngong nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
501b3('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul
501b4('bum): byos nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
501b5('bum): bya ba med par/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/sbyor pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
501b6('bum): su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba phyi nang stong
501b7('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
502a1('bum): tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs
502a2('bum): pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
502a3('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la//
502a4('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lus kyi 'dus te
502a5('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed
