502a6('bum): do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'dus byas stong
502a7('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
502b1('bum): tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
502b2('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
502b3('bum): yid la bya ba med par/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang
502b4('bum): dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lus kyi
502b5('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis
502b6('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher
502b7('bum): bdor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol
503a1('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya ba /
503a2('bum): yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam
503a3('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i
503a4('bum): tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
503a5('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi
503a6('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
503a7('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang
503b1('bum): dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lus kyi 'dus te
503b2('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po med pa spyod pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do///
503b3('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya
503b4('bum): bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam
503b5('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i
503b6('bum): tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de
503b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar
504a1('bum): yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
504a2('bum): tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi
504a3('bum): stong pa nyid kyang du mi gas la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
504a4('bum): ba med par/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang
504a5('bum): rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
504a6('bum): ba stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs po'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol
504a7('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
504b1('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
504b2('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
504b3('bum): la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/yid kyi 'dus te
504b4('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de
504b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya
504b6('bum): bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa
504b7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha'
505a1('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
505a2('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma
505a3('bum): med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
505a4('bum): la bya ba med par/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/
505a5('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/yid kyi 'dus
505a6('bum): to reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigaso pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed
505a7('bum): do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba chos
505b1('bum): thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
505b2('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs
505b3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
505b4('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
505b5('bum): la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/yid kyi 'dus te reg
505b6('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de
505b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid
506a1('bum): la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
506a2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i
506a3('bum): tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do///shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/
506a4('bum): bam po lnga bcu rtsa gcig pa//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
506a5('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sa'i khams nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
506a6('bum): sems su byed do//dri shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sna'i khams phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
506a7('bum): byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams
506b1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sa'i khams phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang
506b2('bum): rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sa'i khams stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar
506b3('bum): yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa
506b4('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sa'i khams chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong
506b5('bum): pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sa'i khams don dam pa
506b6('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
506b7('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sa'i khams 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa
507a1('bum): nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
507a2('bum): la bya ba med par/sa'i khams 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
507a3('bum): su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sa'i khams mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar
507a4('bum): yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
507a5('bum): tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sa'i khams thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma
507a6('bum): dang ba ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
507a7('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sa'i khams dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis
507b1('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sa'i khams rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar
507b2('bum): yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad
507b3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sa'i khams chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs lnga//
507b4('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sa'i khams rang gi
507b5('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol
507b6('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/si'i khams mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
507b7('bum): mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
508a1('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sa'i khams dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong
508a2('bum): pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sa'i khams ngo bo nyid
508a3('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
508a4('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/sa'i khams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul
508a5('bum): gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po//
508a6('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/chu'i khams nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs
508a7('bum): pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
508b1('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rgyu'i khams phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de
508b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/chu'i khams phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i
508b3('bum): tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
508b4('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba med par/chu'i khams stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
508b5('bum): sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/chu'i khams chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
508b6('bum): byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams
508b7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/chu'i khams don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/
509a1('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/chu'i
509a2('bum): khams 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab
509a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/chu'i khams 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i
509a4('bum): tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
509a5('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/chu'i khams mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong
509a6('bum): pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/chu'i khams thog ma
509a7('bum): dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de
509b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/chu'i khams dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs
509b2('bum): pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
509b3('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/chu'i khams rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
509b4('bum): su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/chu'i khams chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
509b5('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad
509b6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/chu'i khams rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
509b7('bum): la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/chu'i khams mi
510a1('bum): dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab
510a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/chu'i khams dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs
510a3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
510a4('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/chu'i khams ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid
510a5('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/chu'i khams dngos po
510a6('bum): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
510a7('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med
510b1('bum): par/me'i khams nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol
510b2('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/me'i khams phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid
510b3('bum): kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/me'i
510b4('bum): khams phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
510b5('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/me'i khams stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid
510b6('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
510b7('bum): med par/me'i khams chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes
511a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/me'i khams don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
511a2('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad
511a3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/me'i khams 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid
511a4('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/me'i khams 'dus ma byas stong pa
511a5('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
511a6('bum): pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/me'i khams mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha'
511a7('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
511b1('bum): yid la bya ba med par/me'i khams thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang
511b2('bum): rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/me'i khams dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid
511b3('bum): la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad
511b4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/me'i khams rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis
511b5('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/me'i khams chos thams cad stong pa zhes
511b6('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'i tshe/
511b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/me'i khams rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
512a1('bum): kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
512a2('bum): la bya ba med par/me'i khams mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
512a3('bum): sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/me'i khams dngos po med pa stong pa zhes
512a4('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs lnga/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//
512a5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/me'i khams ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
512a6('bum): la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/me'i khams
512a7('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
512b1('bum): rang 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' ba/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la stong pa'i te//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rlung /
512b2('bum): khams nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
512b3('bum): pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rlung gi khams phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs lo//
512b4('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rlung gi khams phyi rlung
512b5('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
512b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rlung gi khams stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang ngomigs
512b7('bum): /stong pa nyid kyis kyang rnam sems su byed do//ngo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rlung gi khams chen
513a1('bum): po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol
513a2('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rlung gi khams don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
513a3('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
513a4('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rlung gi khams 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang
513a5('bum): rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rlung gi khams 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar
513a6('bum): yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam
513a7('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rlung gi khams mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong
513b1('bum): pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rlung gi
513b2('bum): khams thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs nga'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
513b3('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rlung gi khams dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs
513b4('bum): pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
513b5('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rlung gi khams rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
513b6('bum): sems su byed do//dri shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rlung gi khams chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar
513b7('bum): yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//
514a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rlung gi khams rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul
514a2('bum): gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
514a3('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rlung gi khams mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/
514a4('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rlung gi khams
514a5('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes
514a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rlung gi khams ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs
514a7('bum): pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen/
514b1('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rlung gi khams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
514b2('bum): kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
514b3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/nam mkha'i khams nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang
514b4('bum): dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/
514b5('bum): nam mkha'i khams phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab
514b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/nam mkha'i khams phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs
514b7('bum): pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
515a1('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang
515a2('bum): dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/nam mkha'i
515a3('bum): khams chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//dri shes rab kyi pha rol
515a4('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/nam mkha'i khams don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
515a5('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam
515a6('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/nam mkha'i khams 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
515a7('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
515b1('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/nam mkha'i khams 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dusnga ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
515b2('bum): le/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med
515b3('bum): par/nam mkha'i khams mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa
515b4('bum): nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par
515b5('bum): nam mkha'i khams thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong
515b6('bum): pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/
515b7('bum): nam mkha'i khams dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang
516a1('bum): rlom sems su byed do//dri shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/nam
516a2('bum): mkha'i khams rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed
516a3('bum): do/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/nam mkha'i khams chos thams cad
516a4('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigos pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes
516a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/nam mkha'i khams rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes
516a6('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab
516a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/nam mkha'i khams mi dmigs pa stong pa
516b1('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol
516b2('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/nam mkha'i khams dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed
516b3('bum): de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lnga spyod
516b4('bum): pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/nam mkha'i khams ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul
516b5('bum): gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
516b6('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/nam mkha'i khams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med
516b7('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
517a1('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rnam par shes pa'i
517a2('bum): khams nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs le/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de
517a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rnam par shes pa'i khams phyi stong pa
517a4('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol
517a5('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rnam par shes pa'i khams phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid
517a6('bum): la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
517a7('bum): pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs
517b1('bum): pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams
517b2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rnam par shes pa'i khams chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa
517b3('bum): nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
517b4('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rnam par shes pa'i khams don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'ang la byed do/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/
517b5('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par
517b6('bum): rnam par shes bya'i khams 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid lnga byed do/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs le/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
517b7('bum): sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yang la bya ba med par/rnam par shes pa'i khams
518a1('bum): 'dus mu byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la//stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
518a2('bum): su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rnam par shes pa'i khams mtha' las
518a3('bum): 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
518a4('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rnam par shes pa'i khams thog ma dang tha ma med pa
518a5('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes
518a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med parA/rnam par shes pa'i khams dor ba med pa stong pa zhes
518a7('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol
518b1('bum): tu phyin pa lnga spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rnam par shes pa'i khams rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs
518b2('bum): pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
518b3('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rnam par shes pa'i khams chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs lnga/
518b4('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rnam par shes pa'i
518b5('bum): khams rang bri mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
518b6('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes
518b7('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
519a1('bum): pa lnga spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rnam par shes pa'i khams dngos pa med pa stong pa zhes bya bar
519a2('bum): yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
519a3('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid lnga bya ba med par/rnam par shes pa'i khams ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs
519a4('bum): po'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams
519a5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rnam par shes pa'i khams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul
519a6('bum): gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
519a7('bum): dpa' chen po/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ma rig pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
519b1('bum): byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad
519b2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ma rig pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
519b3('bum): sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ma rig pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed
519b4('bum): de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
519b5('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ma rig pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis
519b6('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ma rig pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar
519b7('bum): yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams
520a1('bum): cang mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ma rig pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid
520a2('bum): kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
520a3('bum): med par/ma rig pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
520a4('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ma rig pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
520a5('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams
520a6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ma rig pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha'o las 'das pa stong pa nyid
520a7('bum): kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
520b1('bum): med par/ma rig pa thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang
520b2('bum): rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ma rig pa dor ba med pa stong pa zhes
520b3('bum): bya bar yang la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
520b4('bum): pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ma rig pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar ying la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa
520b5('bum): nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
520b6('bum): med par/ma rig pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
520b7('bum): byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ma rig pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
521a1('bum): byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
521a2('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ma rig pa mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i
521a3('bum): tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad
521a4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ma rig pa dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang
521a5('bum): dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par
521a6('bum): ma rig pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de
521a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ma rig pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes
521b1('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//rab 'byor gzhan yang
521b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/'du byed
521b3('bum): nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rlung stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//dri shos rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
521b4('bum): pA la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/'du byed phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang
521b5('bum): dmigaso la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/
521b6('bum): 'du byed phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi
521b7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/'du byed stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul
522a1('bum): gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad
522a2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/'du byed chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa
522a3('bum): nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/'du byed don dam
522a4('bum): pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
522a5('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/'du byed 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus
522a6('bum): byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
522a7('bum): yid la bya ba med par/'du byed 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
522b1('bum): sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/'du byed mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid
522b2('bum): la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' lngas 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//
522b3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/'du byed thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tho go ma dang ba
522b4('bum): ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
522b5('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba med par/'du byed dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang
522b6('bum): rlomA sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/'du byed rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya
522b7('bum): bar yid la byed do/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa
523a1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bye ba med par/'du byed chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
523a2('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
523a3('bum): ldan pa'i yid la byang med par/'du byed rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa
523a4('bum): nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/'du byed mi dmigs
523a5('bum): pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol
523a6('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/'du byed dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul
523a7('bum): gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad
523b1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/'du byed ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid
523b2('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/'du byed dngos po
523b3('bum): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong po zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
523b4('bum): byed do//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
523b5('bum): yid la bya ba med par/rnam par shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
523b6('bum): sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rnam par shes pa phyi
523b7('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
524a1('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de//
524a2('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams
524a3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
524a4('bum): kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
524a5('bum): la bya ba med par/rnam par shes pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang
524a6('bum): rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rnam par shes pa
524a7('bum): don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
524b1('bum): dri shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rnam par shes pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar
524b2('bum): yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
524b3('bum): pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rnam par shes pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i
524b4('bum): pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam
524b5('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rnam par shes pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i
524b6('bum): tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//
524b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rnam par shes pa thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i
525a1('bum): tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
525a2('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rnam par shes pa dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
525a3('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
525a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rnam par shes pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang
525a5('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
525a6('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rnam par shes pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa
525a7('bum): nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
525b1('bum): la bya ba med par/rnam par shes pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong
525b2('bum): pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//dri shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rnam par
525b3('bum): shes pa mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
525b4('bum): su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid drang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rnam par shes pa dngos po med
525b5('bum): pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs po'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab
525b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
525b7('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad
526a1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
526a2('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
526a3('bum): po/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ming dang gzugs nang stong pa zhes bya
526a4('bum): bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
526a5('bum): pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ming dang gzugs phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi
526a6('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//dri shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
526a7('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ming dang gzugs phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong
526b1('bum): pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ming dang
526b2('bum): gzugs stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed
526b3('bum): do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ming dang gzugs chen po stong pa
526b4('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha
526b5('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ming dang gzugs don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
526b6('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
526b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ming dang gzugs 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas
527a1('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmigs lnga/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
527a2('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ming dang gzugs 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang
527a3('bum): dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/
527a4('bum): ming dang gzugs mtha' las 'das pa skyong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang
527a5('bum): rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ming dang gzugs thog ma dang
527a6('bum): tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do///
527a7('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ming dang gzugs dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar
527b1('bum): yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/
527b2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ming dang gzugs rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong
527b3('bum): pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
527b4('bum): yid la bya ba med par/ming dang gzugs chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis
527b5('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ming dang gzugs rang gi mtshan nyid
527b6('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mutshun nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
527b7('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ming dang gzugs mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i
528a1('bum): tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam
528a2('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ming dang gzugs dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa
528a3('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
528a4('bum): bya ba med par/ming dang gzugs ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
528a5('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ming dang gzugs dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes
528a6('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do////zhus dang /
